anya-e0104n0:245_3: iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:245_4: anāgatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:245_5: uppannattike ca “anuppannā khandhā uppādino khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_6: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa
anya-e0104n0:245_7: dhammassā”ti etassa vibhaṅge “paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:245_8: uppannattike ca “uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ettakasseva
anya-e0104n0:245_9: vuttattā paccuppanne citte cetopariyañāṇaṃ nappavattatīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:245_11: purimesu viya itaresu ca cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ siyāti?
anya-e0104n0:245_13: nayadassanavasena pana taṃ saṃkhittanti aññāya pāḷiyā viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:246_2: paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassā”ti etesaṃ hi vibhaṅgesu “cetopariyañāṇena atītārammaṇapaccuppannacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0104n0:246_3: atītārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:246_5: anāgatārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:246_7: paccuppannārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti vuttāti.
anya-e0104n0:247_1: Tesanti tesu dvīsu ñāṇesūti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:247_3: Tenāha “aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhappaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānātī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:247_5: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ maggārammaṇanti āha “maggasampayuttacittārammaṇattā pana pariyāyato maggārammaṇanti vutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:247_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “atīte buddhā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu,
anya-e0104n0:247_12: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyiṃsūti chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇavasena maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇatopi appamāṇārammaṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:247_13: Tattha maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇāni tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena maggaphalesu ñāṇesu pavattanti.
anya-e0104n0:247_14: Nibbānapaccavekkhaṇañca nibbānārammaṇesu appamāṇadhammesu ñāṇesūti maggādipaccavekkhaṇāni pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:247_16: “Appamāṇā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”icceva hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:247_18: Tasmā pubbenivāsañāṇena eva maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇakicce vuccamānepi nibbānapaccavekkhaṇatā na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:248_1: na cetopariyayathākammūpagañāṇāpekkhāti tesaṃ catukkhandhārammaṇabhāvassa asādhakoti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n0:248_2: aññattha “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro ca cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:248_3: “savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:248_4: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vuttattā cetopariyañāṇāpekkhāpi bahuvacananiddesoti imassa atthassa siddhito.
anya-e0104n0:248_5: Evampi yathākammūpagañāṇassa “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro cā”tiādīsu avuttattā catukkhandhārammaṇatā na sijjhatīti? Na,
anya-e0104n0:248_7: Yathākammūpagañāṇena hi kammasaṃsaṭṭhā cattāro khandhā kammamukhena gayhati.
anya-e0104n0:248_12: tasmā “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro cā”tiādike vibhāgakaraṇe taṃ na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:248_16: Na hi taṃ kusalākusalavibhāgaṃ viya savitakkādivibhāgaṃ kammaṃ vibhāvetuṃ asamatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:249_0: “Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmagottānussaraṇakāle na vattabbārammaṇa”nti ettakameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:249_3: Ayamettha amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyassāyaṃ attano mati.
anya-e0104n0:251_3: “Ajjhattārammaṇañceva bahiddhārammaṇañcā”ti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:251_6: Na hi ajjhattabahiddhā nāma visuṃ ekaṃ atthi,
anya-e0104n0:251_8: Yadi evaṃ tiko eva na pūrati padadvayāsaṅgahitassa tatiyassa atthantarassa abhāvato, na,
anya-e0104n0:251_10: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “te eva tippakārepi dhamme”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:251_11: Te eva ajjhattādivasena tividhepi dhammeti attho.
anya-e0104n0:251_12: Ettha hi “te eva dhamme”ti avatvā “tippakāre”ti vacanaṃ pakārabhedanibandhanā ayaṃ tikadesanāti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:251_13: Yathā hi kusalattikādīnaṃ desanā yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ jātisampayogappahānasikkhābhūmiārammaṇappabhedaniyamakālādibhedanibandhanā,
anya-e0104n0:251_17: Pañceva hi khandhā sasantatipariyāpannataṃ upādāya “ajjhattā”ti vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:251_20: Tenāha “anindriyabaddharūpañca nibbānañca ṭhapetvā sabbe dhammā siyā ajjhattā,
anya-e0104n0:251_24: pakārantarassa ca anāmaṭṭhattā tatiyo rāsi natthīti?
anya-e0104n0:251_26: Yadipi hi paṭhamapadena asaṅgahitasaṅgaṇhanavasena dutiyapadassa pavattattā sabbepi sabhāvadhammā padadvayeneva pariggahitā,
anya-e0104n0:251_27: tehi pana visuṃ visuṃ gahitadhamme ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena tatiyapadaṃ vuttanti attheva tatiyo rāsi.
anya-e0104n0:251_29: bhinnavatthuke pana dhamme adhiṭṭhānabhedaṃ amuñcitvā ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ na sambhavatīti kālena ajjhattaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:257_2: Paññā bhāvetabbā samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:257_4: gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vā “samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsattha”nti evaṃ ativiya saṅkhepena bhāsitattā
anya-e0104n0:257_5: ayaṃ sā paññāti sabhāvato viññātumpi tāva na sukarā.
anya-e0104n0:257_6: Bhāvanāvidhānassa pana adassitattā pageva bhāvetuṃ na sukarāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:258_1: Kenaṭṭhena paññāti kena atthena paññāti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:258_2: “paññā”ti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:258_5: āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbāti āha “kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:258_7: Kasmā panettha saṃkilesavodānapucchā na gahitāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n0:258_9: Asati ca tasmiṃ kuto vodānapucchāti tadubhayaṃ na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:258_10: Lokiyāya pana tāni bhāvanāvidhāne eva antogadhānīti katvā visuṃ na gahitāni maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiantogadhattā,
anya-e0104n0:258_11: samādhibhāvanāyaṃ vā vuttanayānusārena veditabbānīti na gahitāni.
anya-e0104n0:258_12: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti āha “paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṃso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:259_4: Pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:259_7: vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:259_8: Taṃdassanena ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ “paññā bahuvidhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:259_13: Na sādheyyāti vipassanābhāvanāya saddhiṃ maggabhāvanā idha adhippetattho.
anya-e0104n0:259_16: Anavasesato hi paññāpabhede vissajjiyamāne “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādiko sabbo ñāṇavatthu vibhaṅge,
anya-e0104n0:259_17: suttantesu ca tattha tattha āgato paññāpabhedo.
anya-e0104n0:259_18: Sakalopi vā abhidhammanayo āharitvā vissajjetabbo bhaveyya,
anya-e0104n0:259_19: tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ idha paññābhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0104n0:259_22: sopi yathārahaṃ saddhiṃ phalāphalabhedena vibhajitvā vissajjetabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n0:259_23: So ca pana vissajjiyamāno aññadatthu vikkhepāya saṃvatteyya,
anya-e0104n0:259_28: tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhapaññā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭisedheti.
anya-e0104n0:260_7: tena “lohitakaṃ odātaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādike saññāya gahetabbākāre saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:260_8: Sañjānanamattamevāti ettha sañjānanaṃ nāma “nīlaṃ pīta”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe vijjamānaṃ vā avijjamānaṃ vā saññānimittaṃ katvā jānanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:260_11: saddena kadācipi imissā te visesā natthevāti avadhāreti.
anya-e0104n0:260_13: Tattha viññāṇakiccampi kātuṃ asakkontī saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti “lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti”cceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:260_15: Ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:260_16: atha kho tattha aññañca visesaṃ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:260_19: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:260_21: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti.
anya-e0104n0:260_22: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhanti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:260_28: Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvañca pāpeti.
anya-e0104n0:261_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:261_9: Te pakāreti indajālājātipupphādippakāre ceva chekādippakāre ca.
anya-e0104n0:262_1: Saññā vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇassa gahaṇato dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:262_3: Viññāṇaṃ ārammaṇe ekaccavisesagahaṇasamatthatāya gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:262_4: Paññā ārammaṇe anavasesavisesāvabodhato heraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:262_5: “Nānappakārato jānana”nti iminā ñeyyadhammā paccekaṃ nānappakārāti tesaṃ yāthāvato avabodho paññāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:262_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:263_1: Na tattha ekaṃsena hotīti tasmiṃ cittuppāde paññā ekantena na hoti.
anya-e0104n0:263_5: Yathā hi sukhaṃ pītiyā na niyamato aviyuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:263_6: evaṃ saññāviññāṇāni paññāya na niyamato aviyuttāti.
anya-e0104n0:263_7: Yathā pana pīti sukhena niyamato aviyuttā,
anya-e0104n0:263_9: Tasmā evaṃ avinibbhuttesu imesu tīsu dhammesu tesaṃ vinibbhogo dukkaroti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ kahāpaṇadassanaṃ nidassitanti.
anya-e0104n0:263_12: nānātelassa vā ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā mathitassa “idaṃ asukāya nadiyā udakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:263_13: idaṃ asukatela”nti niddhāretvā sarūpato dassanaṃ dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:263_14: kimaṅgaṃ pana arūpadhammesūti dassento “yaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:264_5: Tadubhayassa ca yāthāvato paṭivijjhanalakkhaṇā paññāti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:264_6: Ghaṭapaṭādipaṭicchādakassa bāhirandhakārassa dīpālokādi viya yathāvuttadhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa viddhaṃsanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:264_7: Uppajjamāno eva hi paññāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento evaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:264_8: tato eva dhammasabhāvesu asammuyhanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:264_9: Kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti evampi asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:264_10: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā “samādhi tassā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:264_11: Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti suttapadaṃ nibandhanabhāvena āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:266_2: na tenassā koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidhā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:266_6: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā.
anya-e0104n0:266_10: Attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā,
anya-e0104n0:266_11: ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi natthi etissā āsavāti anāsavā. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:266_17: sayampi vā bhavati uppajjati na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhāvanti bhūmi cāti dassanabhūmi,
anya-e0104n0:266_19: Sesamaggattayaṃ pana yasmā paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṃyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:266_21: tasmā bhāvanā ca yathāvuttenatthena bhūmi cāti bhāvanābhūmi.
anya-e0104n0:266_29: upāye tassa tassa atthassa nibbattikāraṇe kosallaṃ upāyakosallanti visuṃ visuṃ kosallapadaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:267_3: Samudāyesu pavattā samaññā tadekadesesupi vattatīti āha “maggasampayuttā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:267_4: paccekampi vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ maggasamaññāti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:268_0: Dhammanānattābhāvepi padatthanānattamattena dukkaravacanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “atthato panesā lokiyalokuttarāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:268_2: atthato lokiyalokuttarāva paññāti āha “eseva nayo”ti. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:268_5: tathā dutiyādijjhānikāni cāti evaṃ soḷasasu maggacittesu.
anya-e0104n0:268_6: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā mahaggatapaññā na gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:269_1: Attano cintāvasenāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva.
anya-e0104n0:269_3: Yathā tathā vāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā vā asutvā vā sayameva bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa.
anya-e0104n0:270_2: kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvānanti vā kammāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:270_10: Tāni panetāni ekacce paṇḍitā bodhisattasadisā manussānaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ ākaṅkhantā neva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti,
anya-e0104n0:270_13: Atha kho attano dhammatāya cintāya karonti,
anya-e0104n0:270_14: paññavantehi attano dhammatāya cintāya katānipi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisāneva honti.
anya-e0104n0:271_4: Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:271_6: saddena aniyamatthena dukkhānattalakkhaṇānipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ nānantariyakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:271_11: Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:271_13: Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ kammāyatanādīnaṃ apaccanīkadassanena anulomanato,
anya-e0104n0:271_17: Sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni khamati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti.
anya-e0104n0:271_22: Te ca kammāyatanādayo dhammā etāya nijjhāyamānā nijjhānaṃ khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhanti.
anya-e0104n0:271_23: Parato asutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ asutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
anya-e0104n0:271_24: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:271_28: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā disvāpi parassa kathayamānassa
anya-e0104n0:271_29: vacanaṃ sutvāpi ācariyasantike uggahetvāpi paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:272_2: Sā lokuttaravipassanāti yā nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattā appamāṇārammaṇā paññā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:272_4: Sā hi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādiṃ agaṇhantīpi vipassanākiccapāripūriyā,
anya-e0104n0:272_5: nibbānassa vā tathalakkhaṇaṃ visesato passatīti vipassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:272_7: maggassa pana āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā na vipassanāvohāraṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n0:273_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ anatthahāniatthuppattilakkhaṇe āye kosallaṃ kusalatā nipuṇatā.
anya-e0104n0:274_0: Taṃ pana ekantikaṃ āyakosallaṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “ime dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:274_1: Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattipahānesu,
anya-e0104n0:275_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ atthahānianatthuppattilakkhaṇe apāye kosallaṃ kusalatā apāyakosallaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:275_3: Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppajjananirujjhanesu,
anya-e0104n0:275_10: Paññavā eva hi “mayhaṃ evaṃ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:275_14: so evaṃ ñatvā anuppanne akusale na uppādeti,
anya-e0104n0:276_2: Taṅkhaṇappavattanti accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pavattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:277_2: Ubhayaṃ gahetvāti “ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā”ti ubhayaṃ anupubbato pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n0:277_4: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti ekappahāreneva sabbepi pañcakkhandhe avibhāgena pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n0:277_5: Ayaṃ pana tikkhavipassakassa mahāpuññassa bhikkhuno vipassanābhiniveso.
anya-e0104n0:278_2: tappaṭicchādakasammohavidhaṃsanavasena ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:278_5: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hi catusaccaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ nāma,
anya-e0104n0:279_0: “Atthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇānī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivaseneva vivarituṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:279_1: Tattha atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti yaṃ atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:279_4: Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0104n0:279_7: Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ atthādīnaṃ paccayuppannatādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:280_2: “Yaṃ kiñci paccayasambhūta”nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n0:280_6: kiriyā cāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:280_9: Tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetuṃ “pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā detī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:280_12: maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo attho.
anya-e0104n0:280_15: itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti evaṃ tividho hoti.
anya-e0104n0:281_0: “Yo koci phalanibbattako hetū”ti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni samudayādīni gahitāni,
anya-e0104n0:281_3: abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalanti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca dhammā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:281_6: itaraṃ nibbattakoti evaṃ tividho hetu veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:281_7: Ettha ca kiriyānaṃ avipākatāya dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n0:281_8: Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvopi na vattabbo? Na,
anya-e0104n0:281_10: Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
anya-e0104n0:281_12: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n0:281_15: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvassābhāvato dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n0:281_17: ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti etaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale,
anya-e0104n0:281_18: vipākakiriyādhamme ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:282_0: Ayameva hi atthoti yvāyaṃ atthadhammānaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanavasena attho vutto,
anya-e0104n0:283_4: tassa tassa atthassa bodhane paṭiniyatasambandho saddavohāroti attho.
anya-e0104n0:283_11: Na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:283_13: evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:283_17: Tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:284_0: Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0104n0:284_2: na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:284_3: “Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca vacanasaddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0104n0:284_4: Evaṃ pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ vuttanti āpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:284_5: Yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃtaṃsaddavibhāvakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:284_7: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho.
anya-e0104n0:284_8: “Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassā”ti ca “paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassā”ti na nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:284_9: Tañhi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayahetubhāvato
anya-e0104n0:284_10: niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti pabhedagatampi hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:285_5: kusalakiriyābhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā “sabbattha ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:285_8: kiccādikassa ca vasena “idaṃ ñāṇaṃ idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ iminā nāma kiccenā”ti jānanaṃ. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:286_1: Pabhedaṃ gacchantīti anekabhedabhinnesu ārammaṇesu tesaṃ yāthāvato taṃtaṃpabhedāvabodhanasamatthataṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0104n0:287_0: Mahāsāvakānañca asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti sāmaññavidhinā dassitamatthaṃ apavādena nivattetuṃ ānandatthera-
anya-e0104n0:288_3: sātisayaṃ vā adhigamaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:288_4: Sekkhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
anya-e0104n0:288_5: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
anya-e0104n0:288_7: Atthadhammādīnaṃ anavasesasaṅgaṇhanato buddhavacanavisayā eva pariyattiādayo dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:288_10: parito sabbaso ñātuṃ icchā paripucchāti āha “pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:288_12: adhippāyato ca duviññeyyaṭṭhānaṃ vitthārato sanniṭṭhānakathāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:288_23: tato ca yāva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyuttoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:290_3: Ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalādīni sabbabuddhaguṇesu sakiccato pākaṭatarānīti vuttaṃ “dasa balāni viyā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:290_4: aññe vā sabbaññutaññāṇādayopi sabbe bhagavato guṇavisesā asekkhaphalavimokkhantikā eva.
anya-e0104n0:292_4: Kasmā panete evaṃ bahudhammā bhūmibhāvena gayhanti,
anya-e0104n0:292_5: nanu khandhādīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhi hotīti? Na,
anya-e0104n0:292_7: aññathā sabbasādhāraṇo anuggaho na kato siyā.
anya-e0104n0:292_8: Tividhā hi sattā rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti.
anya-e0104n0:292_10: tadatthaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ catudhā vibhattattā.
anya-e0104n0:292_16: saṃkhittarucī majjhimarucī vitthārarucīti ca tividhā sattā,
anya-e0104n0:292_17: tesampi atthāya yathākkamaṃ khandhādiggahaṇaṃ katanti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:292_18: Indriyaggahaṇaṃ pana kāmaṃ ete dhammā issarā viya sahajātadhammesu issariyaṃ ādhipaccaṃ pavattenti,
anya-e0104n0:292_20: na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo “suññā ete avasavattino”ti anattalakkhaṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:292_21: Taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:292_26: cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā hoti, nāsatīti.
anya-e0104n0:292_28: Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādikā imā pañca visuddhiyo
anya-e0104n0:293_7: tasmā atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ rāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “rūpameva khandho rūpakkhandho”ti samānādhikaraṇasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:293_8: “Tīhi khandhehi iṇaṃ dassāmā”tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe pana khandha-
anya-e0104n0:293_11: Na hi ekassa niccassa sato nibbānassa atītādivibhāgo atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:293_15: Kasmā panete khandhā pañceva vuttā iminā eva ca kamenāti?
anya-e0104n0:293_19: kammahetutañca cintetvā vedanāsaññā saṅkhārakkhandhato nīharitvā visuṃ khandhabhāvena desitā.
anya-e0104n0:295_5: saddena ca gahitena aniyamatthatāya atippasaṅge āpanne taṃ ruppanasaddo nivatteti,
anya-e0104n0:295_12: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n0:295_20: Virodhipaccayasannipāte yo attano santāne bhinne bhijjamānasseva visadisuppattihetubhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:295_22: Imasmiṃ pakkhe rūpayati vikāraṃ āpādetīti rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:295_25: Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpadhammesu rūpasamaññāya pasaṅgo eva natthi saṅghaṭṭanābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:295_27: Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti rāsaṭṭhaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vadati.
anya-e0104n0:296_0: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādāyarūpanti bhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:297_1: sabhāvadhammānaṃ pana lakkhaṇādivibhāvanāti katvā vuttaṃ “lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:297_3: Avacanañca tassa tassatthassa paccayatoti ettha pakārantarena vibhāvitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:297_5: Āposaṅgahitāya tejonupālitāya vāyovitthambhitāya eva pathavīdhātuyā pavatti,
anya-e0104n0:298_4: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:298_12: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārammaṇādibhāve niruḷhattā dassane eva cakkhu-
anya-e0104n0:298_13: saddo pavattati padumādīsu paṅkajādisaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:298_14: Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:298_23: tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā niruttinayena.
anya-e0104n0:298_24: Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n0:298_25: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n0:298_26: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
anya-e0104n0:298_27: Kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:298_29: rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti saviggahamiva dassetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:298_30: Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:298_33: sakehi vā paccayehi sappīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:298_37: paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:299_6: Copanakāyabhāvato kāyo ca so adhippāyaviññāpanato viññatti cāti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0104n0:299_8: adhippāyaviññāpanato ca vacī ca sā viññatti cāti vacīviññatti.
anya-e0104n0:300_0: Kamato pana sabbesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṃ bhūtarūpāni uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n0:300_1: Itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca ādito uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n0:300_2: Tesaṃ visayīnaṃ ime visayāti dassetuṃ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n0:300_4: bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:300_5: Svāyaṃ attabhāvo imehi “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:300_6: “Iminā jīvatī”ti vohāraṃ labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ tato jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:300_7: Tassa imaṃ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṃ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṃ hadayavatthu.
anya-e0104n0:300_8: Tassa imāsaṃ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṃ viññattidvayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:300_13: Sabbo cāyaṃ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṃ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:301_1: Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhāni upādārūpāni lakkhaṇādito niddisituṃ “tattha rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:301_5: rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvo catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo,
anya-e0104n0:301_7: Yasmā paccayantarasahito eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:301_10: na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṃ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṃ kusalākusalanti.
anya-e0104n0:301_11: Abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ abhighāto viyāti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:301_14: Tenāha “yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:301_15: “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati vā”ti ca ādi.
anya-e0104n0:301_17: rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ arahatīti dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto.
anya-e0104n0:301_21: Tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti
anya-e0104n0:302_4: asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:302_5: Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
anya-e0104n0:302_6: uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto
anya-e0104n0:302_7: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:302_8: “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando’ti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:303_5: Ettha ca taṃtaṃattabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṃ cakkhulakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n0:303_6: “Evarūpaṃ nāma me cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena dutiyanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:303_7: Satipi pana pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:303_9: ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:304_4: Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa bhinnattā.
anya-e0104n0:304_5: Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ kathaṃ nesaṃ visesoti?
anya-e0104n0:304_7: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:304_9: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti.
anya-e0104n0:304_10: Na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato.
anya-e0104n0:304_17: kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayoti.
anya-e0104n0:305_2: Tesu hi vasudhammo evaṃ vadati “cakkhumhi tejo adhikaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:305_7: Cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo cakkhū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:305_11: idaṃ pana “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ samānānanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:305_12: Tejādīnaṃ hi paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:305_13: tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:305_14: Tasmā catunnampi bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:305_22: vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti tesaṃ laddhi.
anya-e0104n0:305_23: Tejādīnaṃ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:305_24: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena,
anya-e0104n0:305_28: pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:306_3: āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti imesaṃ visesayuttānaṃ dassanato “rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti paṭhamavādī āhāti.
anya-e0104n0:306_6: Atha vā rūpādivisesaguṇehi tejaākāsapathavīāpavāyūhi cakkhādīni katānīti vadantassa kaṇādassa vādaṃ uddharitvā
anya-e0104n0:306_8: Āsave upalabbhamānopi gandho pathaviyā āposaṃyuttāya kappāsato visadisāyāti na kappāsagandhassa adhikabhāvāpattīti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n0:306_10: Āsave hi udakasaṃyuttā pathavī udakena abhibhūtā,
anya-e0104n0:306_11: na kappāsapathavīti tassa eva gandhena adhikena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:306_12: Uṇhodakasaṃyutto ca aggi upalabbhanīyo mahantoti katvā tassa phasso viya vaṇṇopi pabhassaro upalabbheyyāti
anya-e0104n0:306_13: uṇhodake vaṇṇato agginā anabhisambandhassa sītodakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha.
anya-e0104n0:306_16: Tannivattanena “tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ nivattitanti evaṃ paramparāya
anya-e0104n0:306_17: ubhayābhāvo visesaparikappanapahānassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “tasmā pahāyeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:306_19: ko pana vādo nānākalāpe cakkhādayo bhūtavisesābhāvepīti dassetuṃ rūparasādinidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:307_1: kiṃ pana cakkhādivisesassa kāraṇanti taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ aññamaññassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:307_2: Ekampi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvabhavappatthanānipphannaṃ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇanti ca kammavisesoti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:307_3: Na hi taṃ yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:307_5: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:307_6: vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:307_7: Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammunā nibbattitaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n0:307_8: Na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:308_3: Gandharasānaṃ nissayā ghānajivhānaṃ nissaye allīyantīti te nissayavasena allīnā.
anya-e0104n0:308_10: cittajo saddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:308_11: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi.
anya-e0104n0:308_14: attano visayipadesassa eva gahetabbato gandho viya.
anya-e0104n0:308_18: nanu dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyantīti?
anya-e0104n0:308_20: Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭe gahaṇavisesato ākāravisesānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:308_22: evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte,
anya-e0104n0:308_24: majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte nicchayaggahaṇānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ visesato lahukaṃ suto “cirena suto”ti adhimāno hoti.
anya-e0104n0:308_27: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
anya-e0104n0:308_30: bhājanādicalanassa ca ayokanto viya ayocalanassa paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:309_1: Pubbe lakkhaṇādinā vibhāvitampi cakkhuṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādito vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhu cetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:309_2: Tattha cakkhu sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Ca-
anya-e0104n0:309_7: Snehamiva satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ tannissiteheva
anya-e0104n0:309_8: āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaṃ parivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:309_10: Pamāṇato ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:309_11: Cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthubhāvaṃ nissayabhāvato āvajjanasampaṭicchanādīnaṃ tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ dvārabhāvaṃ samavasaraṭṭhānato.
anya-e0104n0:309_13: tatthāpi paccekaṃ anekakalāpagatabhāvato anekampi samānaṃ sāmaññaniddesena āvajjanāya ekattā,
anya-e0104n0:309_14: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva ca kiccakarattā ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:310_0: Manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, atha vā manūti macco.
anya-e0104n0:312_4: upādinnakajjhāsayatāya kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasiṅgālo viya passitabboti dassento “vammi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:312_6: Visamajjhāsayatā ca cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:312_7: cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:312_9: Sabbopi ca yathāvutto papañco sotādīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:314_5: Tato eva “itthī”ti taṃsahitaṃ santānaṃ pakāsentaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:314_20: Imāni ca itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena uppajjamānānipi yebhuyyena itthindriyasahite eva
anya-e0104n0:314_21: santāne taṃtadākārāni hutvā uppajjantīti itthindriyaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇanti katvā vuttaṃ “itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:314_23: Itthiliṅgādīsu eva ca kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:315_0: Yasmā pana bhāvadasakepi rūpānaṃ itthindriyaṃ na janakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:315_5: āhāro viya vā kalāpantararūpānañca “indriyaatthiavigatapaccayo”ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:315_12: Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekasmiṃ santāne saha na pavattati “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:315_15: tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassāpi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:315_18: byāpakamevā”ti vatvā yadi evaṃ kāyappasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkaṃ nivattento “na ca kāyappasādenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:315_20: yadipi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya kāyappasādena aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:315_21: tena pana bhinnanissayattā ṭhitokāse ṭhitantipi vattabbataṃ nāpajjatīti ayameva cettha nippariyāyakathā.
anya-e0104n0:315_22: “Rūparasādayo viyā”ti etena samānanissayesupi nāma saṅkaro natthi lakkhaṇabhedato,
anya-e0104n0:316_5: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinopi kammajarūpassa pavattihetubhāvena taṃ anupālakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:316_7: Na hi kammajānaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ arahati āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya.
anya-e0104n0:316_13: Attanā anupālanavasena yāpetabbāni pavattetabbāni bhūtāni etassa padaṭṭhānanti yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:316_17: Asati anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyya.
anya-e0104n0:316_18: Yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhitihetumantarena ṭhiti na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:316_21: atha kasmā sabbakālaṃ na ṭhapetīti āha “na bhaṅgato”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:317_1: Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthūti kathametaṃ viññātabbanti? Āgamato,
anya-e0104n0:317_3: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
anya-e0104n0:317_4: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādi āgamo.
anya-e0104n0:317_12: Nissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā “atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu,
anya-e0104n0:317_15: tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi na tadanuguṇā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n0:317_17: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyunti ekarasā desanā na bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n0:317_18: Ekarasañca desanaṃ desetuṃ idha satthu ajjhāsayo.
anya-e0104n0:318_3: ojāya ca indriyabaddhato bahipi pavattidassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:318_4: itthipurisindriyānampi tadubhayarahitepi santāne dhātudvayadassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:318_5: jīvitindriyassāpi aññakiccaṃ vijjatīti na taṃnissayatā yujjati evāti pārisesato hadayavatthu,
anya-e0104n0:318_7: Sakkā hi vattuṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave rūpapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:318_12: Nanu ca indriyanissayatāyapi sādhanato viruddho hetu āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n0:318_14: Diṭṭhaṃ hetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa viya dhātudvayassa vatthuno mandatikkhādiananuvidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:318_15: Tathā hissa pāḷiyaṃ indriyapaccayatā na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:318_25: Aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayassa khijjanato tatthetamavaṭṭhitanti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:318_27: Nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupatiṭṭhatīti ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:319_1: Abhikkamo ādi yesaṃ te abhikkamādī. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:319_3: Tesaṃ abhikkamādīnaṃ pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā abhikkamādippavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0104n0:319_6: tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso kāyaviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “abhikkamādi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:320_7: Yadi evaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo na yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:320_10: nāyaṃ doso catunnaṃ vikāro catūsu ekassāpi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:320_11: Vāyodhātuadhikatāya ca kalāpassa “vāyodhātuyā”ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n0:320_17: Na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:320_20: Tassa ca taggahaṇānantaraṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti adhippāyaggahaṇato.
anya-e0104n0:320_21: Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu “idamesa kāreti maññe”ti adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:320_23: Tasmā phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa ñāpakoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:320_24: Ñāpako ca hetu ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ gahito eva ñāpeti,
anya-e0104n0:320_25: na vijjamānatāmattenāti vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ vikāraggahaṇampi anumānato viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:322_0: Na sattāmattato atthe, te aññātā pakāsakā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:323_3: atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:323_5: Kiṃ sabbāva vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karontīti?
anya-e0104n0:323_7: Sattamajavanasambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purimajavanasambhūtā vāyodhātuyo upathambhakapaccaye labhitvā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajarūpaṃ, na itarā.
anya-e0104n0:323_8: Itarā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ karontiyo tassā upakārāya honti.
anya-e0104n0:323_9: Desantaruppatti eva calananti nimitte ca kattubhāvo samāropitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:323_13: Cittajarūpe pana calante taṃsambandhatāya utukammāhārajarūpampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0104n0:323_17: tathā calayitumasakkuṇantiyopi thambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā paṭhamajavanādisambhūtāpi vāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitā evāti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:323_21: Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakavacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:324_0: Kāyavipphandanassa hetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārabhāvato pariyāyena viññatti kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:324_2: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttāti kāyavipphandanena karaṇabhūtena adhippāyassa viññāpanahetubhāvato kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:324_8: Dutiyanaye pana yathāvuttena kāyena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0104n0:325_2: Tassa pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0104n0:325_4: Tassā yaṃ upādinnasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññitaṃ kiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:325_5: tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso vacīviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “vacībhe…pe…
anya-e0104n0:326_0: Idāni “kassa pana ākāravikāro”tiādi kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:326_4: Idha ca thambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato “sattamajavanasambhūtā”tiādinayo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:326_14: Yathā hi ussāpetvā baddhagosīsādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā
anya-e0104n0:326_16: evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānavaṇṇasadde gahetvā tadanantarapavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā
anya-e0104n0:327_5: Ayaṃ hi ākāsadhātu taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantī viya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:327_7: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati,
anya-e0104n0:327_11: Vijjamānepi hi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo,
anya-e0104n0:327_13: Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito.
anya-e0104n0:327_19: “Yāya paricchinnesū”tiādinā ākāsadhātuyā taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ kalāpantarehi asaṅkarakāraṇataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:328_10: Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhātakammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n0:328_11: Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:329_0: Lahutādīnaṃ aññamaññāvijahanena duviññeyyanānattatā vuttāti taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehi taṃnānattappakāsanatthaṃ “evaṃ santepī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:329_3: Dvidhā vuttopi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:329_13: Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhānāhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbanti keci,
anya-e0104n0:329_16: tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvova siyā.
anya-e0104n0:329_17: Kasmā pana kammajarūpesu lahutādayo na hontīti?
anya-e0104n0:330_2: yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayo,
anya-e0104n0:330_3: tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ācayo lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ācayalakkhaṇo.
anya-e0104n0:330_9: Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:330_10: Tathā so “ime rūpadhammā”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti āha “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
anya-e0104n0:330_11: Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā “uparicayo upacayo”ti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:331_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhajja vuttāti āha “ākāranānattato”ti,
anya-e0104n0:331_4: Veneyyavasena vibhajjakathane kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0104n0:331_9: Tattha yo āyatanānanti yo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ rūpāyatanānaṃ ādicayattā “ācayo”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:331_12: Yo pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo,
anya-e0104n0:331_14: Atha vā yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo paṭhamabhāvena upalakkhito uppādo,
anya-e0104n0:331_15: so pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo,
anya-e0104n0:332_0: Tattha evaṃ kiṃ kathitanti “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo”tiādinā niddesena kiṃ atthajātaṃ kathitaṃ hoti?
anya-e0104n0:332_2: Ācayupacayasantatiyo hi nibbattibhāvena ācayo evāti āyatanehi ācayādīnaṃ pakāsitattā tehi ācayo kathito.
anya-e0104n0:332_3: Āyatanānaṃ ācayādivacaneneva ācayasabhāvāni uppādadhammāni āyatanānīti ācayena taṃpakatikaṃ āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:333_4: na ca tadā dhammo sabhāvaṃ vijahati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:333_7: “Arūpadhammāna”nti idaṃ tesaṃ jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:334_2: rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya yena bhaṅgena na niccanti aniccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:334_4: Sā pana yasmā ṭhitippattaṃ rūpaṃ vināsabhāvena saṃsīdantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “saṃsīdanarasā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:334_5: Yasmā ca sā rūpadhammānaṃ bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati,
anya-e0104n0:335_1: Ojālakkhaṇoti ettha aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upathambhabalakaro bhūtanissito eko viseso ojā.
anya-e0104n0:335_5: Idaṃ pana savatthukaṃ ojaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:335_6: Bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e0104n0:335_9: Tato eva ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanena imassa kāyassa upathambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n0:336_1: Balarūpantiādīsu imasmiṃ kāye balaṃ nāma atthi,
anya-e0104n0:336_5: tehipi catūhi mahābhūtehi vinā abhāvato upādāyarūpehi bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:336_8: middhaṃ rūpameva na hoti nīvaraṇesu desitattā.
anya-e0104n0:336_14: taṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ “na rūpa”nti? Taṃ na,
anya-e0104n0:336_16: Na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:336_17: tasmā middhassa duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:336_18: Sakkā hi vattuṃ “yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:336_19: tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ middhaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:337_5: Appahātabbañca rūpaṃ “katame dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā?
anya-e0104n0:337_10: Ime dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n0:337_14: taṃ pajahathā”tiādīsu viya kāmacchandādīnaṃ tathā pahānassa anadhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:337_20: niddāhetubhāvato pana taṃ “niddā”ti vibhattaṃ yathā itthiliṅgādi.
anya-e0104n0:337_21: Evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti?
anya-e0104n0:337_24: Sā ca natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyati,
anya-e0104n0:338_0: Niddā ca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana…pe…
anya-e0104n0:338_5: Sakkā paccetuṃ “sakkharakathalikampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tiādi viya appasiddhatāya rūpabhāvassa.
anya-e0104n0:338_6: Siddhe hi tassa rūpabhāve sambhavato yathālābhapaccayo yujjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n0:338_7: Itopi na rūpaṃ middhaṃ āruppesu uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n0:338_8: Vuttampi cetaṃ “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti imassa vibhaṅge
anya-e0104n0:338_9: “āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti vitthāro.
anya-e0104n0:338_10: Tasmā “na middhaṃ rūpa”nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:339_3: So ca atthato rūpadhammānaṃ vikārāvatthāṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu eva siyāti vuttaṃ “rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāgahaṇena gahitamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:339_5: Upādāvatthāya ca aññā jāti nāma nattheva.
anya-e0104n0:339_6: Sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekacciyasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā pavattiākāravisesoti āha “sambhavarūpaṃ āpodhātuggahaṇena gahitamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:339_7: Kāyabalaṃ nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:339_10: Kasmā pana nesaṃ ayathākkamato paṭikkhepo katoti?
anya-e0104n0:339_13: Tadanusārena paṭilomanayena itaresampi abhāvo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:340_2: So ca kho pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevāti anūnatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:341_6: sahetukapaṭiyogibhāvato hetunā saha na uppajjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:341_8: Dhammanānattābhāvepi hi saddatthanānattena veneyyavasena dukantaradesanā hotīti dukapadavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:341_16: Ādisaddena saṃyojanīyaṃ oghanīyaṃ yoganīyaṃ nīvaraṇīyaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ acetasikaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:341_17: narūpāvacaraṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ naapariyāpannaṃ aniyataṃ aniyyānikaṃ aniccanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:342_2: Taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā,
anya-e0104n0:342_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttanayena ajjhattameva ajjhattikaṃ yathā venayikoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattika”nti.
anya-e0104n0:342_17: rūpassa upacayo”tiādinā aggahetvā attano sabhāveneva kakkhaḷattādinā ñāṇena paricchijja gahetabbato.
anya-e0104n0:342_20: Sotādīnampi cakkhuno viya pasannasabhāvattā eva yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇapaccayatāti dassento āha “cakkhādi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:342_23: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ādhipateyyaṃ tesaṃ paṭumandabhāvānuvattanato,
anya-e0104n0:342_27: Kammanibbattañhi “mametaṃ phalaṃ”nti kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti apaṭikkhepato.
anya-e0104n0:343_11: Tassa rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “saha nidassanena sanidassana”nti.
anya-e0104n0:343_12: Dhammabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,
anya-e0104n0:343_13: so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
anya-e0104n0:343_14: Evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. Yo sayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:343_23: Kammato jātanti ettha yaṃ ekantakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhindriyāni,
anya-e0104n0:343_25: yañca navavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ navavidhameva rūpanti evaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhampi kammato uppajjanato kammajaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:343_26: Yañhi jātañca yañca jāyati yañca jāyissati,
anya-e0104n0:343_32: lahutādittayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ pañcadasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ cittajaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:343_35: āhārasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ āhārajaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:343_36: Ettha saddaṃ pakkhipitvā terasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ utujaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:344_4: Yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ adakkhi yaṃ passati yaṃ dakkhissati yaṃ passeyya,
anya-e0104n0:344_5: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma diṭṭhasabhāvānātivattanato yathā duddhanti.
anya-e0104n0:344_9: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattayanti gandho raso phoṭṭhabbanti etaṃ tayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:345_10: Na hi sītaṃ nāma koci guṇo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:345_14: Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhitānaṃ chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti,
anya-e0104n0:345_21: anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya uttarameva.
anya-e0104n0:345_25: ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ sītatā upalabbheyya,
anya-e0104n0:345_30: Te vattabbā “dravabhāvopi phusīyatīti āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:350_0: Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ rūpādisattavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:350_2: Avadhāraṇena rūpāyatanādīnampi manoviññāṇaviññeyyatte niyamābhāvato na viññātarūpatāti saṅkarābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:351_0: Nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāmāti yadettha aṭṭhavīsatividhe rūpe “nipphanna”nti vuttaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:351_4: rūpaguṇayogato vā yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīlaṃ vatthanti.
anya-e0104n0:351_5: Svāyaṃ rūpasaddo ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi pavattatīti aparena rūpasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “rūparūpa”nti yathā tilatelaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:352_3: Tattha hadayarūpaṃ vatthu eva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:352_5: Yathā hi cakkhādīni sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pavattiyā dvāraṃ honti,
anya-e0104n0:352_14: Sesaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato neva vatthu na ca dvāraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:353_2: Nanu ca ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti natthīti?
anya-e0104n0:353_5: Na hi rūpuppatti rūpajanakato aññaṃ paccayaṃ apekkhati.
anya-e0104n0:353_10: Cittato ca ututo ca jātanti kālena cittato,
anya-e0104n0:353_11: kālena ututoti evaṃ cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:354_0: Vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti hi evaṃ pavattamahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānassa saddassa viññattiyā vināpi uppatti icchitabbā.
anya-e0104n0:354_1: Na hi viññatti “kāyavācāya viññattī”ti vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:354_4: na sotaviññeyyo cā”ti viruddhamevetanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0104n0:354_5: Apare pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā tassa adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇenti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0104n0:354_6: “Jivhātālucalanādikaṃ vitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte,
anya-e0104n0:354_7: paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti.
anya-e0104n0:355_0: Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana nakutocijātanti kutocipi paccayato na jātaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:355_1: nāpi sayameva jātaṃ paccayehi vinā sayameva jātassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:355_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ na jāyatīti?
anya-e0104n0:355_4: Uppattimantānaṃ hi rūpāyatanādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjanti,
anya-e0104n0:355_7: Siyā panetaṃ “jātiādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjantī”ti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:356_1: Asati uppāde kuto jarāmaraṇanti mattaggahaṇena jarāmaraṇassa uppādābhāvampi.
anya-e0104n0:356_2: Yadi evaṃ jātiyā kutoci jātatāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:356_3: Tattha kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattāti ye te cittādayo rūpāyatanādīnaṃ rūpānaṃ janakapaccayā,
anya-e0104n0:356_4: tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ yo so paccayabhāvūpalakkhaṇīyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo,
anya-e0104n0:356_5: tadā jāyamānānaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya veneyyapuggalavasena
anya-e0104n0:356_6: jātiyā kutoci paccayato jātattaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ yathā taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatādi viññattiādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:356_9: tesaṃ paccayabhāvūpagamanakkhaṇe upalabbhamānā rūpādayo tato pure,
anya-e0104n0:356_10: pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā tato uppajjantīti viññāyanti,
anya-e0104n0:356_12: Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyato jātiyā kutoci jātatā siddhā,
anya-e0104n0:356_15: Yadi hi dhammo viya upalabbheyya jāti,
anya-e0104n0:357_0: Tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ “ayaṃ jāti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhavo,
anya-e0104n0:357_1: sayañca na kutoci jāyati yathā taṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakatī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:357_2: taṃ nesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento satthā “upacayo santatī”ti dvidhā bhinditvā kutoci paccayato jātañca katvā desesi,
anya-e0104n0:357_3: na pana jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe adassanato.
anya-e0104n0:357_5: Yasmā paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripākabhaṅgatāya tesu santesu honti,
anya-e0104n0:357_9: tasmā taṃ jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya “jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti pariyāyena suttesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:357_10: Yo panettha kāmabhavādīsu kammādinā paccayena yonivibhāgato paṭisandhiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:357_12: so parato paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissatīti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:360_1: Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānadīpakena padadvayena vedayitassa bahubhedataṃ dassento vuccamānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ ulliṅgeti.
anya-e0104n0:360_4: pubbe vā rūpakkhandhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ adhikārato ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:360_5: Ekato katvāti atītādibhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ buddhiyā ekato katvā.
anya-e0104n0:360_8: “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”nti ca ādinā saññuppādavasena jānanaṃ gahaṇaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:360_12: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā.
anya-e0104n0:360_13: Minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya yena sañjānanākāravisiṭṭhena ākārena visayaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n0:360_14: taṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhisaṅkhātaṃ vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:360_15: Itare vedanākkhandhādayo suviññeyyā hontīti viññāṇena ekuppādādibhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:361_0: Attanā “vijānanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:361_3: Dhammasabhāvā vinimutto koci kattā nāma natthīti tasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vijānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:362_2: Sā panāyaṃ jāti kāmaṃ anekavidhā nānappakārā,
anya-e0104n0:362_8: Ārogyaṭṭhenāpi hi kusalaṃ vuccati “kacci nu bhoto kusala”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:363_0: Saddatthato pana kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kammeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_4: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
anya-e0104n0:363_6: Yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti,
anya-e0104n0:363_7: evamidaṃ uppannānuppannavasena ubhayabhāgagataṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati,
anya-e0104n0:363_9: Kucchitānaṃ vā sāvajjadhammānaṃ salanato saṃvaraṇato kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_11: appavattibhāvāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā saṃvutā pihitā honti.
anya-e0104n0:363_12: Kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati kampeti apanetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_13: Kucchitānaṃ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā,
anya-e0104n0:363_15: Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatā,
anya-e0104n0:363_17: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni,
anya-e0104n0:363_21: adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa rūpārūpappabandhassa sampati,
anya-e0104n0:363_22: āyatiñca anudahanena vināsanato kuṃ siyantīti kusā, rāgādayo,
anya-e0104n0:363_23: te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_24: Payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindantīti.
anya-e0104n0:364_2: Na kusalanti hi kusalapaṭikkhepena akusalapadassa avayavabhedena atthe vuccamāne yathā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ na arogaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:364_11: taṃ akusalaṃ nāmāti ayampi attho dassito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:364_12: Ettha ca yasmā kusalaṃ akusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:364_14: tasmā akusalaṃ pana kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti vuttaṃ “kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:365_5: Eteneva arogasarogādibhāvena ca avuttatā vaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:365_6: Ettha ca “kusalaṃ akusala”nti ca vatvā “abyākata”nti vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttatā viññāyati,
anya-e0104n0:365_9: atha kho tadubhayavinimuttasabhāvatāya tesaṃ dhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:366_1: Bhūmibhedatoti bhavanti ettha dhammāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:366_3: Avatthāpi hi avatthāvantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati,
anya-e0104n0:366_9: Kāmāvacaranti ettha vatthukāmo kilesakāmoti dve kāmā.
anya-e0104n0:366_10: Tesu vatthukāmo visesato pañca kāmaguṇā kāmīyantīti,
anya-e0104n0:366_12: Te dvepi sahitā hutvā yattha avacaranti,
anya-e0104n0:366_16: Idaṃ yebhuyyena tattha avacarati pavattatīti kāmāvacaraṃ ekassa avacarasaddassa lopaṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:367_0: Somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedatoti ettha somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā,
anya-e0104n0:367_8: somanassena uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:367_15: Yassa hi catusampatticakkasamāyogādivasena yonisova ābhogo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:367_16: kusalameva ca mayā kattabbanti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:367_17: akusalappavattito ca nivattetvā kusalakaraṇe eva pariṇāmitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:367_19: tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhādisampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:368_4: anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjaṭṭhānāni sikkhāpetīti evamādikaṃ paññāsaṃvattaniyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:368_5: tassa kammūpanissayavasena kusalacittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:368_6: Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa upapattiṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:368_7: Vuttañhetaṃ “tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, dandho,
anya-e0104n0:368_10: atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesabhāgī hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:368_11: Tathā paññādasakapattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:368_16: Attano vā parassa vā samussāhajanitaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkharaṇaṃ saṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:368_18: Tena pana saha saṅkhārena pavattatīti sasaṅkhāraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:368_20: Vippayogoti cettha ñāṇassa abhāvo appavattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:368_23: Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
anya-e0104n0:368_24: Atha vā iṭṭhe ca aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā,
anya-e0104n0:369_0: Evaṃ aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni uddisitvā idāni tesaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yadā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:369_3: Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti ettha aññaggahaṇena saddhābahulatā,
anya-e0104n0:369_9: saddena na kevalaṃ “atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādīnaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:369_12: Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya sampayogassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:369_13: Asaṃsīdantoti silokamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāyaṃ saṃsīdaṃ saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanto,
anya-e0104n0:370_0: Dānādīnīti dānaṃ sīlaṃ yāva diṭṭhijukammanti imāni dānādīni dasa puññāni,
anya-e0104n0:370_1: dānādīnīti vā dānasīlabhāvanāmayāni itaresampi sattannaṃ etthevantogadhattā.
anya-e0104n0:370_9: Sadisampi hi “tadevā”ti voharīyati yathā “sā eva tittirī,
anya-e0104n0:370_11: Imasmiñhi attheti līnassa cittassa ussāhanapayogasaṅkhāte atthe.
anya-e0104n0:370_13: Pubbapayogassāti puññakiriyāyaṃ saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittapayogassa,
anya-e0104n0:370_14: pubbaggahaṇañcettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so saṅkhāro hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:370_16: “Atthi dinna”ntiādi nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā asambhavadassanatthaṃ bāla- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:370_19: Somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:371_1: Tayidaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacaraṃ kusalacittaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:371_2: vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena
anya-e0104n0:371_4: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni cattāri yadā tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ uppādenti,
anya-e0104n0:371_8: Ahetukaṃ pana paṭisandhiṃ tihetukāni na uppādenteva,
anya-e0104n0:371_11: Tihetukā pana paṭisandhi duhetukehi na hotiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:371_13: Aññena pana kammunā “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato
anya-e0104n0:371_15: Imasmiṃ ca pakkhe balavatā paccayena uppannaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:371_17: Ye pana āgamanato ca vipākassa asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhāvaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0104n0:371_20: Evaṃ tidhā phalaṃ dadantañcetaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ upapattiṃ,
anya-e0104n0:371_22: Nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hi yaṃ devabhogasampattisadisaṃ bhogajātaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:371_24: Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhaṃ phalaṃ atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:372_5: Yathā vā taṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhadhā bhijjati,
anya-e0104n0:372_7: idaṃ pana tato aññathā vāti vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti.
anya-e0104n0:372_17: katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “seyyathida”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:372_20: Tayidaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā vuttanayena pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ ālambitvā yathārahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:372_21: hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ panetaṃ yathākkamaṃ brahmapārisajjādīsu soḷasasupi brahmalokesu upapattinipphādakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:373_3: Arūpānaṃ vā yo ārammaṇādikato sampayuttadhammehi yogo yogabhedo,
anya-e0104n0:373_11: ākiñcaññāyatananti imāni ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ uppajjitvā catūsu arūpībrahmalokesu paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyīni.
anya-e0104n0:373_16: Catumaggasampayogatoti sotāpattimaggo yāva arahattamaggoti imehi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogato.
anya-e0104n0:373_17: Catubbidhampi cetaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā nibbānaṃ ālambitvā suññato vimokkho,
anya-e0104n0:374_1: Kāmāvacaramevāti ettha nikāyantariyā rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ kāmāvacaraggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:374_2: Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ pavattivipākaṃ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti dassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:374_10: Ettha hi kāmataṇhāvisayatā “kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ” vuttā yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā “rūpārūpāvacarabhāvassa”.
anya-e0104n0:374_14: evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:375_0: Pariyāpannāti ca paricchedakārikāya taṇhāya paricchijja āpannā,
anya-e0104n0:375_6: Nayidamevaṃ avīciādiekaādasokāsaninnatāya kañci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:375_8: Nikkhepakaṇḍepi “etthāvacarā”ti vacanaṃ avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:377_0: Somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedatoti somanassupekkhābhedato diṭṭhigatabhedato saṅkhārabhedatoti paccekaṃ bhedasaddo yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:377_6: na ettha gantabbavatthu tathā sabhāvanti diṭṭhigataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:378_2: Tāya hi vipallatthacittā sattā “etāvako jīvavisayo yāva indriyagocaro”ti paralokaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi
anya-e0104n0:378_3: kāmesu ādīnavo”ti yathā tathā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjanti. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:378_8: tena te mātaripi mithunaṃ carantī”tiādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ saggamokkhamaggoti evamādikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:379_9: Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotīti evamādike micchāgāhe saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:379_12: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kurūrena.
anya-e0104n0:379_19: saddena parasantakassa vā ayathādhippetatāya yaṃ laddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:380_6: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:380_8: Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:380_10: taṃ mandameva hotīti katvā tathāvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:381_4: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kīdise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
anya-e0104n0:381_7: Aññesu akusalacittesu labbhamānampi uddhaccaṃ visesato ettheva balavaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:381_8: tato eva sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva uddhaccena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasampayutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:381_9: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ idha sarūpato uddhaccaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:382_0: Tayidaṃ dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:382_1: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena yathārahaṃ pāṇātipātādikammapathavasena ceva kammavasena
anya-e0104n0:383_0: Tattha ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ sesaṃ ekādasavidhampi catūsupi apāyesu paṭisandhiṃ deti,
anya-e0104n0:383_3: kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sabbadubbalaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ paṭisandhiṃ deti,
anya-e0104n0:383_4: adhimokkhasabbhāvato tato balavantampi uddhaccasahagataṃ na detīti?
anya-e0104n0:383_6: Idaṃ hi paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ apāyesu dadeyya,
anya-e0104n0:384_1: puthujjanassa uppajjamānaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanappahātabbasahāyasabbhāvato ubhayavipākampi deti,
anya-e0104n0:384_9: paṭṭhāne bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vattabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n0:384_13: evampi tasmiṃ tike tassa navattabbatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n0:384_16: Cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatānaṃ dvādasannaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā vibhajitvā dassetabbassa niyogato kassaci cittuppādassa abhāvā,
anya-e0104n0:384_17: yathā uppannattike atītādīnaṃ navattabbatā na vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:384_19: Atha vā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyassāpi tassa puthujjane vattamānassa bhāvanāya pahātabbasabhāvasāmaññato,
anya-e0104n0:384_20: sāvajjato ca bhāvanāya pahātabbapariyāyo vijjatīti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgadoso.
anya-e0104n0:384_21: Nippariyāyena ca na bhāvanāya pahātabbanti tassa vasena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvopi na vutto.
anya-e0104n0:384_23: na kocipi bhāvo anuppādadhammataṃ tassa āpāditoti ekantena bhāvanāya pahātabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:384_24: Atha vā apāyagamanīyabhāvāpekkhaṃ dassanappahātabbavacananti tadabhāvato taṃ vibhajanaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0104n0:385_3: Aññathā rūpanibbānānampi abyākatabhāvato taṃ catubbidhanti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n0:385_7: Vipākassa hi sahetukatā sahetukakammavasena sijjhamānāpi sampayuttahetuvaseneva vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:385_9: Kasmā pana sahetukassa ahetuko vipāko hotīti?
anya-e0104n0:385_11: Kiñca ārammaṇābhinipātamattesu pañcasu viññāṇesu yathā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati,
anya-e0104n0:385_12: evaṃ mandataramandakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti hetūnaṃ uppattiyā asambhavatopi nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:386_0: Manoviññāṇato uppajjanavisiṭṭhamananakiccānaṃ abhāvato manomattā dhātu manodhātu.
anya-e0104n0:387_0: Cakkhusannissitaṃ hutvā rūpassa vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:387_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena rūpārammaṇaṃ aññaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:387_5: Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:387_8: Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:387_11: ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti “ārammaṇena vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatī”ti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:387_12: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:388_2: rūpaṃ pana anekameva saṃhatanti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:388_3: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:388_6: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:388_9: Yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa paccayo hotīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:388_10: taṃnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā arūpabhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:388_11: atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
anya-e0104n0:388_12: Itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:388_13: Svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”ti ekavacanena niddeso kato.
anya-e0104n0:389_0: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā,
anya-e0104n0:389_1: tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:389_4: tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya yaṃ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa
anya-e0104n0:389_6: Tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhivasena ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
anya-e0104n0:389_7: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:389_11: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti
anya-e0104n0:390_0: Yaṃ pana “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:390_2: Tampi yādisaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:390_6: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇārammaṇā,
anya-e0104n0:390_11: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:390_12: na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti?
anya-e0104n0:390_13: Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ asamatthānaṃ sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato.
anya-e0104n0:390_14: Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:390_15: tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā.
anya-e0104n0:391_2: evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:391_3: Na hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci visesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n0:391_4: Tenāha bhagavā “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:391_5: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gayhatīti vuttaṃ “rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:391_6: Attano anantaraṃ uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ samanantaravigatā arūpadhammā pavattiokāsadānena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi
anya-e0104n0:391_7: upakārakā nissayārammaṇadhammā viya āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya kiriyamanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:392_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādigahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantī gaṇhantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:393_1: tato vā katipayānaṃ vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato,
anya-e0104n0:393_5: “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekanteneva hadayavatthusannissayatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:393_7: Tassā bhedoti tassā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā “duvidhā”ti vuttāya duvidhatāsaṅkhāto bhedo.
anya-e0104n0:393_10: Pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne cāti ettha pañcadvāre sampaṭicchanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ antarāḷaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:393_14: paṭisandhiāvajjanānaṃ tadārammaṇāvajjanānaṃ javanāvajjanānaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānañca antarāḷaṃ bhavaṅgassa,
anya-e0104n0:393_15: tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṃ javanapaṭisandhīnaṃ vā antarāḷaṃ cutiyā ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:394_0: Chasūti ettha pubbe vuttanayeneva vibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:394_1: Kāyassa nissayabhūtānaṃ nātiiṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbabhūtānaṃ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsassa balavabhāvato kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:395_2: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya somanassādibhedatoti yathā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:395_8: Tathā hi kusalaṃ kammadvāravasena pavattati, na idaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:395_10: Uppattidvāravasena pana imassāpi attheva pavattibhedo pañcadvāramanodvāresu mahāvipākānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pavattisambhavato.
anya-e0104n0:395_15: ekaccapavattiākārato ca visadisataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:396_1: Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:396_2: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ āgamanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:396_3: Ekaccānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:396_6: Tesaṃ hi vasena kusalato vipākassa visesābhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:396_7: Nirussāhanti ettha ussāho nāma anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānasantāne vipākuppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhāto byāpāro,
anya-e0104n0:396_9: Kusalesu pana abhiññāvasapavattesupi atthevāti taṃ saussāhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:397_1: alobhādīnampi ekantaanavajjasabhāvānaṃ kāraṇassa tabbidhuratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvoti āha “akusalavipākaṃ ahetukamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:397_3: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasabbhāvato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā,
anya-e0104n0:397_6: aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo atthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekamevāti “sattavidha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:397_7: Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:397_8: na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:398_1: Upekkhā hīnāti ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato upekkhāpi samānā hīnā eva dukkhasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:398_6: Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti.
anya-e0104n0:398_7: Upekkhābhāvo cassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalassa purisassa tena kariyamānabādhāya upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:399_7: Tasmā yathā “mātaraṃ payirupāsatī”ti vutte attano mātaranti avuttampi siddhamevetaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:399_8: evaṃ idhāpīti attano kusalaṃ viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:399_11: Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale labbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:399_21: Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ vipākaṃ deti.
anya-e0104n0:399_22: Kammanimittārammaṇatā ca rūpāvacaravipākassa vuttāti na taṃ aññaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:399_24: Jhānassa ānisaṃsabhūtañca dānādīnaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve paccayalābho viyāti.
anya-e0104n0:400_1: kusalassa ca attheva bhedoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:401_3: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyaṃ aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā “dvidhā pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:401_7: catubbidhameva lokuttaravipākanti sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena chattiṃsavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:402_3: Hotu tāva sekkhānaṃ uppajjamānaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato saphalaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:402_14: kusalākusalaṃ viya kiñci vipākaṃ anuppādetvā kiriyāmattameva hutvā pavattanakaviññāṇanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:402_15: Kasmā panetaṃ vipākaṃ na uppādetīti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n0:402_17: taṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattaṃ anāsevanatāya dubbalabhāvato abījasāmatthiyaṃ viya pupphaṃ aphalameva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:402_18: Yaṃ pana ucchinnabhavamūlāyaṃ santatiyaṃ pavattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:402_19: taṃ samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ viya phaladāyi na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:402_20: Aññassa asambhavato kiriyahetunā nāma alobhādināva bhavitabbanti āha “alobhādikiriyahetuvirahita”nti.
anya-e0104n0:403_1: Ayaṃ pana manoviññāṇato uppannāpi visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvena manomattā dhātūti manodhātu.
anya-e0104n0:403_2: Tathā hesā manoviññāṇassa paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0104n0:403_8: Apubbārammaṇā sakideva pavattamānā sabbathā visayarasaṃ anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:404_2: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasāti pañcadvāre santīraṇena gahitārammaṇaṃ vavatthapentī viya pavattanato voṭṭhabbanarasā,
anya-e0104n0:404_4: Tathābhāvena pañcadvāramanodvāresu yathākkamaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:404_5: Voṭṭhabbanakāle santīraṇakiccānaṃ tissannaṃ ahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ āvajjanakāle yassa kassaci
anya-e0104n0:404_6: bhavaṅgassāti imesaṃ aññatarāpagamo etissā āsannakāraṇanti āha “ahetuka…pe…
anya-e0104n0:405_6: Aññānipi hi dvādasa somanassasahagatāni parittakusalākusalakiriyacittāni yathārahaṃ puthujjanādīnaṃ hasituppādakāni vijjanti,
anya-e0104n0:405_7: idaṃ pana cittaṃ vicāraṇapaññāvirahitaṃ parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānaṃ somanassamattaṃ uppādentaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:405_9: taṃ atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:405_10: kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato vicāretabbanti eke.
anya-e0104n0:405_11: Tattha hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:405_12: anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho.
anya-e0104n0:405_13: Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:405_15: aññathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya.
anya-e0104n0:405_16: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti.
anya-e0104n0:406_0: Ayamettha visesoti ayaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ uppattiyā vipākuppādanasamatthatā,
anya-e0104n0:406_1: arahataṃ uppattiyā tadabhāvoti ubhayesaṃ santāne uppattisamupalakkhito ettha kusalakiriyaviññāṇesu viseso.
anya-e0104n0:406_2: Evañca katvā paccayavekallena avipākassāpi kusalākusalassa kiriyabhāvappasaṅgo nivattito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:406_3: Parato kusalato visesoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:407_1: Sabbānipi kusalākusalabyākatāni ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:407_2: Paṭisandhiviññāṇādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nāma bhavantarapaṭisandhādinā ākārena pavatti eva.
anya-e0104n0:407_3: Tabbinimuttañca cittassa aññaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti āha “cuddasahi ākārehi pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:408_1: Katūpacitaṃ hi kammaṃ avasesapaccayasamavāye vipākaṃ dentaṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ vissajjantaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:408_2: Devamanussesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca.
anya-e0104n0:408_3: Kammakammanimittagatinimittānanti ettha kammaṃ nāma katūpacitaṃ kāmāvacarakusalakammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:409_0: Evaṃ tāvetthāti ettha viññāṇakkhandhaniddese evaṃ saṅkhepato sarūpadassanamatteneva ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:410_0: Taṃ tanti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhiviññāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:410_2: Tassa tassevāti yassa yassa kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:410_16: tathā hidaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgabhāvena pavattanato “bhavaṅga”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:411_2: Mātukucchigatakāle viya hi bahinikkhantakālepi na tāva indriyāni sakiccakāni honti,
anya-e0104n0:411_3: anukkamena pana visadabhāvaṃ pattakāle eva sakiccakāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:411_6: Tameva yogyadesāvaṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ paṭicca ghaṭṭanā paccayaṃ laddhā.
anya-e0104n0:411_8: yena byāpārādivisesapaccayantarasahite cakkhussa visaye vikāruppattivisadisuppattivisayassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvena anuggaho,
anya-e0104n0:411_13: tathā dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyā visadisassa kāraṇabhāvūpagamananti attho.
anya-e0104n0:411_14: Tañhi cittasantānassa purimāvatthāya bhinnāvatthāhetutāya calanaṃ viyāti “calana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:411_15: Visayavisayībhāvasiddhāya dhammatāya ārammaṇassa abhimukhībhāvena pasādassa tāva ghaṭṭanā hotu,
anya-e0104n0:411_16: aññasannissitassa pana bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ kathaṃ hotīti?
anya-e0104n0:411_18: Bheritale ṭhapitāsu sakkharāsu ekissā sakkharāya ghaṭitāya tadaññasakkharāyaṃ ṭhitamakkhikā calanaṃ cettha udāharaṇanti.
anya-e0104n0:411_19: Tadeva rūpanti tadeva bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhūtaṃ āpāthagataṃ rūpāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:411_20: Bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viyāti bhavaṅgasantānaṃ vicchindantī viya.
anya-e0104n0:411_21: Tadārammaṇuppattiyā parato bhavaṅgassa uppajjanato visayaggahaṇaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:411_22: dassanādīsu vattabbesu tāni avatvā manodvārāvajjanassa gahaṇaṃ uddese dvinnaṃ āvajjanānaṃ āvajjanasāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:412_2: tesaṃ “sampaṭicchanāya cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādinā tattha tattha pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0104n0:413_0: “Sace mahantaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ javanapariyosānāya cittappavattiyā vuccamānattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:413_2: tañca uppajjitvā dviticittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā āpāthagamanavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:415_1: Ito aññaṃ manodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ uppajjanakacittaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ evakāraggahaṇaṃ.
