anya-e0104n0:415_5: Yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayanti yaṃ yaṃ javanaṃ rūpāvacarajavanādivasena gotrabhuanantaraṃ uppattiyā laddhapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:416_7: Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukakammanibbattaṃ mahaggatānuttarajavanaṃ anubandhati ajanakattā,
anya-e0104n0:416_9: Yathā gehato bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako janakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:416_12: Tatthāpi na sabbasmā javanā sabbaṃ javanena tadārammaṇassa niyametabbato,
anya-e0104n0:416_17: tathā parittakusalākusalaupekkhāsahagatakiriyajavanānaṃ aññatarānantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aññataraṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:416_21: Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti,
anya-e0104n0:416_23: Taṃ pana paṭisandhidāyinā kammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato visadisampi nibbattetīti.
anya-e0104n0:416_27: Tañhi attano ukkaṭṭhatarassa tadārammaṇassa paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0104n0:416_28: Yo yo paccayo laddho hotīti yathāvuttesu iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu yo yo tadārammaṇassa uppattiyā paccayo samaveto hoti.
anya-e0104n0:417_0: Dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vāti vacanasiliṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ “aṭṭha vā dasa vā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:417_4: mūlabhavaṅgādibhavaṅgasāmaññasabbhāvato ca bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa
anya-e0104n0:417_5: ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti tadārammaṇanti vuccati ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “kāmāvacaraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:417_7: Ettha ca keci “paṭṭhāne ‘kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī’ti vipākadhammadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:417_8: eva anantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vutta”nti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ na icchanti.
anya-e0104n0:417_9: Vipphāravantaṃ hi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati,
anya-e0104n0:417_10: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttikiriyajavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi.
anya-e0104n0:417_11: Tayidaṃ labbhamānassāpi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati,
anya-e0104n0:417_12: yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto.
anya-e0104n0:417_16: gati ca visadisīti nāvāya nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:418_0: Bhavaṅgamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ bhavapariyosānassa idha na adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:418_8: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacittāni viya ekūnavīsatividhameva hoti atthato bhedābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:419_7: Ettha etesu vuttanayena saṃsaramānesu sattesu yo pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti sammāpaṭipattimanvāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:419_8: Tassa arahato niruddhameva hoti cittaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:422_3: Taṃ pana atthato vedanā evāti āha “vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:422_4: Atha vā vedayitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti kappanāsiddhaṃ bhedaṃ nissāya aññapadatthasamāsavasenāpi vedanāva
anya-e0104n0:422_6: Vedayati vedayatīti byāpanicchāvasena vacanaṃ vedanāya savisaye abhiṇhappavattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:422_7: Sabhāvadhammato añño kattā natthīti dassanatthaṃ kattuniddeso.
anya-e0104n0:423_0: “Kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā”ti idaṃ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:423_4: Na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:423_10: Sabhāvabhedatoti sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṃ bhedaṃ aggahetvā kevalaṃ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:424_14: dukkhañca vibhajitvā vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti,
anya-e0104n0:424_18: Yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti,
anya-e0104n0:425_1: sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:425_3: Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā ayokūṭena paharantassa picupiṇḍaṃ atikkamitvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n0:425_6: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ hoti. Aniṭṭhe,
anya-e0104n0:425_14: yathārahaṃ cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena somanassasahagatāni hontīti āha “somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:426_0: Avasesapañcapaññāsāyāti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya.
anya-e0104n0:426_1: Tattha kusalākusalavipākāni iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikappakāni sukhadukkhasampayuttāni bhavituṃ yuttānipi dvinnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:426_2: picupiṇḍānaṃ viya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ ghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa mandabhāvato cakkhādisannissitāni
anya-e0104n0:426_9: Kammavasena vā vipākānubhavanassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu adukkhamasukhabhāvo yutto.
anya-e0104n0:426_10: Sati ca vipākabhūtāya upekkhāya sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāve kammārammaṇavasena kusalavipākāya iṭṭhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:426_12: Avasiṭṭhāni pana sattatiṃsa viññāṇāni cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena upekkhāsampayuttāni hontīti
anya-e0104n0:426_13: evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya viññāṇehi upekkhāya sampayuttatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:427_1: anubhavanañca sabbavedanānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti taṃ paṭiniyatena ārammaṇena niyametvā dassento āha
anya-e0104n0:427_6: Idantu nibbikappakaṃ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha “sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:427_16: so eva assādo tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti kāyikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:429_1: parikappato vā iṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:429_3: yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā iṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa saṃbhuñjanarasaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:429_5: “Passaddhipadaṭṭhāna”nti idaṃ “passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī”ti suttapadaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:430_1: Domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṃ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.
anya-e0104n0:431_1: ārammaṇassa majjhattaṃ vā vedayitaṃ anubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n0:431_3: “Santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ anavajjāya nirāmisāya upekkhāya vasena veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:435_1: tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:435_2: Saññāya pana īdisaṃ natthīti āha “na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n0:436_1: Atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:436_4: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n0:436_5: Tathā hi sā abhiññāṇena sañjānanato paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:436_7: Tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:436_15: nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya saññāya samānaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:436_21: Eteneva samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:439_5: Tattha saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā attano phalaṃ saṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:440_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato niyatā.
anya-e0104n0:440_1: Sarūpena āgatāti evaṃ piṭṭhivattake akatvā pāḷiyā sarūpeneva āgatā.
anya-e0104n0:441_5: Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā viya honti.
anya-e0104n0:441_12: saṅghaṭṭanarasādiko ca hotīti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā tassa sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:441_13: Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:441_14: Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppatti,
anya-e0104n0:441_16: rukkhasākhagge duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa bhīrukapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:441_17: pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ disvā ūrukhambhoti evamādīsu paribyattā hoti.
anya-e0104n0:442_4: Yathā rūpasaddā cakkhusotāni anallīyamānā eva “phusita”ntiādinā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:442_9: vatthārammaṇasannipātena vā sampajjatīti saṅghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso vutto.
anya-e0104n0:442_10: Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇissa pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā,
anya-e0104n0:442_11: evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:442_12: “Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgativasena gahetabbattā āha “tikasannipātasaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:442_13: Tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpo samannāhāro tajjāsamannāhāro.
anya-e0104n0:442_15: āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ visayassa parikkhatatā abhisaṅkhatatā,
anya-e0104n0:442_17: Yathā niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatā,
anya-e0104n0:442_20: Vedanā ca dukkhasallādisabhāvāti vuttaṃ “vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:443_5: Āyūhanarasāya cetanāya pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathāsakaṃ kiccappasutā hontīti sā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:443_6: Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati.
anya-e0104n0:443_9: Sā hi sayaṃ ādarabhūtā sampayuttadhamme ādarayatīti.
anya-e0104n0:444_3: Vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ, ussāho,
anya-e0104n0:444_6: Upatthambhanaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:444_18: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya vicaranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
anya-e0104n0:444_20: pāripūri”nti evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni,
anya-e0104n0:445_1: Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro,
anya-e0104n0:445_2: tañca nesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:445_3: Tampi cassa atthato jīvanamevāti āha “jīvanamattameva vā ta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:446_6: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n0:447_1: Saddahanti etāyāti saddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:447_2: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati puggalo saddahatīti vohāro hoti.
anya-e0104n0:447_7: puggalasseva vā pasādanaṃ anāvilabhāvakaraṇaṃ raso etissāti pasādanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:448_1: Saranti tāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:448_2: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo saratīti vohāro hoti.
anya-e0104n0:448_3: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ saraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:448_7: Aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti visayābhimukhabhāvo, sati.
anya-e0104n0:448_9: sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:449_5: Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:449_6: Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:449_14: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hiriottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:449_20: sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī”ti suttapadaṃ attādhipati,
anya-e0104n0:449_22: so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā”ti ca suttapadāni āharitvā vattabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:450_1: Yasmā lobhapaṭipakkho alobhoti ye dhammā tena sampayuttā,
anya-e0104n0:450_2: taṃsamaṅgino vā sattā tena na lubbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:450_4: atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca hoti,
anya-e0104n0:450_6: Eseva nayoti “na dussanti tenā”tiādinā kārakattayayojanaṃ atidisati.
anya-e0104n0:452_7: Sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtāti sabbesaṃ catubhūmakakusaladhammānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena patiṭṭhābhūtā,
anya-e0104n0:452_9: Yadi hi tesaṃ kusalabhāvo kusalamūlapaṭibaddho siyā,
anya-e0104n0:452_10: evaṃ sati taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:452_11: Na hi te tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti,
anya-e0104n0:452_13: Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:452_16: Tathā sati ahetukacittānaṃ abyākatabhāvo eva na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:453_3: so ca kho vedanādikkhandhattayavasenāti āha “kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:453_4: Tenevāha “tattha katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti?
anya-e0104n0:453_8: tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:453_11: uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:454_2: tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:455_3: Thaddhabhāvanimmaddanato eva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:455_4: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:456_10: Suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti yathā suvaṇṇavisuddhi apagatakāḷakā alaṅkāravikativiniyogakkhamā,
anya-e0104n0:457_6: na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
anya-e0104n0:458_6: asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya”nti evaṃ vuttā tadākārappavattā akusalā khandhā,
anya-e0104n0:458_8: Ettha ca cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva passaddhaṃ, lahu, mudu,
anya-e0104n0:459_4: “chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādīsu vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:459_6: Cetasikassa ca dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ālambanassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
anya-e0104n0:459_11: tadaggena sampayuttānampi hotiyeva ekārammaṇatāya tena tesaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:459_12: Tenevāha “ārammaṇaggahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:459_13: Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchandoti vuccati yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0104n0:460_3: Yathā tathā vā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu,
anya-e0104n0:460_5: saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:460_6: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato ttamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:460_10: Dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa “karissāmi na karissāmī”ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā asaṃsappanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:461_3: Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato,
anya-e0104n0:461_4: tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti.
anya-e0104n0:461_6: Visadisamananti vīthijavanaṃ manaṃ karotīti manasikārasāmaññena vīthijavanapaṭipādake dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:462_0: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:462_2: manasikārassa pana saṃyojanavasena ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:462_4: jotetīti tathājotitaṃ taṃ viññāṇakkhandhe otāretvā dassetuṃ “vīthipaṭipādako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:463_1: Tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā,
anya-e0104n0:463_3: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsinabhāvato “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:463_5: Udāsinabhāvena pavattamānāpi hesā sampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti,
anya-e0104n0:463_6: yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu appamatte pavatteti.
anya-e0104n0:463_15: idaṃ atirekatarakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto,
anya-e0104n0:464_3: Upekkhāti yaṃ upekkhaṃ mettāya saddhiṃ parikappenti,
anya-e0104n0:465_3: Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena kāyaduccaritādito eva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:465_4: Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
anya-e0104n0:466_5: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:467_0: Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti ettha kathaṃ karuṇāmuditāupekkhāsahagate sambhavantīti?
anya-e0104n0:467_2: Appanāppattā eva hi karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagatā na honti,
anya-e0104n0:467_3: tato aññattha pana upekkhāsahagatāpi hontīti ācariyā.
anya-e0104n0:468_2: nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ samucchindanapaṭippassambhanavasenāti mahaggatacittuppādesu viratīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha “ṭhapetvā viratittaya”nti.
anya-e0104n0:468_5: Yadi eva rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha “arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:469_1: Maggaviññāṇeti catubbidhepi maggaviññāṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:469_4: “Vuttanayenā”ti vuttaṃ kiṃ avisesenāti codanāyane taṃ dassento “karuṇāmuditāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:469_6: karuṇāmuditānañca sattārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ tattha sambhavo.
anya-e0104n0:469_7: Maggadhammesu ca pādakādiniyamena kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā,
anya-e0104n0:469_8: na pana virativiraho kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchindanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti niyataviratitā.
anya-e0104n0:470_1: Na hiriyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:470_3: “Ahirikka”nti vattabbe ekassa kakārassa lopaṃ katvā “ahirika”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:470_14: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti,
anya-e0104n0:470_15: salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hotīti evaṃ vuttappaṭipakkhavasena vitthāro veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:471_5: Ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:472_4: Yathā ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:474_1: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:475_2: na mānādīti thinamiddhassa aniyatatā ca ettha dutiyacitte paṭhamākusalato viseso.
anya-e0104n0:476_4: Yasmā tato eva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti,
anya-e0104n0:476_16: Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto.
anya-e0104n0:476_21: tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:477_3: Paṭṭhāne hi “saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”ti ettha catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena,
anya-e0104n0:477_4: tikkhattuṃ paṭighena ca māno vicikicchā bhavarāgoti tayopete sakadāgāmino saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi dasavidhā
anya-e0104n0:477_5: yojanāti dassitāya dasavidhāya yojanāya “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana”nti
anya-e0104n0:477_6: vatvā “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti tathā “mānasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:477_7: avijjāsaṃyojana”nti (paṭṭhā 3.4.1) vatvā “bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti ca evamāgatāhi
anya-e0104n0:477_12: Evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:477_15: Evañca saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā,
anya-e0104n0:477_21: Omānassāpi attānaṃ avaṃ katvā gahaṇampi sampaggahaṇavasenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:477_25: Taṃ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ketuṃ kāmetīti ketukamyaṃ, cittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:477_28: “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattīti so diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ ekacittuppāde na pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:479_7: parassa ca upabhogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabboti sabbena sabbaṃ aggahetabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:481_1: Maccharayogena “maccharī”ti pavattamānaṃ maccharisaddaṃ gahetvā āha “maccharabhāvo macchariya”nti.
anya-e0104n0:481_2: Niruttinayena pana mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu,
anya-e0104n0:481_4: Taṃ macchariyaṃ vuccamānāni lakkhaṇādīni pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:482_2: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:482_7: taṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ pana cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha “kukata”nti gahetvā “tassa bhāvo kukkucca”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:482_9: Yathāpavattassa katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa duccaritasucaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ vippaṭisāro.
anya-e0104n0:482_11: Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti,
anya-e0104n0:482_13: Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n0:482_14: Atha vā katākatākusalakusalānusocane āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:483_0: Aniyatesu issādīsu thinamiddhasambhavova cāti ca-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:484_2: “Nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viyā”ti hi evaṃ vuttacittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho
anya-e0104n0:484_6: na sabbathā vicikicchāya cikicchābhāvatoti tadatthamattaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:484_10: Uddhaccañhi attanā gahitākāre eva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanavasena pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:484_11: Vicikicchā pana yadipi rūpādīsu ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:484_14: aññaṃ nu kho”ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:484_16: Anekaṃsassa ārammaṇe nānāsabhāvassa gahaṇākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti anekaṃsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:485_2: Nanu ca paññattiārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:485_3: Viratiyopi vipākesu na santīti etthāpi nanu kesuci vipākesu viratiyopi santīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevāti hi vutta”nti,
anya-e0104n0:485_4: tena lokiyavipākesu viratiyo na santīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:486_0: Tesanti rūpāvacarādivipākaviññāṇānaṃ. Janetabbajanakasambandhe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:487_5: samānā”ti vatvā tato labbhamānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “manoviññāṇadhātudvaye panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:487_6: Vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti “vīriyantaṃ bala”nti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:488_0: Samucchedaviratīhi eva arahantānaṃ viramanakiccassa niṭṭhitattā kiriyacittesu viratiyo na santīti āha “ṭhapetvā viratiyo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:488_2: mahaggatesu pana tādisopi natthīti āha “sabbākārenapī”ti, dhammato,
anya-e0104n0:492_1: Bhagavatā pana evaṃ khandhā vitthāritāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:492_2: Tasmā imāyapi pāḷiyā vasena khandhānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:492_3: Yaṃ kiñcīti ettha yanti sāmaññena aniyamadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:492_6: santike vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ sabbaṃ byāpetvā gaṇhātīti āha “anavasesapariyādāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:492_7: Evaṃ pana aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ aticca pavattanato atippasaṅgassa
anya-e0104n0:492_8: niyamanatthaṃ rūpanti vuttanti dassento “rūpanti atippasaṅganiyamana”nti āha.
anya-e0104n0:492_12: saddañca ekaṃ padanti gahetvā aniyamekatthadīpanato “padadvayenāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:493_2: saddo vattatīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādisuttavasena viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:493_3: Tathā hi bhaddekarattasuttepi “atītaṃ nānvāgameyyā”tiādinā addhāvaseneva atītādibhāvo vutto. “Tayome,
anya-e0104n0:493_6: Atīto addhā anāgato addhā paccuppanno addhā”ti pana paramatthato paricchijjamāno addhā niruttipathasuttavasena khaṇaparicchinno vutto.
anya-e0104n0:493_14: Tadaññasuttesu pana yebhuyyena cutipaṭisandhiparicchinno atītādiko addhā vuttoti so eva idhāpi “addhāvasenā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:494_3: uṇhaṃ vā sarīre sannipatitaṃ santānavasena pavattamānaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ ekākāraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:494_4: taṃ eko utūti vuccatīti sabhāgautuno anekattā eka-
anya-e0104n0:494_20: Evaṃ utuādīnaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgatāsambhavato taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgo vutto,
anya-e0104n0:494_21: kammassa pana ekabhavanibbattakassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā natthīti taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena
anya-e0104n0:494_27: balavatā kusalena purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhavatīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānampi attheva visabhāgatāti tesampi santativasena atītādivibhāgo sambhavati,
anya-e0104n0:494_28: so pana na sabbakālikoti na gahito.
anya-e0104n0:495_0: Taṃtaṃsamayanti ekamuhuttādiko so so samayo etassāti taṃtaṃsamayaṃ, rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:496_0: Tato pubbeti tato khaṇattayassa pariyāpattito pubbe.
anya-e0104n0:496_13: yasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:496_17: pacchā atīta”nti vacanaṃ addhādīsu viya bhedābhāvato nippariyāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:496_18: Addhādivasena hi aññeva dhammā atītā aññe anāgatā aññe paccuppannā labbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:496_24: addhāpaccuppannādi viya kenaci pariyāyena atītamanāgatanti ca vattabbatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:497_1: Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ajjhattikabāhirabhedaṃ sandhāya “vuttanayo evā”ti vatvā tena aparitussamānena yadipi tattha
anya-e0104n0:497_5: Tathā hi ajjhattikasaddo saparasantānikesu cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu bāhirasaddo viya pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:497_6: ajjhattasaddo pana tassa tassa sattassa sasantānikesveva cakkhurūpādīsu tato aññesu bahiddhāsaddo viya pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:498_9: Yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe,
anya-e0104n0:498_10: evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭhe eva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:500_0: Tattha manāpānipi kānici hatthirūpādīni akusalakammanibbattāni santi,
anya-e0104n0:500_1: na pana tāni tesaṃyeva hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0104n0:500_2: Tassa tasseva hi sattassa attanā katena kusalena nibbattaṃ sukhassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:500_4: Tasmā kammajānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā kammakārakasattassa vasena yojanārahā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:500_5: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:500_6: na ca vuttaṃ “akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:500_7: tena akusalakammajampi sobhanaṃ parasattānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ atthīti anuññātaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0104n0:501_3: tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:501_4: tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hoti.
anya-e0104n0:501_5: Kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa ca iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabbo.
anya-e0104n0:501_6: Hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:501_8: Iṭṭhārammaṇena pana vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:501_9: vipākaṃ pana na sakkā vañcetunti vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:501_11: taṃ rūpādibhāvasāmaññato kāmaguṇasadisatāya taṃsadisesu tabbohārena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:501_13: Kāmaguṇavisabhāgā vā rūpādayo “kāmaguṇā”ti vuttā asive sivoti vohāro viya,
anya-e0104n0:501_14: sabbāni vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni rūpādīni taṇhāvatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā eva.
anya-e0104n0:501_16: Atisayena pana kamanīyattā suttesu kāmaguṇāti iṭṭharūpādīni vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:502_0: Vuttanayamevāti abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha “okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:502_1: Tattha kittakato paṭṭhāya rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma,
anya-e0104n0:502_3: Pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasa hatthā savanūpacāro nāma,
anya-e0104n0:502_6: Tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti,
anya-e0104n0:502_7: santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti,
anya-e0104n0:502_9: Oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti,
anya-e0104n0:502_12: “Upādāyupādāyā”ti pana vuttattā attano rūpaṃ santike nāma,
anya-e0104n0:503_6: dassitaṃ hotī”ti iminā rūpakhandhasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:503_7: Tenevāha “na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:504_0: 498. Rāsibhāvūpagamanena vedanākkhandhādayoti dassitā hontīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:505_1: khaṇādivasena cāti ettha addhāsamayavasena atītādivibhāgassa avacanaṃ sukhādivasena bhinnāya atītādibhāvavacanato.
anya-e0104n0:505_6: tena vedanāsamudāyo addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvena vattabbataṃ arahati samudāyassa tehi paricchinditabbattā,
anya-e0104n0:505_7: vedanekadesā pana gayhamānā santatikhaṇehi paricchedaṃ arahanti tathā paricchinditvā gahetabbato.
anya-e0104n0:505_8: Ekasantatiyaṃ pana sukhādīsu anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0104n0:505_10: avicchedena taduppādakekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:505_11: lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ arahantīti santatikhaṇavaseneva paricchedo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:506_1: Sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ “sāvajjakiriyahetuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:506_16: Vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā,
anya-e0104n0:506_17: saussāhā eva ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre “savipākato” icceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:506_21: abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato.
anya-e0104n0:506_23: Tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:506_32: Kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato nirussāhā vipākā.
anya-e0104n0:507_7: Santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti “yathāyoga”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:507_8: Pākaṭatoti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:508_2: ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:510_3: sukhumā”ti ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:510_5: Jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:510_6: Evaṃ sukhādayopīti ettha akusalā vedanā jātivasena oḷārikā,
anya-e0104n0:510_9: samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:510_10: “Na parāmasitabbo”ti etena jātiādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:510_16: evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo sabbatthā”ti atidisati.
anya-e0104n0:511_0: Idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:511_8: tato asaṅkhārikāti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:512_3: Bhāvanāmayāpīti bhāvanāmayāya bhedanena dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:512_4: Bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:513_0: Sabbo cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha “okāsavasena cāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:513_4: Yathānurūpanti yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:513_6: Vatthuvasenāti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vedanā pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:513_8: Hīnavatthukāti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya oḷārikā.
anya-e0104n0:514_6: dūravipariyāyena santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:514_8: Santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca “sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā”ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:514_10: Sabbavāresūti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu.
anya-e0104n0:517_10: Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti dvīhi ākārehi ñāṇena passitabbato.
anya-e0104n0:518_2: dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ pahānakkamo.
anya-e0104n0:518_6: anupubbapaṇītā bhūmiyo anupubbena vavatthitāti ayaṃ bhūmikkamo.
anya-e0104n0:518_10: Uppattiādivavatthānahetukatāya hi “paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotī”tiādikā desanāpi samānā uppattiādikamabhāveneva vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:518_11: Yathāvuttavavatthānābhāvena pana anekesaṃ vacanānaṃ sahapavattiyā asambhavato yena kenaci pubbāpariyena
anya-e0104n0:518_12: desetabbatāya tena tena adhippāyena desanāmattasseva kamo desanākkamo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:518_17: Sati hi sabbesaṃ pahātabbatāya pahānakkamena nesaṃ desanā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:519_0: Abhedenāti rūpādīnaṃ bhedaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā ekajjhaṃ piṇḍaggahaṇena.
anya-e0104n0:519_2: Samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanenāti rūpato arūpaṃ vivecento rūpārūpasamūhe ghanavinibbhujjanadassanena.
anya-e0104n0:519_3: Cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūtanti ekadesena samudāyabhūtaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n0:519_6: ayaṃ vedanākkhandhoti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ vedanaṃ desesīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:519_10: Saññāya gahitākāre visaye abhisaṅkhārappavattīti āha “saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake”ti.
anya-e0104n0:520_1: Rūpakkhandhe “sāsavaṃ upādāniya”nti vacanaṃ anāsavānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabbhāvato rūpakkhandhassa taṃsabhāvatānivattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:521_0: Anāsavāva khandhesu vuttāti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva- saddo,
anya-e0104n0:521_2: Idha pana visuddhimagge sabbepete khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi.
anya-e0104n0:522_2: Sabhāgasabhāvena hi saṅgayhamānā sabbasaṅkhatā pañcakkhandhā honti.
anya-e0104n0:522_4: Tesu saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ āyūhanarasāya cetanāya balavanti sā “saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:522_5: Aññe ca ruppanādivisesalakkhaṇarahitā phassādayo saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0104n0:522_6: phusanādayo pana sabhāvā visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyā na hontīti dhammasabhāvaññunā tathāgatena phassakkhandhādayo na vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:522_9: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti,
anya-e0104n0:522_10: sabbe te ime eva pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya paṭicca,
anya-e0104n0:522_11: etesaṃ vā aññatara”nti evamādisuttānañca vasena attattaniyagāhassa etapparamatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:522_12: Etena ca vakkhamānasuttavasena ca khandhe eva nissāya parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā ca diṭṭhi uppajjati
anya-e0104n0:522_16: “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādi vacanato aññesañca khandhasaddavacanīyānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ sabbhāvato
anya-e0104n0:523_3: Rāgādisampayuttassa vipariṇāmādidukkhassa itthipurisādiākāragāhikā taṃtaṃsaṅkappamūlabhūtā saññā samuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:523_6: Cittassa aṅgabhūtā cetasikāti viññāṇaṃ gilānūpamaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:523_7: Kuṭṭharogavato siniyhanaṃ tassa bhiyyobhāvāya viya bālassa puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena pavatti vedanādukkhāvahā asappāyasevanasadisī.
anya-e0104n0:524_3: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti āsīvisūpame vadhakāti vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:524_9: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:524_13: “so aniccaṃ rūpaṃ ‘aniccaṃ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā yamakasutte aniccādikāti.
anya-e0104n0:524_14: Yadipi “idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:524_15: bāhullena pana upādānakkhandhānaṃ tadantogadhānaṃ daṭṭhabbatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:525_0: Pheṇapiṇḍo viyātiādīsu rūpādīnaṃ evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādisadisatā daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0104n0:525_3: chiddāvachiddo anekasandhisaṅghaṭito bahūnaṃ pāṇakānaṃ āvāso anupubbūpacito sabbāvatthanipātī avassaṃbhedī,
anya-e0104n0:525_4: evaṃ rūpampi niccasārādivirahato nissāraṃ pheggu viya,
anya-e0104n0:525_6: niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:525_8: bahuchiddaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ anekakimikulāvāsaṃ kalalādivasena anupubbūpacitaṃ kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsupi avatthāsu vinassati,
anya-e0104n0:526_7: udakajallikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca jāyati,
anya-e0104n0:526_12: Yathā hi udakatale bindunipātajanito vāto udakajallikasaṅkhātaṃ udakalasikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā pubbuḷaṃ nāma karoti,
anya-e0104n0:526_13: evaṃ vatthumhi ārammaṇāpāthagamanajanito phasso anupacchinnaṃ kilesajallaṃ sahakārīpaccayabhāvena saṅkaḍḍhitvā vedanaṃ nāma karoti.
anya-e0104n0:526_15: ārammaṇassādanabhūtehi ca nibbattaṃ vaṭṭagataṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:527_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:527_3: Yathā ca marīcikā vipphandamānā sañjātūmivegā viya khāyantī mahājanaṃ vippalambeti,
anya-e0104n0:527_4: evaṃ saññāpi “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādinā ārammaṇe pavattamānā sabhāvamatte aṭṭhatvā “subhaṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:528_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:528_5: Na hi taṃ niccādivasena gahetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:528_10: te pana sabbe samodhānetvā saṅkhārakkhandhoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:529_1: Na hi taṃ gahetvā kiñci atthaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:529_2: ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā amaṇiādimeva maṇiādirūpena dassentī mahājanaṃ vañceti,
anya-e0104n0:530_0: Pañcapi upādānakkhandhā asubhādisabhāvā eva saṃkilesāsucivatthubhāvāditoti asubhādito daṭṭhabbā eva,
anya-e0104n0:530_1: tathāpi katthaci koci viseso sukhaggahaṇīyo hotīti āha “visesato cā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:530_2: Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhānā catuvipallāsappahānakarāti tesaṃ gocarabhāvena rūpakkhandhādīsu asubhādibhāvena daṭṭhabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:531_4: Te hi āyatimpi khandhehi na bādhīyantīti.
anya-e0104n0:532_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānātīti “āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti vacanato ajjhattikarūpe chandarāgaṃ pajahanto
anya-e0104n0:532_1: tassa samudayabhūte kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:532_3: Ajjhattikarūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto tassa paccayabhūtaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhātīti ñātapariññā.
anya-e0104n0:532_4: Tassa ca udayabbayānupassī hotīti tīraṇapariññā ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:532_5: Evaṃ pariññattaye sijjhante ime vipallāsādayo vidhamīyanti evāti āha “asubhe subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:532_9: Na upādiyati na gaṇhati na uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:533_0: “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti vuttattā “vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā paccayabhūte phassāhārepi chandarāgaṃ
anya-e0104n0:533_2: Vedanāya dukkhato dassanena tattha sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:533_3: Sukhatthameva bhavapatthanā hotīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahanto bhavoghaṃ uttarati.
anya-e0104n0:533_6: sabbavedanaṃ dukkhato passanto attano parena apubbaṃ dukkhaṃ uppāditaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:533_8: tato “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādi āghātavatthuppahānato byāpādakāyaganthaṃ bhindati.
anya-e0104n0:533_9: “Sukhabahule sugatibhave suddhī”ti aggahetvā gosīlagovatādīhi suddhiṃ parāmasanto sukhapatthanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n0:533_10: parāmasatīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahantopi sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
anya-e0104n0:534_1: saññā pana taṃsampayuttāti saññāsaṅkhāre anattato passanto manosañcetanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0104n0:534_5: Saññāsaṅkhāre anattāti passanto attadiṭṭhimūlakattā sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ viya sabbadiṭṭhiyopi vidhamatīti dassento “diṭṭhoghaṃ uttarati…pe…
anya-e0104n0:535_0: Viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto aniccānupassanāmukhena tissopi anupassanā ussukkanto tīhipi pariññāhi viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti.
anya-e0104n0:535_1: Visesato panettha anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:535_2: Tattha niccaggāhabāhullato avijjāya viññāṇe ghanagahaṇaṃ hotīti ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā taṃ aniccato passanto avijjoghaṃ uttarati.
anya-e0104n0:535_3: Tato eva avijjāyogena visaṃyutto avijjāsavena anāsavo ca hoti.
anya-e0104n0:535_4: Mohabaleneva sīlabbataparāmasanaṃ hotīti taṃ pajahanto “sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ bhindati.
anya-e0104n0:536_11: assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n0:537_0: Vacanato yathā viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyati,
anya-e0104n0:537_1: evaṃ taṃ aniccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyatīti.
anya-e0104n0:545_5: byañjanaṃ cakkhatī”ti rasasāyanattho atthīti tassa vasena atthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0104n0:545_8: rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”nti vacanato cakkhu rūpaṃ assādeti.
anya-e0104n0:545_9: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve yo “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:545_11: tattheva niruḷhattā cakkhumhi eva cakkhusaddo pavattati gavādīsu gosaddādi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:546_4: Nettassa ca vadantassa viya samavisamavibhāvanameva ācikkhananti katvā āha “vibhāveti cāti attho”ti,
anya-e0104n0:546_5: anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatā ca cakkhati-
anya-e0104n0:546_8: uddarūpaṃ viya ca vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayati rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:546_12: Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:546_15: Udāharīyatīti vuccatīti atthe vacanasaddo eva gahito siyā,
anya-e0104n0:547_0: Sūcayatīti attano vatthuṃ apākaṭaṃ gandhavasena “idaṃ sugandhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:547_4: ambādī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:547_5: Rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitahetumhi āhārarase ninnatāya jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā niruttilakkhaṇena.
anya-e0104n0:547_6: Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti visesena kāyo vutto anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n0:547_7: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesatarasāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n0:547_8: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
anya-e0104n0:547_10: kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti vuttāti tesaṃ uppattiṭṭhānanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:548_1: mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:548_3: taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paricchedavasena jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:548_4: Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti ye visesalakkhaṇena āyatanasaddaparā vattabbā,
anya-e0104n0:548_5: te cakkhādayo tathā vuttāti tato aññe manogocarabhūtā dhammā sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva ekāyatanabhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:548_6: Yathā hi oḷārikavatthārammaṇamananasaṅkhātehi visayavisayībhāvehi purimāni pākaṭāni,
anya-e0104n0:548_7: tathā apākaṭā ca aññe manogocarā na attano sabhāvaṃ na dhārentīti imassa atthassa dīpanattho dhammasaddo.
anya-e0104n0:548_9: Yathā hi rūpādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīhi asādhāraṇato eva yathāsakaṃ sabhāvato viññāyanti,
anya-e0104n0:549_5: Imasmiṃ ca atthe āyatanti etthāti āyatanānīti adhikaraṇattho āyatanasaddo,
anya-e0104n0:549_8: Te hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇesu ayanti gacchanti pavattantīti āyā.
anya-e0104n0:549_9: Vitthārentīti pubbe anuppannattā līnāni apākaṭāni pubbantato uddhaṃ pattharenti pākaṭāni karonti,
anya-e0104n0:549_13: Āyatanaṃ āyatananti āmeḍitavacanaṃ assā samaññāya cakkhādīsu niruḷhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:550_1: Evaṃ avayavabhedavasena āyatanasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyatopi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:551_2: Yattha suvaṇṇaratanādīni nivutthāni viya ākiṇṇāni tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:551_4: evaṃ cittacetasikā cakkhādīsūti te tesaṃ ākaroti dassento āha “cakkhādīsu ca…pe… ākaro”ti.
anya-e0104n0:551_5: Tannissitattāti ettha mano manoviññāṇādīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ nissayapaccayo na hotīti tassa tesaṃ dvārabhāvo nissayabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:551_6: Ahutvā eva paccayasāmaggivasena uppajjantāpi cittacetasikā aneke ekajjhaṃ tattha labbhamānā samosaṭā
anya-e0104n0:551_8: Na hi dhammānaṃ anāgataddhe vijjamānatālesopi atthi.
anya-e0104n0:551_10: Tattheva uppattitoti tesu cakkhādīsu eva uppattito.
anya-e0104n0:551_11: Uppattiyā paccayabhūte cakkhādike uppattiṭṭhānaṃ viya katvā upacāravasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:551_12: Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ nippariyāyato uppattideso nāma atthi.
anya-e0104n0:551_15: Na hi paccayabhāvamantarena rūpadhammānampi ādhārādheyyabhāvo atthi.
anya-e0104n0:552_3: Dhammāyatanapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahubhāvato yebhuyyena ca te bahū eva hutvā kiccakarāti “dhammā ca te āyatanañcā”ti bahuvacananiddeso.
anya-e0104n0:553_0: 513. Tathā tathā lakkhitabbato lakkhīyati etenāti vā lakkhaṇaṃ, sabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:554_2: Tattha dvādasāyatanavinimuttassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvā adhikabhāvato codanā natthi,
anya-e0104n0:554_3: salakkhaṇadhāraṇaṃ pana sabbesaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti ūnacodanā sambhavatīti taṃ dassento āha “cakkhādayopi hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:554_6: na aññatthāti āvajjanassāpi kāraṇabhūtanti katvā vuttaṃ “bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto…pe…
anya-e0104n0:554_9: Satipi asādhāraṇabhāve cakkhādīnaṃ dvārabhāvena gahitattā dhammāyatanena aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:555_2: Yebhuyyena hi cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n0:555_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:555_4: Tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:555_11: visayībhāvena ca ajjhattikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ dasseti,
anya-e0104n0:555_12: tesupi paṭhamaṃ desetabbesu pākaṭattā paṭhamataraṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ desitanti.
anya-e0104n0:556_0: Tato ghānāyatanādīnīti ettha bahupakārattābhāvena cakkhusotehi purimataraṃ adesetabbāni,
anya-e0104n0:556_1: saha vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ekena kamena desetabbānīti ghānādikkamena desitānīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:556_2: Aññathāpi hi desitesu na na sakkā codetuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:556_3: na ca sakkā bodhetabbāni na desetunti.
anya-e0104n0:556_4: Paccuppannārammaṇattā vā cakkhādīni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni ārammaṇato supākaṭānīti,
anya-e0104n0:556_15: Ghānajivhāsupi ghānaṃ sīghataravuttīti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ purato ṭhapitamattassapi bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti.
anya-e0104n0:556_23: Taṃtaṃgocarattā tassa tassa anantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:557_6: bāhirānañca paccayānaṃ bhedena cakkhāyatanaṃ bhinnaṃ visadisaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:557_17: tasmā pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena aṭṭha lokuttaracittāni cattālīsaṃ hontīti tāni ekāsītiyā lokiyacittesu
anya-e0104n0:557_29: Sabhāvanānattabhedatoti sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti evamādiko sabhāvabhedo.
anya-e0104n0:558_1: “Anāgamanato aniggamanato”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:558_2: Pubbantāparantesu avijjamānasarūpattā udayato pubbe kutoci nāgacchanti,
anya-e0104n0:558_3: vayato ca uddhaṃ na katthaci gacchanti,
anya-e0104n0:558_8: tattha byāpāraṃ dassento āha “na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:558_10: Ubhayampi pana īhā ca hoti byāpāro cāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:558_17: channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:558_18: Annapānasahitanti gahite suññagāme yaṃ yadeva bhājanaṃ parāmasīyati,
anya-e0104n0:558_20: evaṃ dhuvādibhāvena gahitāni yoniso upaparikkhiyamānāni rittakāneva etāni dissantīti.
anya-e0104n0:558_22: Cakkhādidvāresu abhijjhādomanassuppādakabhāvena rūpādīni cakkhādīnaṃ abhighātakānīti vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:561_4: cakkhu asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇakāraṇenāyaṃ niddeso yathā bherisaddo,
anya-e0104n0:562_0: Vidahatīti evaṃ evañca tayā pavattitabbanti viniyuñjamānaṃ viya uppādetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:562_1: Vidahatīti ca dhātvattho eva visiṭṭho upasaggena dīpīyatīti vināpi upasaggena dhātūti esa saddo tamatthaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:562_2: Kattukammabhāvakaraṇādhikaraṇesu ca dhātusaddasiddhi hotīti pañcāpi te atthā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:562_8: Yathāsambhavanti ettha keci “lokiyalokuttarāsu dhātūsu yo yo attho sambhavati,
anya-e0104n0:562_13: Kāmaṃ pañcapi atthā cakkhādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ icchitabbā,
anya-e0104n0:562_14: tathāpi cakkhādīsu yassa yassa dhammassa yadā kattuvacanicchā,
anya-e0104n0:563_1: Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyoti etthāpi dhātīti dhātūti padasiddhi veditabbā dhāraṇattho dhā-
anya-e0104n0:563_3: Kattuatthopi cāyaṃ purimena asadiso vidhānadhāraṇatthānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:563_4: Nissattasabhāvamattadhāraṇañca dhātusaddassa padhāno atthoti visuṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n0:563_5: Dhātuyo viya dhātuyoti ettha sīhasaddo viya kesarimhi niruḷhā purise selāvayavesu niruḷho dhātusaddo cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:563_10: Atha vā ñāṇena ñātabbo sabhāvo aviparīto dhātusaddena vuccamāno ñāṇañeyyo,
anya-e0104n0:563_13: visabhāgalakkhaṇāvayavesu rasādīsu niruḷho dhātusaddo tādisesu aññāvayavesu cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:563_14: Rasādīsu viya vā cakkhādīsupi niruḷho eva.
anya-e0104n0:563_15: “Nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacana”nti etena nijjīvamattapadatthe dhātusaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:563_18: so chadhāturo channaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ nijjīvamattānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ samudāyamatto,
anya-e0104n0:563_19: na ettha jīvo vā puriso vā atthīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:564_1: Cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idhekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento āha “hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:564_10: ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dvārabhūtamanovasena vā.
anya-e0104n0:564_11: Dvārabhūtamanopi hi suttesu manodhātūti vuccatīti tassā vā manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:565_1: Sabbāsaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ ābhādhātuādīnaṃ pañcatiṃsāya dhātūnaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n0:565_2: Aparamatthasabhāvassa paramatthasabhāvesu na kadāci antogadhatā atthīti āha “sabhāvato vijjamānāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:566_0: Candābhāsūriyābhādikā vaṇṇanibhā evāti āha “rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātū”ti.
anya-e0104n0:566_1: Rūpādipaṭibaddhāti rāgavatthubhāvena gahetabbākāro subhanimittanti katvā “rūpādayo evā”ti avatvā paṭibaddhavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:566_2: Asatipi rāgavatthubhāve kusalavipākārammaṇaṃ subhadhātūti dutiyo vikappo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:566_5: Tadaññaviññāṇanirodho viya hi viññāṇadhātumanodhātūnaṃ nirodho samāpattibalasiddhoti katvā dhātudvayaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:567_3: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye etasmiṃ avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinne okāse.
anya-e0104n0:567_4: Ogāḷhā hutvā adhobhāge ca okāse carantīti etthāvacarā.
anya-e0104n0:567_5: Aññattha carantāpi yathāvutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannāti ettha pariyāpannā.
anya-e0104n0:568_3: pabbajjato ca paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggādhigamā pavattā sabbepi anavajjadhammā.
anya-e0104n0:569_2: “Nātihīḷitā nātisambhāvitā majjhimā”ti khandhaniddese āgatā hīnadukato eva nīharitvā majjhimā dhātu vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:570_1: tathāpi viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tassa purecārikapacchācārikattā manodhātu gahitāva hotīti āha “viññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n0:570_4: tāsu ca ekekissā nānappakāratāya nānādhātūnaṃ vasena anekadhātu nānādhātu loko vuttoti āha “aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:571_3: Tattha na cakkhādīnaṃ kevalena dhātusaddena sambandho adhippeto vijānanasabhāvassa pabhedavacanato.
anya-e0104n0:571_4: Viññāṇadhātusaddena ca sambandhe kariyamāne dve manogahaṇāni na kātabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:571_10: Tassa viññāṇassa yebhuyyena attavādino tassa ekamekassa attassa advayataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:571_11: niccattañca pavedentīti anekatāniccatāpakāsanaṃ tesaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhananāya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:571_15: Abhidhamme vā suttantabhājanīye vuttā dhātudesanā atisaṅkhepadesanā,
anya-e0104n0:573_5: Vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati vedanādīnaṃ abhinditvā gahaṇato.
anya-e0104n0:575_1: Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā āsevanapaccayenāpi paccayo hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:575_9: yā ca sampayogānantarabhāvādīnaṃ abhāvena ārammaṇakaraṇe yogyā.
anya-e0104n0:575_11: manodvārikā pana vipākāpi tadārammaṇabhūtā ekaccaṃ dhammadhātuṃ ārabbha pavattatīti.
anya-e0104n0:575_12: Atha vā “ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ abhiññādvayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:575_14: lokuttaramanoviññāṇadhātuyā pana ekaccā dhammadhātu ārammaṇapaccayoti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:575_15: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ yathāvuttapaccayadhammato atirekepi paccayadhamme dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:577_5: Ubhayattha ca saṅkhatā dhātuyo sabhāvavivittā anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:577_6: Pubbanto vā sabhāvadhammassa udayo tato pubbe avijjamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:577_8: Tasmā pubbantāparantavivittatoti pākābhāvato viddhaṃsābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:578_0: Bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudātu saddassa viya viññāṇassa nissayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:578_4: So hi acakkabaṇdhopi taṃsadisatāya cakkayaṭṭhītveva vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:578_8: nijjīvānaṃ saddādīnaṃ viya nijjīvānaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ samāyoge nijjīvānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattīti kāraṇaphalānaṃ dhātumattataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:579_0: Purecarānucarā viyāti nijjīvassa kassaci keci nijjīvā purecarānucarā viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:579_1: Manodhātuyeva vā attano khaṇaṃ anativattantī attano khaṇa anativattantānaṃyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ avijjamānāyapi
anya-e0104n0:580_0: Channañhi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anekānantarapaccayābhāvato ekajjhaṃ uppattiabhāvo viya aññamaññānantarapaccayatābhāvato anantaruppattipi natthi.
anya-e0104n0:580_4: tasmā dassanādianantaraṃ savanādīnaṃ abhāvo viya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ na dassanādīni,
anya-e0104n0:580_8: dassanādīnaṃ anantarañca savanādīni na uppajjantīti yuttametaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:580_10: pana santīramaṇassa ca abhinnavisayatāya dassanādianantaraṃ na manāviññāṇadātu hotīti ayuttanti?
anya-e0104n0:580_12: Yadi ca dassanādianantaraṃ kāci viññāṇadhātu uppajjeyya,
anya-e0104n0:580_15: tato ca dassanādikiccavidhuraṃ cintanaṃ manananti manodvārappavattānaṃ mananakiccāpariccāgo viya dassanaviññāṇadhātuyā dassanakiccāpariccāgo āpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:580_16: Tathā tadanantarassāti sabbāyapi dassanaviññāṇabhāvato ca viññāṇakāyā na bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:581_5: Yathā hi manaso nibbisesāvatthā mananamattatāya manodhātu,
anya-e0104n0:581_6: evaṃ dassanassa nibbisesāvatthā dassanamattatāya dassanadhātu siyā.
anya-e0104n0:581_7: Tañca cakkhūviññāṇaṃ rūpavisayanti saddādivisayābhogābhāvato savanaviññāṇādīnaṃ asambhavo.
anya-e0104n0:581_8: Tato ca rūpārammaṇapasutameva viññāṇaṃ siyā manoviññāṇānaṃ viya dassanaviññāṇādīnaṃ samānavatthubhāvappasaṅgato,
anya-e0104n0:581_13: na cassā upekkhāya viya adukkhamasukhatā adassanādiamananatā,
anya-e0104n0:581_15: Mano hi hadayavatthumhi vattamāno aññavatthusannissitānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayaṃ dassetvā nivattamāno aggi viya usumamatte mananamatte ṭhatvā nivattati,
anya-e0104n0:581_16: aññavatthusannissitaviññāṇanirodhe ca uṭṭhahanto aggi viya usumamatte uṭṭhahati.
anya-e0104n0:581_17: Paccayānurūpapavattikāni ca mananamattāni manoviññāṇadhātuyā antāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:581_20: Tasmā abhinipātappaccayapaṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsabalena bhavaṅgalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ calanāvatthaṃ hutvā nivattamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:582_0: Dassanādipi abhinipātamattaṃ dutiyaṃ khaṇaṃ anativattamānaṃ attānuguṇaṃ cintanāmananasamaññāvirahato
anya-e0104n0:582_1: dassanādiabhinipātavisesavicittaṃ cittabhāvādinā samānaṃ cintanādimananamattaṃ aññavatthusmiṃ nibbatteti,
anya-e0104n0:582_2: tasmā vatthukiccehi taṃ manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāpi manodhātu manodvāranikkhamapavesabhūtā ārammaṇantare
anya-e0104n0:582_5: Sā panāyaṃ satipi viññāṇabhāve manaso sambhūya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato dhātubhāvasāmaññena manomattā dhātu manodhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:583_1: saddalopaṃ katvā viññāṇaṭṭhayogato manomattaṃ viññāṇanti manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahopi cassā yujjati eva.
anya-e0104n0:583_2: Aññaviññāṇehi pana dvārārammaṇehi ca visesanatthaṃ “manodhātū”ti vuttāti.
anya-e0104n0:583_4: Dhātuvisesanatthe ca manoviññāṇaggahaṇe viññāṇavisesanaṃ dvārabhūtamanodassanamevāti dvārasamaññārahattā na manodhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:584_2: Āturā viyāti tena āturibhūtā puggalā viya.
anya-e0104n0:584_5: Saññā hi asubhādikampi subhādito sajjānantī āsaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:584_12: Padumaṃ viya dissamānaṃ khuracakkaṃ viya rūpampi itthiādibhāvena dissamānaṃ nānāvidhupaddavaṃ janeti.
anya-e0104n0:585_1: tena yathā araññamakkaṭo kenaci anivārito gahitaṃ ekaṃ rukkhasākhaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n0:585_2: tampi muñcitvā aññanti katthaci anavaṭṭhito paribbhamati,
anya-e0104n0:585_3: evaṃ gahitaṃ ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:585_5: ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatā ca makkaṭasamānatāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:590_4: Tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti cakkhundriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:590_25: ñātānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane aññātāvibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:591_5: Asammasanupagānampi atthibhāvato daṭṭhabbatā idha na gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:592_3: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate maraṇanti amataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:592_5: “Evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato”ti etena pubbabhāgavasenetaṃ indriyaṃ evaṃ voharīyatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:592_9: so aññātāvibhāvo pariniṭṭhitakiccajānanakhīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūto hutvā uppattito “khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:593_3: kiṃ vā liṅgīyatīti? Indaṃ, indo vā.
anya-e0104n0:593_13: te ca dve atthā kamme eva yojetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:593_19: “So taṃ nimittaṃ āsevatī”tiādīsu gocarakaraṇampi āsevanā vuttāti āha “kānici gocarāsevanāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:593_20: Tattha sabbesaṃ gocarikātabbattepi “kānicī”ti vacanaṃ avipassitabbānaṃ bahulaṃ manasikaraṇena anāsevanīyattā.
anya-e0104n0:593_22: “Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato”tiādīsu bhāvanā āsevanāti vuttāti bhāvetabbāni saddhādīni sandhāyāha “kānici bhāvanāsevanāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:594_2: attano attano paccayavasena pavattamāne taṃsahitasantāne aññākārena appavattamānehi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyabhāve ādhipaccaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:594_3: Imasmiṃ ca atthe indanti parimissariyaṃ karonticceva indriyāni.
anya-e0104n0:594_4: Cakkhādīsu dassitena nayena aññesañca jīvitādīnaṃ tadanuvattīsu ādhipaccaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:595_1: tasmā tassa saṅkhārakkhandhakathāyaṃ vibhāvitāni lakkhaṇādīni tesañca veditabbānīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:595_2: Sesāni tattha khandhaniddese lakkhaṇādīhi arūpeneva āgatāni.
anya-e0104n0:596_3: Aññesampi indriyānaṃ attabhāvapariyāpannatāya satipi attabhāvapaññāpanāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīnaṃ sātisayā
anya-e0104n0:596_5: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ itthipurisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyadesanākkamo vuttoti idhāpi “tato jīvitindriya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:596_8: taṃ purimapacchimānaṃ ajjhāttikabāhirānaṃ anupālakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ tesa majjhe vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:596_12: tāva dukkhabhūtānaṃ etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivattīti ñāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:596_13: tena ca cakkhādīnaṃ dukkhānubandhatāya pariññeyyataṃ ñāpeti.
anya-e0104n0:596_16: Tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattāti bhāvanāmaggasampayuttaṃ aññindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:597_6: na evaṃ sesānaṃ koci bhedo atthīti tesaṃ abhedoti bhedābhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:597_9: yathā desitesu bāvīsatiyā indriyesu bhedābhedassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:598_1: Cakkhundriyādīnaṃ satipi purejātādipaccayabhāve indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbameva kiccaṃ kiccanti vuttaṃ tassa anaññasādhāraṇattā,
anya-e0104n0:598_6: Atha vā tikkhamandādisaṅkhātassa ca attākārassa ca anuvattāpanaṃ tikkha…pe…
anya-e0104n0:598_8: Visuṃ attākāraggahaṇena cettha rūpāvabhāsanādikassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:598_9: Cakkhundriyassa hi rūpābhihananayogyatāsaṅkhāte rūpāvabhāsanasāmatthiye asati na kadācipi cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0104n0:598_13: Taṃsampayuttānipi hi indriyāni tabbaseneva hutvā attano attano indriyakiccaṃ sādhenti cetasikabhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:598_16: Sabbattha ca indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbanti adhikāro anuvattatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:598_18: anupatthambhane ca tappaccayānaṃ tappavattane nimittabhāvo anuvidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:599_0: Chādetvā pharitvā uppajjamānā sukhadukkhavedanā sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā ajjottharitvā sayameva pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:599_1: sahajātadhammā ca tassā vasena sukhadukkhabāvappatā viya hontīti āha “yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpana”nti.
anya-e0104n0:599_11: Katasabbakiccassa aññātāvindriyaṃ aññassa kātabbassa abhāvā amatābhimukhameva tabbhāvapaccayo ca hoti,
anya-e0104n0:600_7: phale cāti aññesampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ kasmā na labbhati?
anya-e0104n0:600_8: Paccayādhīnavuttikā hi paccayuppannāti siyā phalahetudhammesu anuvattanānuvattanīyatāti?
anya-e0104n0:600_13: tassā visesanissayo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”ti tāni tāva ādhipaccattaṃ upādāya “cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…manindriya”ntiādito vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:600_14: Svāyaṃ attabhāvo imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti samaññaṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:600_16: ayaṃ so dhammo tesaṃ ṭhitihetūti dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:600_17: Svāyaṃ sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ vedanāpañcakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:600_20: visuddhippattā niṭṭhitakiccāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni tīṇi vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:601_0: Atha vā pavattinivattīnaṃ nissarādidassanattampi etāniyeva vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:601_1: Pavattiyā hi visesato mūlanissayabhūtāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni.
anya-e0104n0:601_3: Tassa uppatti itthipurisindriyehi visabhāgavatthusarāganimittehi yebhuyyena sattakāyassa abhinibbatti.
anya-e0104n0:601_5: sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti mātā ca utunī hoti,
anya-e0104n0:601_15: Evaṃ pavattiyā nissayasamuppādaṭṭhitisambhogadassanattaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ yāva upekkhindriyanti cuddasindriyāni desitāni.
anya-e0104n0:601_18: Vivaṭṭasannissitena hi nibbattitāni saddhādīni pañcindriyāni nivattiyā nissayo.
anya-e0104n0:601_19: Uppādo anaññātaññassāmītindriyena tassa nivattivasena paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n0:604_1: Ariyasaddena visesanaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ saccasaddena uddhiṭṭhānipi ariyasaccāni evāti dassento “saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti āda.
anya-e0104n0:604_4: Ariyasaccesu vā vicāritesu itarānipi atthato vicāritāneva hontīti vipassanāya ca bhūmibhūtāni,
anya-e0104n0:604_5: ariyasaccānevāti ca katvā “saccānī”ti uddharitvāpi “cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:605_2: Sakalañhi sāsanaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthi pavattinivattitadubhayahetusandassanavasena pavattanato.
anya-e0104n0:606_8: Ettha ca pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhassa saraseneva āvibhavanākāro,
anya-e0104n0:606_9: itare yathākkamaṃ samudayamagganirodhadassanehi āvibhavanākārāti ayaṃ catunnampi viseso.
anya-e0104n0:606_10: Tatratrābhinandanavasena byāpitvā ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇaṃ dukkhassa nibbattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ ākārassa byāpanatthattā.
anya-e0104n0:606_15: “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:606_21: sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ sabbasaṅkhatehi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggabhāvatoti nissaranaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:607_6: kilesadukkhasantāpavūpasamane ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:607_7: Visesato vā ālambanādhipatibhūtā maggadhammā honti “maggādhipatino”ti vacanatoti so tesaṃ ākāro ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:607_13: So cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:608_0: 530. Kucchitaṃ khaṃ dukkhaṃ, gārayhaṃ hutvā asāranti attho.
anya-e0104n0:609_1: saddassa ca payoge saṃyogatthassa anupalabbhanato, saṃ-
anya-e0104n0:609_2: saddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanato “saṃyogaṃ dīpetī”ti āha anvayato,
anya-e0104n0:609_4: Uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aya-
anya-e0104n0:609_5: saddo gatiatthe siddho hetusaddoviya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:609_9: Ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi upasaggasaddā sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:610_0: “Abhāvo ettha rodhassāti nirodho”ti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivittabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:610_1: Samadhigate tasmiṃ tadadhigamato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya nivattiyā adhigatattāti.
anya-e0104n0:610_2: Etasmiñca atthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti nirodho icceva padasamāso.
anya-e0104n0:610_7: na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ nirodhasaddaṃ nivattetvā anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:610_8: Etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalūpacāraṃ katvā nirodhapaccayo nirodhoti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:611_1: Nanu ca sā eva dukkhanirodappattīti tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti?
anya-e0104n0:611_5: Sacchi kiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānañhi aññatthābhāvepi puggalasacchikiriyādhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso katoti.
anya-e0104n0:611_6: Atha vā yaṃ dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:612_1: Buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantīti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:612_2: viya bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti purimakālepi āropetvā “buddhādayo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:612_3: Te hi buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti.
anya-e0104n0:612_4: Tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti ettha ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti purimapade uttarapadalopo ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:612_7: tato eva ca aññehi adhigamanīrattā tāni tassa hontīti.
anya-e0104n0:612_8: Ariyabhāvasiddhitopīti ettha ariyasādhakāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti pubbe viya uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:612_9: Ariyāni saccānītipīti ettha avitathabhāvena araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyāni,
anya-e0104n0:612_10: ariyasamaññā vā avisaṃvādake avitathe niruḷhā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:613_4: cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanameva puggalassa santāpanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:613_6: Pavattinivattīsu saṃsāravimokkhesu pavatti hutvā gayhatīti pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:613_8: purimabhavena pacchimabhavo ghaṭito saṃyutto hutvā pavattatīti pabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:613_10: nibbattati dukkhamidaṃ punappuna”nti evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ anupacchedakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:613_14: Kiccanti ca cavanābhāvaṃ kiccamiva katvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:613_20: pavattato ca cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ hutvā gayhatīti vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:614_1: Asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ māyāti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:614_2: Udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānaṃ tucchā.
anya-e0104n0:614_3: Vatthumattampi tassā na dissatīti visaṃvādikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:614_6: tena paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi gahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:614_14: atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttā jātiādikā lokapakati.
anya-e0104n0:614_17: vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:615_0: Dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:615_1: nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya bādhikāti? Na,
anya-e0104n0:615_5: Atha vā jātiādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:615_7: na dukkhappabhavatāti natthi taṇhāya pabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitāya bādhakabhāvapasaṅgo.
anya-e0104n0:615_10: dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāranenāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:616_1: na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:616_2: tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya dukkhahetubhāvo atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacarādikusalehi vinā kāmāvacarādīhi ca taṇhāya dukkhanibbattakattā.
anya-e0104n0:616_6: Tacchaniyyānabhāvattāti dvidhāpi niyāmena taccho niyyānabhāvo etassa,
anya-e0104n0:616_8: na lokiyamaggassa viya vā anekantikatāya atacchoti tacchaniyyānabhāvo, maggo,
anya-e0104n0:616_11: Sabbattha dvidhāpi niyāmena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo vuttoti āha “iti tacchāvipallāsā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:617_2: sambhavante vā atthe vatvā adhippetassa atthassa uddharaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ atthudvāro.
anya-e0104n0:617_14: tassa pana taṃsampāpakassa ca maggassa pajānanā paṭivedho avivādakāraṇanti dvayampi “ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthi,
anya-e0104n0:617_15: yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna”nti imissā gāthāya “sacca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:618_2: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti etena jātiādīnaṃ dukkhaariyasaccabhāve aviparītataṃ dasseti ekanteneva bādhakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:618_4: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti iminā dukkhaariyasaccabhāvassa jātiādīsu niyatataṃ dasseti anaññatthabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:618_6: paññāpane pana sahadhammena ñāpane attano vādassa patiṭṭhāpane samattho natthīti dassetuṃ “ahametaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n0:618_9: Jātiādīnaṃ anaññathatā aññassa ca tatābhūtassa abhāvoyevettha ṭhānābhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:618_13: Tattha pana attabhāvapaṭilābheneva sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti,
anya-e0104n0:619_1: Nibbutikāmena parijānanādīhi aññaṃ kiñci kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ natti,
anya-e0104n0:619_4: Taṇhāya ādīnavadassāvīnaṃ vasena taṇhāvatthuādīnaṃ etaparamatāyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:619_7: bhavattayasaṅkhāte vā dukkhe dosadassāvīnaṃ vasena ālayādīnaṃ eteparamatāyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:620_1: “Oḷārikattā”ti idaṃ jātiādīnaṃ dukkhabhāvassa pacurajanapākaṭatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:620_6: Kāraṇe hi siddhe phalaṃ siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:620_7: “Neva akataṃ āgacchatī”ti ca iminā ahetuvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n0:620_11: “Sahetukena dukkhenā”ti etena dukkhadassanena janitassa saṃvegassa saṃvaḍḍhanamāha.
anya-e0104n0:620_12: Dukkhassa hi sahetukabhāvasavasena balavasaṃvego jāyati yāvāyaṃ hetu,
anya-e0104n0:620_14: Assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhanti saṃvegajātassa assāsaṃ janetuṃ nirodhasaccamāha.
anya-e0104n0:620_15: Nibbinnasaṃsāradukkhassa hi nirodhakathā vuccamānā ativiya ativiya assāsaṃ sañjaneti.
anya-e0104n0:621_1: Ye te jātiādayo dhammā bhagavatā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:621_9: dukkhaggahaṇena vā byādhi ettha hitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:621_10: Paramatthato hi dhātukkhobhapaccayaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ byādhīti.
anya-e0104n0:621_11: Upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “dvādasa dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:621_12: Kāmataṇhābhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā “dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca”nti aññe antogadhabhede anāmasitvā ekarūpena gahitāpi taṇhā sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā,
anya-e0104n0:621_14: diṭṭhivirahitā kevalaṃ kāmassādabhūtā cāti tidhāva bhinditvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:621_15: “Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti maggasaccabhāvena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttāpi sabhāvato bhinnā eva te dhammāti āha “aṭṭha dhammā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:625_2: So hi jāyati ettha yonigatiādivibhāgoti jātīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:625_3: jāyanti ettha sattā samānanvayāti jāti, nikāyo.
anya-e0104n0:625_7: Sampātijātoti ettha jātisaddena labbhamānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanasaṅkhātaṃ jāyanatthaṃ sandhāyāha “pasūtiya”nti,
anya-e0104n0:626_2: mātukucchisaṅkhāto gabbho seyyā etesanti gabbhaseyyakā, aṇḍajā,
anya-e0104n0:628_3: aññāsupi vā duggatīsu pāpakammasamuṭṭhānato sukhasaṃvattaniyakammasamuṭṭhānāsu pana sugatīsu kathanti.
anya-e0104n0:628_5: na hi kāci paṭisandhi dukkhavedanāsampayuttā atthi,
anya-e0104n0:628_6: atha kho dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato”ti dassento “anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:628_7: Adukkhasabhāvampi pariyāyato dukkhanti vuccatīti dukkhasabhāvaṃ dukkhasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “dukkhadukkha”nti yathā rūparūpanti.
anya-e0104n0:629_0: Dukkhuppattihetutoti “ahu vata me, taṃ vata nāhosī”ti cetasikadukkhuppattihetuto.
anya-e0104n0:630_1: taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tebhūmakā saṅkhārā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:631_0: Dukkhadukkhanti dukkhadomassupāyāse vadati. “Jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:633_7: nāpi haritakambalasadisamudusaddalasamotale bhūmibhāgeti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:633_15: Pūtimacchā di sabbaṃ na sadisūpammaṃ tassa vātādivasena ekaccaduggandhāpagamasabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:633_17: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ tato bhiyyopi ekaccānaṃ tatthāvaṭṭhānasambhavato.
anya-e0104n0:633_18: Attano adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitasaṅacitahatthadvayassa ukkuṭikasseva nisīdato samijjanappasāraṇādirahito.
anya-e0104n0:634_5: Taruṇavaṇasadisaṃ ativiya sukhumālaṃ gabbhagataṃ sarīraṃ sītādiappakampi na sahatīti sītanarakūpapannatādi nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:635_2: yena maraṇadukkhena ca aṭṭitā vedanāppattā sattā katipayamāsamattātikkantampi pavattiṃ vissaranti,
anya-e0104n0:644_3: “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti ettha “maraṇa”nti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:645_3: Tamhi passantasseva kassaci anubhavantassa viya mahādukkhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:645_6: Tassa pana kāmaṃ iṭṭhameva ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:645_7: piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:645_8: piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti āha “asahantassa viyogaṃ piyavatthuka”nti.
anya-e0104n0:645_11: “Avisesato”ti vatvāpi “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ parimadditasaṅkhārānaṃ ekaccānaṃ khīṇāsavānampi hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:648_3: Domanassaviseso pana hoti visayavisese pavattiākāravisesasabbhāvatoti taṃ visesaṃ lakkhaṇādito dassetuṃ “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:648_7: ñātibyasanādivisayaṃ kevalaṃ cittasanthāpabhūtaṃ anusocanaṃ sokoti anusocanapaccupaṭṭhānattepi ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:649_3: balavasokābhibhūto maraṇampi pāpuṇātīti āha “samāvahati ca byādhijarāmaraṇabhedana”nti.
anya-e0104n0:655_1: Jātiādīnampi yathārahaṃ dukkhavatthudukkhadukkhatāhi satipi dukkhabhāve kāyassa pīḷanavasena idaṃ savisesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:658_8: Satthaṃ āharantīti attano sarīrassa vijjhanabhedanavasena satthaṃ upanenti.
anya-e0104n0:661_1: Dosoyevāti kāyacittānaṃ āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāroti attho,
anya-e0104n0:661_2: yato bhuso āyāsoti upāyāsoti vuccati yathā bhusamādānaṃ upādānanti.
anya-e0104n0:661_3: Eko dhammoti cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi añño eko cetasikadhammo,
anya-e0104n0:662_1: saha ca yathāpaccayaṃ domanassacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesoti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:662_2: Tattha pāko viyāti rajanādino pacitabbavatthuno pāko viya.
anya-e0104n0:672_1: Icchitālābho nāma yassa kassaci attanā icchitassa vatthuno alābho.
anya-e0104n0:672_3: Matthakappattaṃ pana icchitālābhaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “jātidhammānaṃ sattāna”ntiādinā niddiṭṭhanti tameva dassetuṃ “aho vatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:672_4: Icchāvāti ettha icchāsahito alābhovāti ca vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:675_1: Yaṃ vuttamidhāti idha saccaniddese yaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_2: Avuttanti aññattha dukkhakkhandhabālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu vuttampi idha sarūpato avuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_3: Tañca sabbaṃ ime upādānakkhandhe vinā na labbhatīti tattha khandhasannissayameva dukkhaṃ khandhe vibādhatīti dassetuṃ “indanamiva pāvako”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_9: evaṃ khandhā jātiādidukkhassa vatthūti dassetuṃ “lakkhamivā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_10: Yebhuyyena loke vibādhakā vibādhetabbādhīnā na honti,
anya-e0104n0:675_11: ime pana vibādhetabbādhīnā evāti dassetuṃ “tiṇalatādīnī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_12: Kāmaṃ anādimati saṃsāre ādi nāma kassaci natthi,
anya-e0104n0:675_13: ekabhavaparicchinnassa pana khandhasantānassa vasena vuttaṃ “ādidukkhaṃ jātī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:675_16: Maraṇassa antike āsanne jātaṃ dukkhaṃ māraṇantikadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:678_7: rañjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu apaccakkhāya vuttiyā nandīrāgasahagatā.
anya-e0104n0:678_8: Tāya ca sattā tattha tattha bhavādike kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi nandanti,
anya-e0104n0:678_15: Kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ taṇhābhāveneva ekabhāvaggahaṇena ekattaṃ upanetvā kassacipi sattassa
anya-e0104n0:678_16: kenaci sadisatābhāvato taṃtaṃvicittabhāvajanakakammanipphādanena ativicittasabhāvā sakalassa dukkhassa
anya-e0104n0:679_3: diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ abhivaḍḍhentī dosādayopi kammassa kāraṇaṃ honti,
anya-e0104n0:679_5: kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti,
anya-e0104n0:679_6: tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu sutte abhidhamme ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu
anya-e0104n0:679_7: vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu taṇhāva samudayasaccanti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:682_3: Sati hi padhānahetunirodhe tadaññahetū niruddhāyeva hontīti byādhinimittavūpasamanena byādhivūpasamo
anya-e0104n0:682_5: Na aññathāti yathāvuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:684_1: tattheva attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare,
anya-e0104n0:684_2: tathā buddhānaṃ kāraṇe paṭipatti, na phale.
anya-e0104n0:684_3: Yathā pana sārameyyā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā leḍḍuṃ khādanti,
anya-e0104n0:685_1: Virajjati palujjati chijjati samudayo etenāti virāgo vuccati maggo.
anya-e0104n0:685_2: Virajjanaṃ palujjanaṃ samucchindanaṃ virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:685_5: Anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:685_13: Tattha taṃ āgammāti taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena patvā.
anya-e0104n0:685_14: Taṇhā virajjatīti ariyamaggena accantavirāgavasena taṇhā virajjīyati.
anya-e0104n0:686_2: saccatthadīpane pana vuttaniyāmena tato ānetvā pacchā ṭhapitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:686_3: Tathā hi pubbe vuttānipi lakkhaṇādīni punapi vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:686_4: Saṃsāradukkhato nibbinnamānasassa assāsaṃ karonto viya hotīti assāsakaraṇarasaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:687_13: Tattha yathā cetopariyañāṇalābhino eva ariyā paresaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ jānanti,
anya-e0104n0:687_14: tatthāpi ca arahā eva sabbesaṃ, na sabbe,
anya-e0104n0:687_15: evaṃ nibbānampi sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātasammāpaṭipattibhūtena upāyena upalabbhatīti atthavacanaṃ cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:688_3: Saṃsārato saṃviggamānasā sammāpaṭipattiyā nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti sabbasamayasiddhoyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0104n0:688_12: Tava matena pana nibbānasseva abhāvato vañjhabhāvo āpajjatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:688_16: Yaṃ tayā “abhāvapāpakattā”ti vadantena khandhābhāvo nibbānanti paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ na. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:688_18: Atītānāgatā hi khandhā na santīti tasmiṃ abhāve nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ nāma siyā,
anya-e0104n0:688_21: atha kho vattamānānampīti tiyaddhagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvo nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:688_22: Na hi taṃ ekadesābhāvo bhavituṃ yuttanti vattamānā ce,
anya-e0104n0:688_26: na santi cā”ti vippaṭisiddhametanti āha “na, tesaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n0:689_3: tadā tassa nissayabhūtā khandhā vattamānāti katvā tadā nibbānassa abhāvo siyā.
anya-e0104n0:689_4: Tathā ca sati maggakkhaṇepi nibbānasacchikiriyāya abhāvo āpajjatīti dassento “vattamāna…pe…
anya-e0104n0:689_6: Na mayaṃ sabbesaṃyeva avattamānatāya nibbānaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0104n0:689_11: evaṃ sati ariyamaggassa niratthakatā āpajjati maggakkhaṇato pubbepi tadabhāvasiddhito.
anya-e0104n0:689_13: Tasmā akāraṇametanti yasmā na nibbānassa anupalabbhanīyatā,
anya-e0104n0:689_22: tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā”ti ca kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:690_18: Āgammāti ca sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:690_19: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:690_20: vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādayo khepetīti
anya-e0104n0:690_21: taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:690_23: itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ “arahattassāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:690_24: Arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā.
anya-e0104n0:690_27: Tattha yathā rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti suttassa neyyatthattā.
anya-e0104n0:690_28: Evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti nibbānaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti imassāpi suttassa neyyatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:690_29: Nibbānassa rāgādikkhayamattatāya bahūdosā āpajjantīti dassetuṃ “kiñca bhiyyo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:691_12: añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni,
anya-e0104n0:691_20: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:691_22: antamaso dīpimigamakkaṭādīnampi suviññeyyoti oḷārikaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:691_27: Yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ pavatti na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:691_28: so “ayaṃ nāmā”ti niyametabbo maggaphalañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto natthīti āha “na tādisassa khayassa abhāvato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:692_1: yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā jhānabhāvanāya te vikkhambhetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaṃ upapanno,
anya-e0104n0:692_2: tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā idhāgatopi kāmesu vītarāgova hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto,
anya-e0104n0:692_3: yo ca paṭhamavaye eva rāgādito nibbinno te ca jhānena vikkhambhetvā pacchimavaye arahattaṃ patto,
anya-e0104n0:692_4: tesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ vikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya anuppajjanato nirodhasadisatāya anuppattiyeva nirodho.
anya-e0104n0:693_0: Yadi “khayo”ti vacanato yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ appavatti,
anya-e0104n0:693_2: evaṃ sati “khaye ñāṇa”ntiādīsu “khayo”ti vuttattā taduppattito paṭṭhāya ca rāgādīnaṃ anuppattīti maggassāpi
anya-e0104n0:694_1: evaṃ anuppannāpīti abhāvasāmaññato nirodhasadisatāya anuppatti eva nirodho anuppattinirodho.
anya-e0104n0:694_4: Taṃ itarakhayato visesento “anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:694_5: Anipphannatā pana tassa khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:694_6: Anuppattinirodhakkhayakarassa hi maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ atthato tassa upanissayo viyāti vattabbataṃ labhati.
anya-e0104n0:694_8: Phalūpacārena hi kāraṇaṃ voharīyati yathā “āyu ghataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:695_1: “Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasa”ntiādinā paccavekkhato bhagavato appossukkabhāvāvahanato.
anya-e0104n0:695_5: yena tvaṃ ariyena cakkhunā ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi,
anya-e0104n0:695_6: nibbānaṃ passeyyāsī”ti vacanato ariyena cakkhunā passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:696_1: Yadi nibbānaṃ nāma sabhāvadhammo atthi sattasantānapariyāpanno ca,
anya-e0104n0:696_2: atha kasmā catumahāpathe sabhā viya sabbasādhāraṇā na labbhatīti āha “maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:696_3: “Asukassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle uppanna”nti evaṃ purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:698_5: paṭighātavantatāya kalāpaso vuttiyā padesasambandho ca sabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:699_1: gamanīyato”ti etena nibbānassa ariyānaṃ paccakkhasiddhataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:699_4: Paramatthena nāvijjamānaṃ vijjamānamevāti yathāraddhamatthaṃ nigametvā tadatthasādhanaṃ āgamaṃ dassento “vuttañheta”nti- . ādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:700_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti cattāripi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
anya-e0104n0:700_1: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:700_3: sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:700_5: abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:700_6: Jātabhūtakatabhāvo ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:700_8: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:700_9: tathā na saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti ca asaṅkhatanti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe
anya-e0104n0:700_10: “pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena etaṃ kata”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ kenaci na katanti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:700_12: Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:700_13: Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:701_0: Evamettha satthā paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
anya-e0104n0:701_1: Pavedento ca “ahaṃ dhammissaro dhammassāmī”ti na attano āṇāmattena pavedesi,
