anya-e0104n0:701_2: apica kho pana padaparame anukampamāno yuttitopi pavedesi. Yathāha –
anya-e0104n0:702_3: nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.
anya-e0104n0:702_7: tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:703_2: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:703_3: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
anya-e0104n0:703_4: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesaṃ saṃkilese samucchindanti,
anya-e0104n0:703_5: tenettha sabbassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:703_6: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anugamanavasenapi taṃ dassetvā nigametuṃ “yasmā ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:704_0: Ettha ca yasmā “appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā. Atthi,
anya-e0104n0:704_8: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi “atthi,
anya-e0104n0:704_10: ajāta”nti iminā ca suttapadena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena pakāsito,
anya-e0104n0:704_11: tasmā yadipi kattha apaccakkhakārīnampi sāsane abhippasannānaṃ viññūnaṃ saṃsayo natthiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:705_2: evaṃ sabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:705_9: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
anya-e0104n0:705_12: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa
anya-e0104n0:706_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti evamādi nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
anya-e0104n0:706_4: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
anya-e0104n0:706_7: tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:706_8: Seyyathāpi sīhasaddoti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:707_2: tassa “gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti gambhīrāditā,
anya-e0104n0:707_6: “abyākatā dhammā apaccayādhammā”tiādinā abyākatadhammāditā ca na vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:707_7: Na hi abhāvassa koci sabhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:707_11: Kiñcāyamabhāvo sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbasattasantānagatānaṃ eko vā bhaveyya aneko vā. Yadi eko,
anya-e0104n0:707_14: aññesañca maggānaṃ niratthakatāti na siyā maggabahutā,
anya-e0104n0:707_16: Siyā panevaṃ eko eva so nibbānasaññito kilesābhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:707_19: Evaṃ sati visesato maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:707_20: kilesānaṃ appahānatoti ekopi maggo na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:707_21: Asati ca kilesappahāne dukkhassa anupacchedanato kilesābhāvasacchikiriyā kimatthiyā siyā,
anya-e0104n0:707_22: atha pana maggānaṃ santānagatasaṃyojanattayappahānādipaṭiniyatakiccatāya catūsu maggesu pāṭiyekkaṃ kilesābhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:707_23: Evaṃ sati sabhāvapabhedena vinā na bahubhāvoti so kilesakkhayapariyāyena vutto sabhāvadhammo eva siyā.
anya-e0104n0:708_4: Tathā ca te saṃkilesasaṅkhatatādito kilesasaṅkhatatādiupacārāpi siyuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:708_7: Na ca pahoti upacarito bahubhāvo atthato bahubhāvāya.
anya-e0104n0:708_8: Na hi jalaṃ analanti upacaritaṃ dahati,
anya-e0104n0:708_10: Ekattapañhampi cāyamabhāvo asabhāvatāya na sahatīti na sakkā vattuṃ natthibhāvasāmaññato abhedavohāro yuttarūpoti.
anya-e0104n0:708_11: Ekatte ca pubbe vuttā eva dosā,
anya-e0104n0:708_12: bahubhāve pana sati vuttanayeneva siddhā sabhāvadhammatā.
anya-e0104n0:708_13: Sabhāvadhammattepi ca bahubhāvo viya bhāvaṃ bhāvopi bahubhāvaṃ na byabhicareyyāti nibbānassa bahubhāvapasaṅgo siyāti ce?
anya-e0104n0:708_17: Evaṃ sati sabbesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pathavībhāvāpattito kuto bhāvassa bahubhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:708_18: tasmā lokavohārānaṃ vicittatāya yadipi bahutā bhāvāpekkhā,
anya-e0104n0:708_19: bhāvatā pana na bahutāpekkhāti na bhāvassa sato nibbānassa bahubhāvo “ekā niṭṭhā na puthu niṭṭhā”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n0:709_0: Parinibbutānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbānabhāve sattasantānaniyataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n0:709_3: Tassa ca ekatte na maggabahutā kiccantarassa kattabbassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:709_4: Maggabahubhāvo ca maggehi sacchikātabbe ekasmiṃ dhamme indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:709_5: sacchikiriyāvisesena kilesānaṃ pahānabhedena hotīti nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatte eva siyā.
anya-e0104n0:709_6: Abhāvopi ca kilesānaṃ maggena sakiccakatāya kātabbo eva siyā,
anya-e0104n0:709_10: so ce nibbānaṃ ekeneva maggena sabbakilesānaṃ abhāvo eko abhinno kātabbo āpanno.
anya-e0104n0:709_12: nibbānavisesappasaṅgo ca āpajjeyyāti maggakiccassa ekattena maggabahutā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:709_13: Bahubhāve pana tesaṃ so vuttanayena ekasmiṃ dhamme sacchikiriyāvisesatoti siddhā nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatā.
anya-e0104n0:709_15: “Khaye ñāṇa”nti hi vacanato ariyamaggo khayo nāma.
anya-e0104n0:712_1: Aṭṭha dhammāti “katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti ārabhitvā “sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese āgatā,
anya-e0104n0:712_2: tameva ca pāḷiṃ ānetvā uddesavasena idha ca vuttā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā atthato pakāsitā,
anya-e0104n0:712_5: kimatthiyaṃ pana idha kathananti āha “idha panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:712_6: Tattha “ekakkhaṇe pavattamānāna”nti idaṃ lokiyakusalacittuppādesu viratiyo nānākkhaṇikā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:712_9: Vitthārato maggakathā parato āvi bhavissatīti āha “saṅkhepato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:712_14: vijjāya pana avijjā ujuvipaccanīkadhammoti dassanatthaṃ “avijjānusayasamugghātaka”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:712_18: Maggadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanākāro sātisayaṃ pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhātīti avijjānusayasamugghātakataṃ
anya-e0104n0:713_2: Evañhi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yoginoti imamatthaṃ tathā-
anya-e0104n0:713_6: Appanārasoti nibbānārammaṇe maggacittassa samuppādavasena pavattanato appanākicco.
anya-e0104n0:714_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato cāti vuttappakārāya sammādiṭṭhiyā passato,
anya-e0104n0:714_3: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhabhāvena sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:714_6: sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipi samuṭṭhānasabhāvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:714_7: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:715_6: Imassa hi pavattito paṭṭhāya micchājīvo na pavattatīti.
anya-e0104n0:716_2: Kāyādīsu subhādiākārupadhāraṇavasena pavattā subhasaññādipubbaṅgamā akusalakkhandhā micchāsati,
anya-e0104n0:716_7: “satārakkhena cetasā”ti ca vacanato visesato sati kusalacittassa ārakkhāti āha “satiyā saṃrakkhiyamānacittassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:717_3: atha kho punappunaṃ uppajjanato anu anu bodho anubodho,
anya-e0104n0:717_9: Taṃkiccakaraṇeneva hi pariññeyyādīni viya tānipi tassa pākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:717_10: Vivaṭṭānupassanāya hi saṅkhārehi patilīyamānamānasassa uppajjamānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ dukkhanissaraṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dukkhaṃ paricchindati,
anya-e0104n0:717_13: Ādicco viya pabhāya sammāsaṅkappādīhi saha samuppannaṃ taṃ maggaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0104n0:717_14: na ca saṅkhāre amuñcitvā pavattamānena ñāṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkā nimittapavattehi avuṭṭhitattā.
anya-e0104n0:717_15: Tasmā etāni kiccāni karontaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhādīni vibhāveti tattha sammohanivattanenāti “cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:718_0: Dukkhasamudayampi so passatīti kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n0:718_3: dukkhasamudayampi so passatī”tiādinā ekadassino aññattayadassitāvicāraṇāyaṃ taṃsādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena imassa suttassa ānītattā,
anya-e0104n0:718_5: Aññathā anupubbābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa pacchā adassanato samudayādidassino dukkhādidassitā na yojetabbā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:718_14: yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā,
anya-e0104n0:718_15: sā na hotī”ti vacanato samudayadassanaṃ hetuphalapabandhāvicchedadassanato pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:718_18: sā na hotī”ti vacanato nirodhadassanaṃ hetunirodhā phalanirodhadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:718_27: ahetū appaccayā sattā visujjhantī”tiādikā ahetukadiṭṭhi ca idha akiriyādiṭṭhiggahaṇeneva gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:718_29: Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ samudayaphalassa dukkhassa addhuvādibhāvaṃ passatīti phale vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:719_0: Issaro lokaṃ pavatteti sajjeti nivatteti saṃharatīti issarakāraṇino vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:721_0: Kālo sutte jāgarati, kālo hi duratikkamo”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:722_3: migapakkhisarīsapādīnaṃ vicittatā viya ca sabhāveneva loko sambhoti,
anya-e0104n0:724_0: Yadicchāya sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ, tasmā yādicchakī pajā”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:725_4: arūpaloke nigaṇṭhānaṃ viya ca lokathūpikāyaṃ apavaggo mokkhoti gahaṇaṃ apavaggagāho. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:725_9: Ettha ca padhānassa appavatti mahatādibhāvena apariṇāmo,
anya-e0104n0:725_12: pakati aññā”ti evaṃ pavattapakatipurisantarajānanena attasukhadukkhamohesu avibhāgaggahaṇe kira nivattite vuttanayena padhānaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0104n0:725_18: “Indriyatappanaputtamukhadassanādīhi vinā apavaggo natthī”ti gahetvā tathā pavattanaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogo.
anya-e0104n0:725_19: Anasanakesaluñcanāditapacariyāya naggasīlagosīlakukkurasīlādīhi ca attaparitāpanena mokkho hotīti attakilamatho.
anya-e0104n0:726_0: Svāyaṃ sabbo micchāgāho saccañāṇe sati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgaṇhanto “loke lokappabhave”ti gāthamāhāti.
anya-e0104n0:728_2: Ajjhattikabāhiresu dvādasasu āyatanesu kāmabhavavibhavataṇhāvasena dvādasatikā chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni,
anya-e0104n0:728_3: khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge vā āgatanayena kālavibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:728_7: Vīmaṃsiddhipādādīnaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ satipi kiccanānatte atthato ekattā sammādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahoti sammādiṭṭhimukhena tadantogadhatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:729_3: Appicchatāsantuṭṭhitānaṃ pana bhāve sammāājīvasambhavato tena tesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:729_4: Bhavantarepi jīvitahetupi ariyehi avītikkamanīyattā ariyakantānaṃ sammāvācādisīlānaṃ gahaṇena yena saddhāhatthena tāni gahetabbāni,
anya-e0104n0:729_5: so saddhāhattho gahito eva hotīti tato anaññāni saddhindriyasaddhābalāni tattha antogadhāni vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:729_6: Chando pana saddhānuguṇoti katvā chandiddhipādassāpi tadantogadhatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:729_7: Tesaṃ atthitāyāti saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādānaṃ atthitāya sīlassa atthibhāvato tividhenāpi sīlena te tayopi gahitāti tattha antogadhā.
anya-e0104n0:729_9: “Cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti hi cittamukhena samādhi vuttoti samādhimukhena cittampi vattabbataṃ arahati.
anya-e0104n0:729_10: Cittiddhipādabhāvanāya pana samādhipi adhimatto hotīti vīmaṃsiddhipādādivacanaṃ viya cittiddhipādoti avatvā idha “cittasamādhī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:729_13: sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato samādhiupakārā pītipassaddhiyo,
anya-e0104n0:731_3: Bhārādānamiva tattha tattha bhave uppajjanakavighātassa hetubhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:731_9: Dubbuṭṭhīti ca avassanaṃ vā ativassanaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:733_1: Esa nayo samudayādīsūti atthi cettha samudayo,
anya-e0104n0:733_19: Teneva ariyasaccasaddānapekkhaṃ dukkhasaddaṃ sandhāya maggasampayuttasāmaññaphaladhammānaṃ ādipadasaṅgaho vutto,
anya-e0104n0:734_2: evaṃ ahutvā sabbaṅgayogena dukkhatāya ceva ariyasaccatāya cāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:734_3: “Upādānakkhandhapañcaka”nti vutte taṇhāyapi saṅgaho siyāti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “aññatra taṇhāyā”ti vuttaṃ tassā visuṃ ariyasaccabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:734_8: Itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā samudayo attano phalassa paccayaṭṭhena,
anya-e0104n0:734_9: na pana yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena,
anya-e0104n0:734_12: sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva samudayo,
anya-e0104n0:734_19: Itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā nirodho khaṇanirodhasabbhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:734_20: na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena.
anya-e0104n0:734_21: Sabbākārena pana asaṅkhatā dhātu nirodho ceva ariyasaccañca.
anya-e0104n0:734_26: Itaraṃ pana saccadvayaṃ siyā maggo bhavagāminipaṭipadābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:734_27: na pana yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena,
anya-e0104n0:734_28: sabbākārena pana nirodhagāminipaṭipadā maggo ceva ariyasaccañca.
anya-e0104n0:736_3: kevalaṃ pana tasmiṃ attano paccayehi pavattamāne dukkhaṃ vedetīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:737_0: “Dukkhamevā”ti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “na koci dukkhito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:737_3: Kātabbāpi hi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṃ attano paccayehi tāya pavattamānāya dukkhasaññite dhammappabandhe kiriyaṃ karotīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:737_5: “Maggo atthī”ti vattabbe “maggamatthī”ti okārassa abhāvo katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:738_0: Kilesāsucipaggharaṇaṭṭhena sāsavatā asubhatāti katvā anāsavattā nirodhamaggā subhā eva.
anya-e0104n0:738_3: nirodhassa vā na dukkhādibhāvoti nirodhāvasesattayānaṃ na aññamaññasamaṅgitāti āha “nirodhasuññāni vā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:739_0: Samudaye dukkhassābhāvatoti ponobhavikāya taṇhāya punabbhavassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:739_3: na evaṃ samudayasampayuttampi dukkhaṃ samudayabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti āha “samudaye dukkhassābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:739_5: Yathā avibhattehi vikārehi mahāhaṅkāratammattavisesindriyabhūtavisesehi pakatibhāveneva ṭhitehi pakati sagabbhā icchitā pakativādīhi,
anya-e0104n0:739_6: evaṃ na phalena sagabbho hetūti attho.
anya-e0104n0:739_7: “Dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā”ti etaṃ vivaranto āha “na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphala”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:739_10: bīraṇesu kaṭo dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇuka”ntiādinā idha vuddhivohārajanako avisuṃ siddhānaṃ sambandho samavāyo,
anya-e0104n0:739_11: tena samavāyena kāraṇesu dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇukaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ ekībhūtamiva sambaddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:739_12: tīsu aṇūsu tiaṇukanti evaṃ mahāpathavīmahāudakamahāaggimahāvātakkhandhapariyantaṃ phalaṃ attano kāraṇesu samavetanti samavāyavādino vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:739_13: Evaṃ pana vadantehi aparimāṇesu kāraṇesu mahāparimāṇaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ attano antogadhehi kāraṇehi sagabbhaṃ asuññanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:739_14: Evamidha samavāyābhāvā phale hetu natthīti hetusuññaṃ phalanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:745_3: tassa vūpasamo taṃsantīti katvā tassa yāva pacchimaṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:745_9: Aññathā ekassa sato nibbānassa kuto bhedoti.
anya-e0104n0:746_2: Sīlampi hi samathassa upakārakattā samathaggahaṇena gayhatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:746_3: Atha vā yānadvayassa vasena laddho maggo samatho vipassanāti āgamanavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:746_6: Ekadeso hi padissati avayavabhāvena apadisīyatīti padeso,
anya-e0104n0:746_7: attano samudāyaṃ pati saha padesenāti sappadesoti vuccati yathā “sanidassanā dhammā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:747_0: Sajātitoti samānajātito, vacīduccaritaviratiādibhedesu samānāya sīlajātiyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:748_1: Aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati apilāpanavasena niccalabhāvakaraṇasāmaññato.
anya-e0104n0:748_5: cattāro sammappadhānā samādhiparikkhārā”ti sativāyāmānaṃ samādhissa nimittaparikkhārabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:749_0: Ākoṭentena viyāti “aniccaṃ anicca”ntiādinā paññākiccasadisena kiccena samantato koṭentena viya,
anya-e0104n0:749_2: dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā”tiādinā parivattentena viya ca ādāya ūhitvā dinnameva paññā paṭivijjhati.
anya-e0104n0:749_3: Dvinnaṃ samānakālattepi paccayabhāvena sammāsaṅkappassa purimakālassa viya niddeso kato.
anya-e0104n0:749_6: pubbe pana samādhiupakārakaṃ tadanurūpakiccanti ayamettha viseso.
anya-e0104n0:750_2: abhiññeyya”nti vacanato cattāripi abhimukhaṃ paccakkhato ñātabbāni,
anya-e0104n0:753_5: idamassa kāraṇa”nti yāthāvato ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā gambhīrā.
anya-e0104n0:753_6: Saṇhasukhumadhammattā nirodhamaggā sabhāvato eva gambhīraṭṭhena duravagāhā.
anya-e0104n0:753_7: Teneva uppanne magge natthi nirodhamaggānaṃ anavagāhoti.
anya-e0104n0:753_8: Nibbānampi maggena adhigantabbattā tassa phalanti apadisīyatīti āha “phalāpadesato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:754_0: Iti evaṃ pakārehīti iti vijaññāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:760_4: hetuphaladhammesu pana yathākkamaṃ vavatthitāvāti “paṭiccasamuppādo cevā”tiādinā vibhajja vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:761_2: Svāyamattho iminā suttapadena veditabboti dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādiṃ vatvā paṭiccasamuppanne pana dassetuṃ “jarāmaraṇādayo panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:762_2: Paṭicca paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ nissāya sahitameva uppannanti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:763_0: 571. Etthāti etesu yathāvuttesu suttapadesu. Saṅkhepoti atthasaṅkhepo.
anya-e0104n0:764_2: Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti yāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti,
anya-e0104n0:764_8: atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti ṭhitā eva.
anya-e0104n0:764_10: “ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena adhigato”ti pavedanato ca tathāgato “dhammassāmī”ti vuccati na apubbassa uppādanato.
anya-e0104n0:764_12: Sā eva jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ettha vipallāsābhāvato evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa sabhāvassa,
anya-e0104n0:764_13: hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
anya-e0104n0:765_6: dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo.
anya-e0104n0:765_9: Sā eva dhātu “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti imassa sabhāvassa,
anya-e0104n0:765_10: hetuno vā aññathattābhāvato “na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti viññāyamānassa tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti dhammaniyāmatā.
anya-e0104n0:765_11: Phalassa vā jarāmaraṇassa jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
anya-e0104n0:765_12: Asati asambhavo dhamme niyatatāti dhammaniyāmatāti evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:765_13: Taṃ “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”tiādinā vuttaṃ idappaccayataṃ abhisambujjhati paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati yāthāvato paṭivijjhati.
anya-e0104n0:765_21: vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ hetudhāraṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttānīkaroti.
anya-e0104n0:765_22: Uttānīkaronto tathāpaccakkhabhūtaṃ katvā nigamanavasena passathāti cāha.
anya-e0104n0:767_3: tadaññena ca tassa payojanaṃ natthīti āha “anūnādhikehevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:767_5: etena taṃtaṃphalanipphādanena tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tapparatā tathatāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:767_9: Paccayasāmaggiyañhi sati anuppajjane tassā vitathatā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:767_12: Na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:768_3: na kiñci atthantaraṃ yathā devo eva devatāti.
anya-e0104n0:768_4: Idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho idappaccayatāti samūhatthaṃ tā-
anya-e0104n0:768_6: Nanu ca “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda,
anya-e0104n0:768_8: Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
anya-e0104n0:768_9: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”nti jātisaddapaccayasaddasamānādhikaraṇena kiṃ-
anya-e0104n0:768_10: saddena idaṃsaddassa samānādhikaraṇatādassanato idappaccayasaddassa kammadhārayasamāso dissati,
anya-e0104n0:768_12: aññassa vā paccayato jarāmaraṇasambhavapucchā sambhavati viditabhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:769_0: Sāmivacanasamāse pana samānādhikaraṇatā natthīti na kathañci kammadhārayasamāsasambhavoti?
anya-e0104n0:769_3: “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha pana jarāmaraṇassa paccayamattaparipucchā,
anya-e0104n0:769_8: tattha ca kātabboti na samāsantaradassanaṃ sāmivacanasamāsabādhakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:769_10: Hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti imassatthassa kammadhārayasamāse asambhavato,
anya-e0104n0:769_11: “imassa attano paccayānurūpassa anurūpo paccayo idappaccayo”ti imassa ca atthassa icchitattā.
anya-e0104n0:769_14: so “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha jarāmaraṇaggahaṇeneva gahitoti idaṃ-
anya-e0104n0:769_15: saddo paṭiccasamuppannato abhassitvā aññāsambhavato paccaye avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:769_18: saddassa tato pariccajanakāraṇaṃ natthīti sāmivacanasamāso eva.
anya-e0104n0:769_19: Evampi na idappaccayo eva idappaccayabhāvo bhavituṃ yuttoti idappaccayatāya paṭiccasamuppādatānupapattīti?
anya-e0104n0:770_0: Atha vā pana hotu idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayatāti.
anya-e0104n0:770_1: Bhāvoti cettha avinābhāviphalaṃ pati hetuno satvaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:770_7: Na hi satā aññaṃ vijjamānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:770_11: Na hi taṃ satvaṃ sabhāvaṃ satvato aññattā,
anya-e0104n0:770_12: tasmā sato bhāvo satvanti niddeso na yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:770_17: Asati ca saditiggahaṇaṃ viparītaggāhoti na gahaṇato saṃsiddhi.
anya-e0104n0:770_18: Sadisakappanāyañca māṇavakassa sīhabhāvo viya na asato saṃ-
anya-e0104n0:770_23: tasmā idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayasarūpaṃ sabhāvantarehi vinivattabhāvadassanatthaṃ imassāyanti visesetvā
anya-e0104n0:771_0: Paṭicca samuppajjati etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādoti tassāpi hetuatthabhāvato jātiādipadānaṃ evameva hetubhāvavācakatāya
anya-e0104n0:771_1: hetupadhānatā yojetabbā hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:771_4: tathāgato catūhi vesārajjehi samannāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0104n0:771_7: imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti yāva ‘evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”’ti anena sīhanādasuttena pakāsito evamattho.
anya-e0104n0:771_8: “Kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā kimakkhāyī”ti puṭṭhena āyasmatā assajittherena –
anya-e0104n0:772_0: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha;
anya-e0104n0:775_2: Sammāti aviparītaṃ aniccato aniccassa uppādoti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:775_3: Niccato hi kāraṇato phalassa uppādo viparīto.
anya-e0104n0:775_6: “Uppādo paññāyatī”ti evaṃ vuttasaṅkhatalakkhaṇato añño “paccayato khaṇato”ti ettha vuttapaccayalakkhaṇo eko ākāro uppādoti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:775_7: Yaṃ sandhāya te “jātiādīnaṃ hetavo jātiādayo”ti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:775_16: Ayameva hi attho heṭṭhā dassito idānipi dassīyati.
anya-e0104n0:775_22: Paccayākāradassanenāti yenākārena paccayadhammo paccayuppannassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:775_27: Vedanānaṃyeva hi paccayaṃ passantena vuttavihāro paṭiccasamuppādassa ekadesameva passato vihāroti katvā padesavihāro jāto,
anya-e0104n0:776_8: Yathā hi atītahetupañcakasannissayena etarahiphalapañcakaṃ viya hetupañcakampi hoti,
anya-e0104n0:777_1: Ekattanayādayo nayā sabhāvadhammesu labbhamānato uppādamatte kathañcipi na labbheyyunti āha “nayacatukkaṃ uppādamatte natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:778_1: Samāne kattarīti ekasmiṃyeva kattari uppajjanakiriyāya yo kattā,
anya-e0104n0:778_5: “Pubbakāle”ti idañca tvāsaddantānaṃ padānaṃ yebhuyyena purimakālakiriyāya dīpanato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:778_8: Atha vā kāmañcettha ubhinnaṃ kiriyānaṃ samakālatā uppajjanakiriyāya pubbe paccayanakiriyāya asambhavato,
anya-e0104n0:778_9: tathāpi phalakiriyāya hetukiriyā purimakālo viya voharituṃ yuttā.
anya-e0104n0:778_10: Evamettha hetuphalavavatthānaṃ supākaṭaṃ hotīti upacārasiddhaṃ purimakālaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “pubbakāle”ti.
anya-e0104n0:778_12: Paṭiccasamuppādoti hi ettha vākyatthāvabodho idha atthasiddhīti adhippeto.
anya-e0104n0:778_13: Payujjamāno paṭiccasaddo uppādasaddena vuccamānassa samānassa “kattu abhāvato”ti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:778_14: Ayañhettha attho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādīsu paccayanakiriyāya,
anya-e0104n0:778_15: uppajjanakiriyāya ca viññāṇameva kattāti samānakattukatā labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:779_0: “Paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha pana uppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanatāya kiriyāva vuttāti samānakattulakkhaṇo saddappayogo na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0104n0:779_9: Na hi hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaññeyyaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vacane akkharacintakānaṃ vippalāpo avasaraṃ labhati. Labhatu,
anya-e0104n0:779_12: Evampi na ca kiñci atthaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0104n0:779_15: tasmā dasadāḷimādivākyāni viya asambandhatthatāya niratthakaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:780_1: vijjatī”ti evarūpāni kiriyāpadāni ānetvā sambandhitabbānīti ñāyaṃ sandhāyāha “hotisaddena saddhiṃ yojayissāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:780_9: Yogaṃ na gacchati tathā sambandhavasena avuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:780_10: “Na ca uppādo hotī”ti idaṃ asabhāvadhammattā uppādassa nibbattilakkhaṇāyogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:780_12: evaṃ uppādassa vināso viya uppādopi natthi.
anya-e0104n0:780_20: Evaṃ dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo pātubhāvo sambhavatīti ayañhettha attho,
anya-e0104n0:780_21: idha pana paṭiccasamuppādo hotīti tassa atthibhāvacodanāti katvā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:780_22: jāyatīti nibbatticodanā katā siyāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ “na uppādo hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:781_4: Ko pana so bhāvoti āha “bhāvo ca nāmā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:781_7: tasmiṃ avijjādīnaṃ pavattiākāravisese vikāre paṭiccasamuppādoti ayaṃ samaññāti.
anya-e0104n0:782_2: Samuppādapadhānavacanaviññeyyo sasattiko hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ aññattha
anya-e0104n0:782_3: samuppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanassa dassanato tathā idhāpi byañjanacchāyāya uppādoyevāyaṃ vutto,
anya-e0104n0:782_5: sā imassa paṭiccasamuppādapadassa evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena atthaṃ gahetvā vūpasametabbā vinodetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:783_1: yasmā attano paccayavasena pavatto paccayuppannadhammasamūho paccetabbato paṭicco ca so saha uppajjanato samuppādo ca,
anya-e0104n0:783_2: paṭicca vā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ apaccakkhāya saha uppajjanato evāti ca evaṃ dvedhā “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:783_3: tasmā tassa paccayadhammopi phalūpacārena paṭiccasamuppādo icceva vuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:784_7: Saha uppajjati ekekassa kadācipi uppattiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:784_10: Saha uppajjatīti ekajjhaṃ uppajjati antamaso aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n0:784_12: attano paccayabhūtadhammasamudāyena kenaci na vināti attho.
anya-e0104n0:784_21: āyu ghata”nti ca paccayo phalavohārena vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:785_6: ko vā itoti codanattaye pacchimaṃ vissajjento “hetusamūho”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:785_7: Tasmiñhi vissaṭṭhe hetusamūho nāma paccayasāmaggīti tattha aññamaññassa paṭimukhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:786_1: Kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti avijjāva paccayabhāvena vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:786_2: tathāpi na avijjā ekāva paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:786_5: taṇhupādānādayo ca dhammā yathārahaṃ saṅkhāruppādane avijjāya sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hontiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:786_6: Evaṃ saṅkhārādayopi viññāṇādīnanti āha “avijjādiekekahetusīsena niddiṭṭho hetusamūho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:786_7: Sādhāraṇaphalanipphādakaṭṭhenāti taṃsamūhapariyāpannānaṃ hetudhammānaṃ sādhāraṇassa phalassa nibbattakabhāvena.
anya-e0104n0:786_11: sabbesaṃ tesaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ aññamaññāpekkhā natthīti paṭimukhagamanābhāvato paṭiccattho na paripūreyyāti.
anya-e0104n0:786_16: na hetudhammānaṃ viya aññamaññāpekkhāti āha “aññamaññaṃ avinibbhogavuttidhamme”ti avinibbhogaggahaṇañcettha rūpadhammānampi saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:787_9: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti muninā bhagavatā bhāsitāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:787_10: Na apaṭicca paṭiccevāti avadhāraṇatthaṃ dassento gāthāyaṃ eva-
anya-e0104n0:789_4: Sassatasahacaritā hi vādāpi sassatādayoti vuccanti yathā “dukkhadesanā dukkha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:790_5: Pakati aṇukālādivasena loko pavattatīti evaṃ pavatto visamahetuvādo.
anya-e0104n0:790_7: Ahetuvādaggahaṇeneva cettha sabhāvaniyati yadicchāvādānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:790_8: Keci pana “cakkhu eva cakkhussa kāraṇa”nti evamādiko visamahetuvādo.
anya-e0104n0:790_13: Paridīpanassa pana aviparītakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paccayasāmaggiyaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:790_15: “Purimapurimapaccayavasenā”ti iminā avicchedavasena pavattamānaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhinivattakaṃ hetuphalapabandhaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:790_17: Ucchedābhāvakathaneneva cettha ucchedavādassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:791_0: Tassā tassā paccayasāmaggiyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ hetupaccayasamavāye.
anya-e0104n0:791_2: Tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ sambhavato uppajjanato sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antadvayaṃ anupaggamma
anya-e0104n0:791_3: yathāsakaṃ paccayehi anurūpaphaluppatti idha majjhimapaṭipadāti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n0:791_6: bhinnakālattā ca so karoti so paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:791_10: tattheva tassa phalassa nibbattanato añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:791_19: Viddasuno pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ jānantassa tathā tathā pavattamāne dhamme upādāya paññattimattato tattha
anya-e0104n0:791_25: udāhu vedanādayo”ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā lokasamaññāvaseneva lokiyehi viya lokiyo attho samaññaṃ avilaṅghantena voharitabbo.
anya-e0104n0:792_5: Paccayadhammo hi attano phalaṃ uppādento sampuṇṇameva uppādeti,
anya-e0104n0:792_10: Iti paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0104n0:792_11: Atha vā paṭicca paṭimukhaṃ itvā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā sahite uppādetīti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0104n0:792_12: Paṭimukhagamanañca paccayassa kāraṇasāmaggiyā aṅgabhāvena phalassa uppādanameva.
anya-e0104n0:792_13: Appaṭikkhipitvāti ca na vinā tāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā,
anya-e0104n0:792_14: aṅgabhāvaṃ agantvā sayameva na uppādetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:792_17: Ubhayenāpi “ekaṃ na ekato”tiādinā parato vuccamāno sāsananayo dīpito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:793_0: Atha vā paṭicca paccetabbaṃ paccayaṃ paṭigantvā na vinā tena sambandhassa uppādo paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0104n0:793_1: Paṭiccasamuppādoti cettha samuppādappadhānavacanaviññeyyo sasattiko hetūti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:793_2: Tattha “paṭiccā”ti vutte kiṃ paṭiccāti vattabbanti āha “paccetabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:793_10: nirodhato cāti ayaṃ paccayaṭṭhiti paṭiccasaddassa attho.
anya-e0104n0:793_11: Tenāyaṃ paṭiccasaddo yathā “imasmiṃ sati imassuppādo”ti ete saddā bhummanissakkavacanajotanīyena idaṃ-
anya-e0104n0:793_12: saddavacanīyassa hetumato hetuāyattabhāvena bhāvuppāduttarakiriyāpekkhena yāyassa tadāyattatā,
anya-e0104n0:793_22: Sambandhassāti ca saṃyojanānurūpatāvasena jātiādinā sambandhassa jarāmaraṇādipaccayuppannassa.
anya-e0104n0:797_1: sā ca bhedānupalakkhaṇā kehici na lakkhīyati.
anya-e0104n0:797_3: ṭhatvā kathetī”ti ca samānakālatāyapi ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā sambhāvetuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:797_9: Abhighātabhūtasahajātāya pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā ettha labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:797_11: Purimatāvacanicchāvaseneva pana lakkhaṇahetukiriyānaṃ lakkhaṇahetubhāvavacanicchāti lakkhaṇabhāvato purimakālo
anya-e0104n0:797_16: Idha pana tadabhāvato na yuttanti ce?
anya-e0104n0:797_19: Jarāmaraṇādiko kattā attheva “ñatvā kiriyato vaya”nti evamādipayogadassanato avassaṃ anumiyamānena kattunā īdiso saddapayogo icchitabbo.
anya-e0104n0:797_20: Asamāne pana kattari “pisācaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:797_21: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti evamādi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:797_25: paccayassa uppādā”ti paccayanassa samuppādahetutāya gamako samānassa kattu abhāvepi paṭicca-
anya-e0104n0:797_31: saddavibhāvitānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paṭiccasaddavibhāvito sasattiko hetu adhippeto,
anya-e0104n0:798_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ samuppādapadhānena vacanena samuppādassa hetu veditabbo,
anya-e0104n0:798_1: na pana sahetuko samuppādo evāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n0:798_2: diṭṭhassa dukkhassa yo paccayo paccayaniddesena tassa vibhāvitattā. Kathaṃ? Yathāha –
anya-e0104n0:799_2: bhikkhu parivīmaṃsamāno parivīmaṃsati ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:799_3: idaṃ nu kho dukkhaṃ kiṃ nidānaṃ kiṃ samudayaṃ kiṃ jātikaṃ kiṃ pabhavaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:799_6: So parivīmaṃsamāno evaṃ pajānāti ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n0:801_2: sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi ‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
anya-e0104n0:801_3: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
anya-e0104n0:801_4: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti…pe…
anya-e0104n0:801_7: yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:802_3: so pavedetabboti paṭiccasamuppādasaddo yaṃ yadidaṃ samuppādasaddavibhāvitaṃ diṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:802_7: pavedetuñca icchitabhāvena padhānassāpi kenaci visesena ñātabbatāya appadhānabhāvena niddeso yathā “ko sotāpanno,
anya-e0104n0:802_11: evamidhāpi paccayapaccayanapavedanaṭṭhena niddese sattivisesena attano phalena paccanīyatāya ñātabbabhāvena “paṭiccā”ti pariyāyena paccayo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:803_1: so ca sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa mūlato paṭṭhāya paccayānaṃ pavedanāya niddiṭṭhoti pariyosānepi “evametassa
anya-e0104n0:803_3: saddena samugghātaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā tassa yathāvutte paccaye taṃsamudayābhimukhe katvā nigamitā paccayā.
anya-e0104n0:803_8: Na ca paṭiccasamuppannabhāvena gahitaṃ dukkhaṃ micchāpaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:803_11: pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī”ti aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanatthattā desanāya sammāsamādhipadhānehi saddehi aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:803_12: evamidhāpi samuppādapadhānena saddena paccayapaṭivedanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:804_8: Te hi satthārā venayikādibhāvaṃ vibhajja vuttaṃ anuvadanti,
anya-e0104n0:804_12: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādīnaṃ ṭhapanīyānaṃ ṭhapanato,
anya-e0104n0:804_15: na pana ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyādike tayo pañhe apanetvā vibhajjabyākaraṇīyameva vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:804_17: Vibhajjavādino vā bhagavato parisā vibhajjavādimaṇḍalantipi vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:804_18: vibhajja vā sassatucchede ubho ante anupagamma majjhimapaṭipadābhūtassa paṭiccasamuppādassa desanato bhagavā,
anya-e0104n0:805_2: Na hi sayaṃ avibhajjavādī samāno vibhajjavādīnaṃ antare ṭhānamattena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:805_4: Avijjā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānampi hetu paccayo hotīti vadanto,
anya-e0104n0:805_5: kathāvatthumhi paṭikkhitte puggalavādādike ca vadanto sakasamayaṃ vokkamati nāma,
anya-e0104n0:805_8: “Idampi suttaṃ gahetabba”nti parasamayaṃ asampiṇḍentenāti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:805_10: yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”ntiādīni vadanto suttaṃ paṭibāhati nāma,
anya-e0104n0:805_13: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0104n0:805_15: supinante kato vītikkamo āpattikaro hotī”ti ca evamādiṃ vadanto vinayaṃ paṭilometi nāma,
anya-e0104n0:806_5: Yathā eke “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti suttapadassa atthaṃ micchā
anya-e0104n0:806_7: evaṃ adīpetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attano phalaṃ pati kāraṇassa vavatthitasabhāvaṃ dīpentena.
anya-e0104n0:806_8: Yathā ca eke “anirodhaṃ anuppāda”ntiādinā paṭiccasamuppādassa atthaṃ micchā gāhenti,
anya-e0104n0:806_9: evaṃ gāhe akatvā vuttanayeneva aviparītaṃ atthaṃ saṅgāhentena.
anya-e0104n0:806_10: “Dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ avijjā”ti vuttamatthaṃ parivattetvā puna “pubbante aññāṇa”ntiādīhi aparehipi pariyāyehi niddisantena.
anya-e0104n0:806_12: taṇhā iminā pariyāyena upādāna”ntiādinā niddisantenāti ca vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:807_4: Paccayākārameva cāti paccayākāro eva ca, ma-
anya-e0104n0:807_6: Paccayadhammānaṃ attanoyeva phalassa paccayabhāvo paṭiccasamuppādoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:808_1: dukkarattā ca patiṭṭhaṃ nādhigacchāmīti yattha ṭhitassa vaṇṇanā sukarā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:808_2: tassā patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ taṃ nayaṃ attanoyeva ñāṇabalena nādhigacchāmīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:808_6: So hi anulomapaṭilomādinānādesanānayapaṭimaṇḍito abbocchinno ajjāpi pavattatīti nissayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:808_13: evaṃ aṭṭhigataṃ viya karonto aṭṭhiṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:808_15: Visesanti paṭhamārambhato pabhuti khaṇe khaṇe ñāṇavisesaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:809_4: Aṅgānañca vavatthānāti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vavatthānadassanato.
anya-e0104n0:810_1: ādito vuttattā ca avijjā paṭiccasamuppādassa mūlaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:810_2: Tattha valliyā mūle diṭṭhe tato pabhuti valliharaṇaṃ viya paṭiccasamuppādassa mūle diṭṭhe tato pabhuti
anya-e0104n0:810_5: idaṃ adiṭṭhanti vibhajanīyaṃ atthi sabbassa diṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n0:810_6: Mūlato pabhuti pana valliharaṇaṃ viya mūlato pabhuti paṭiccasamuppādadesanā katāti idamettha sāmaññaṃ adhippetaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:812_2: kumāro vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṃ paripākamanvāya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito…pe…
anya-e0104n0:812_4: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe sārajjati,
anya-e0104n0:812_8: yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0104n0:812_9: So evaṃ anurodhavirodhaṃ samāpanno yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
anya-e0104n0:813_6: Tato balavatiyā mocetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato.
anya-e0104n0:813_7: Tatopi balavatī pana upādānabhūtā taṇhā nandī.
anya-e0104n0:815_0: Vipākavaṭṭabhūte paṭisandhipavattiphassādike kammasamuṭṭhānañca ojaṃ sandhāya “cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:815_1: Vaṭṭūpathambhakā pana itarepi āhārā taṇhāpabhave tasmiṃ avijjamāne na vijjantīti “taṇhānidānā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭanti.
anya-e0104n0:816_1: Tato tatoti catubbidhāsu desanāsu tato tato desanato.
anya-e0104n0:816_3: so eva vā paṭiccasamuppādo “ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hotī”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n0:816_4: Sayameva hi so samantabhaddakattā tathā tathā paṭivijjhitabbattā tāya tāya desanāya attano paṭivedhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0104n0:817_1: desanāvilāsappatti ca catunnampi desanānaṃ samānaṃ kāraṇanti visesakāraṇaṃ vattukāmo āha “visesato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:817_8: Tattha sammūḷhā keci akāraṇaṃ kāraṇanti gaṇhanti,
anya-e0104n0:817_9: keci na kiñci kāraṇaṃ bujjhantīti tesaṃ yathāsakehi anurūpehi kāraṇehi saṅkhārādipavattisandassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:817_14: gabbhaseyyakādivasena vā tattha tattha bhave attabhāvassa uppajjanānupubbisandassanatthañca anulomadesanā pavattāti.
anya-e0104n0:817_15: Itarāsaṃ tadatthatāsambhavepi na tāsaṃ tadatthameva pavatti atthantarasabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:817_16: Ayaṃ pana tadatthā evāti etissā tadatthatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:818_0: Anuvilokayato yo sambodhito pubbabhāge taṃtaṃpaccayuppannāvabodhasaṅkhāto pubbabhāgapaṭivedho pavatto,
anya-e0104n0:818_1: tadanusārena tadanugamena jarāmaraṇādikassa jātiādikāraṇaṃ yaṃ adhigataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:818_4: Desentopi hi bhagavā kicchāpannaṃ lokaṃ anuviloketvā pubbabhāga…pe…
anya-e0104n0:818_7: saṅkhārāvijjā atītaddhāti iminā adhippāyenāha “yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:818_8: Āhārā vā taṇhāya pabhāvetabbā anāgato addhā,
anya-e0104n0:818_11: Paccakkhaṃ pana phalaṃ dassetvā tannidānadassanavasena phalakāraṇaparamparadassanaṃ yujjatīti āhārā purimataṇhāya uppāditā paccuppanno addhā,
anya-e0104n0:818_13: saṅkhārāvijjā tatopi atītataro saṃsārassa anādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:818_14: Yāva atītaddhānanti yāva atītataraṃ addhānanti attho yuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:818_15: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiāhārakā vā cattāro āhārā “āhāretītāhaṃ na vadāmi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:818_16: evaṃ pana maṃ avadantaṃ yo evaṃ puccheyya ‘kissa nu kho, bhante,
anya-e0104n0:818_27: Tasmā te kammavaṭṭasaṅgahitā āhārā paccuppanno addhāti imasmiṃ pariyāye purimoyeva attho yutto.
anya-e0104n0:819_3: tato parañca hetuphalapaṭipāṭiṃ paccakkhabhūtānaṃ āhārānaṃ nidānadassanavasena ārohitvā nivattanena vinā
anya-e0104n0:819_4: abujjhantānaṃ taṃsandassanatthaṃ sā ayaṃ desanā pavattāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:819_5: Anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhutīti anāgatassa bhavassa hetubhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattito paṭṭhāya.
anya-e0104n0:819_6: Anāgataddhasandassanatthanti anāgataddhuno appaṭivijjhantānaṃ apassantānaṃ paccakkhaṃ paccuppannaṃ hetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:819_8: Ettha ca ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā,
anya-e0104n0:819_9: pariyosānato ca paṭṭhāya yāva ādi pavattā desanā dvādasaṅgā,
anya-e0104n0:819_11: Majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādi pavattā desanā aṭṭhaṅgā dvisandhi tisaṅkhepā.
anya-e0104n0:819_12: Majjhato pana paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā pavattā desanā chaḷaṅgā dvisandhi tisaṅkhepā.
anya-e0104n0:819_16: taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādinā majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā pavattā desanā ekasandhi dvisaṅkhepā.
anya-e0104n0:819_17: Evaṃ ayaṃ anekaṅgā eva paṭiccasamuppādadesanā āgatā.
anya-e0104n0:820_2: sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaṃyeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti ‘iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:821_1: Ettha hi “phassapaccayā”ti ettako eva paṭiccasamuppādo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:822_0: Tattha imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:822_1: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:822_3: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti avijjādīnaṃ abhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ abhāvassa,
anya-e0104n0:822_4: avijjādīnaṃ nirodhā saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa ca vacanena purimasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito hoti “imasmiṃ sati eva, na asati,
anya-e0104n0:822_7: Tenetaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:823_0: Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgādhigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti.
anya-e0104n0:823_3: yena so uppādavirodhibhāvena vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:823_6: “Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ pariyāyantarena “imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:823_7: tasmā na dharamānataṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:823_9: Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:823_10: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhalakkhaṇassa nirodhassa niddesaṃ vadantena “avijjāyatveva
anya-e0104n0:823_12: tasmā natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:823_14: Tato na idha attalābhamattaṃ uppādoti adhippeto,
anya-e0104n0:823_15: atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvitoti evametaṃ lakkhaṇadvayavacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:824_7: ye pana na pahātabbā kusalābyākatā dhammā,
anya-e0104n0:825_3: yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ kāyo samudāgato,
anya-e0104n0:825_9: tasmā bālo kāyassa bhedā kāyūpago hoti,
anya-e0104n0:825_10: so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇenā”ti –
anya-e0104n0:826_2: taṇhupādānānaṃ abhāvato upādānabhavānaṃ na sambhavoti vaṭṭassa upacchedo paññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:828_1: Na hi aggamaggādhigamato uddhaṃ yāva parinibbānā saḷāyatanādīnaṃ appavatti,
anya-e0104n0:828_6: appahīnārahatāya ca phalārahaṃ santaṃ eva nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:828_8: nāpi pahīnārahanti phaluppattipaccayānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ vuttanayena phalārahabhāvo anirodhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:828_9: Evaṃ aniruddhabhāveneva hi yena vinā phalaṃ na sambhavati,
anya-e0104n0:828_10: taṃ kāraṇaṃ atītādipi “imasmiṃ satī”ti iminā vacanena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:828_11: Tato eva ca avusitabrahmacariyassa appavattidhammataṃ anāpanno paccayuppādo kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā anivattitāya eva “imassuppādā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:828_12: Atha vā avasesapaccayasamavāye avijjamānassāpi vijjamānassa viya pageva vijjamānassa yā phaluppattiabhimukhatā,
anya-e0104n0:828_14: Tadā hi tato phalaṃ uppajjatīti tadavatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ phalassa uppādanabhāvena upaṭṭhitaṃ uppatitaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:828_15: na vijjamānampi atadavatthanti tadavatthatā uppādoti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:829_0: Tattha “satī”ti iminā vijjamānatāmattena paccayabhāvaṃ vadanto abyāpārataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:829_3: phaluppattiabhimukhatañca dīpento aniccataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti. “Sati, na asati, uppādā,
anya-e0104n0:829_4: na nirodhā”ti pana hetuatthehi bhummanissakkavacanehi samatthitaṃ nidānasamudayajātipabhavabhāvaṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:829_5: Hetuatthatā cettha bhummavacane yassa bhāvena tadavinābhāviphalassa bhāvo lakkhīyati,
anya-e0104n0:829_7: yathā adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne dāliddiyaṃ vepullamagamāsi,
anya-e0104n0:829_9: Nissakkavacanassāpi hetuatthatā phalassa pabhave pakatiyañca pavattiyā,
anya-e0104n0:829_18: tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “imasmiṃ sati imassuppādā”ti hetuatthā bhummanissakkaniddesā katā.
anya-e0104n0:830_1: imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhassa paṭiccasamuppādassa “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko niddeso,
anya-e0104n0:830_3: uppādo ca tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:830_8: na nirodhā”ti antogadhaniyamehi vacanehi pakāsitaṃ muñcitvā añño paccayabhāvo nāma atthi,
anya-e0104n0:830_11: Yepi hi paṭṭhāne āgatā hetuādayo catuvīsati paccayā,
anya-e0104n0:830_14: uppādaṭṭhiti pavattaṭṭhiti nimittaṭṭhiti āyūhanaṭṭhiti saṃyogaṭṭhiti palibodhaṭṭhitītiādipariyāyehi ca pakāsito kāraṇattho,
anya-e0104n0:831_4: suttaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ siyāti dassento “āsavasamudayā”ti suttaṃ āharati.
anya-e0104n0:831_8: tāya paṭicchāditādīnave bhave taṇhāya uppajjanato avijjā visesena sīsabhūtāti “mūlakāraṇa”nti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:832_0: Purimāya koṭiyā apaññāyamānāya uppādavirahato niccataṃ gaṇheyyāti āha “evaṃ cetaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:832_3: Tena ito pubbe uppannapubbatā natthīti apaññāyanato purimakoṭiapaññāyanaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:833_3: Savarā kira maṃsassa aṭṭhinā alagganatthaṃ punappunaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭetvā uṇhodakaṃ pāyetvā virittaṃ sūnaṃ aṭṭhito muttamaṃsaṃ gāviṃ mārenti.
anya-e0104n0:833_5: Tattha yathā vajjhagāvī ca avijjābhibhūtatāya yathāvuttaṃ uṇhodakapānaṃ ārabhati,
anya-e0104n0:833_7: Yathā pana sā uṇhodakapāne ādīnavaṃ disvā taṇhāvasena sītudakapānaṃ ārabhati,
anya-e0104n0:833_8: evaṃ puthujjano avijjāya nātibalavabhāvato duggatigāmikamme ādīnavaṃ disvā taṇhāvasena sugatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati.
anya-e0104n0:834_2: Ekadhammamūlikaṃ desananti avijjātaṇhāsu ekoyeva dhammo mūlaṃ etissāti ekadhammamūlikā, taṃ,
anya-e0104n0:834_3: tattha ekaṃ eva dhammaṃ mūlaṃ katvā paṭiccasamuppādadesanaṃ desetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:834_6: Assādānupassinoti upādāniyesu tebhūmakadhammesu visayabhūtesu assādetabbato assādasaññitaṃ sukhasomanassaṃ anupassanasīlassa.
anya-e0104n0:834_10: Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūto saviññāṇakakāyo khandhapañcakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:834_11: “Saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti vacanato phassakāraṇañcetaṃ vuccatīti āyatanacchakkaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:834_13: Bahiddhā ca nāmarūpanti bahiddhā saviññāṇakakāyo khandhapañcakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:834_16: Attano ca paresañca pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni dvārālambanabhāvena vavatthitāni dvayaṃ nāmāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:834_17: Dvayaṃ paṭicca phassoti aññattha cakkhurūpādīni dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:834_21: aññattha “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:834_22: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādinā cakkhu ceva rūpā ca…pe…
anya-e0104n0:834_23: mano ceva dhammā cāti vuttāni dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:834_24: Idha pana “ayañceva kāyo”ti cakkhādinissaye sesadhamme cakkhādinissite eva katvā vuttaṃ cakkhādikāyaṃ ekattena “ajjhattikāyatana”nti gahetvā,
anya-e0104n0:834_25: “bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ekatteneva “bāhirāyatana”nti tāni ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni paṭicca phasso vutto,
anya-e0104n0:835_0: Evañca katvā attano ca parassa ca pañcahi khandhehi,
anya-e0104n0:835_1: chahi āyatanehi cāti ayamattho dīpetabbovāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:835_2: “Ayaṃ kāyo”ti hi vuttāni sanissayāni cakkhādīni attano pañcakkhandhā,
anya-e0104n0:835_4: Tathā ayaṃ kāyo attano cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni,
anya-e0104n0:835_6: Aññathā ajjhattikāyatanamatte eva “ayaṃ kāyo”ti vuttena ajjhattikāyatanāneva attano pañcakkhandhā hontīti
anya-e0104n0:835_7: attano ca paresañca pañcahi khandhehi dīpanā na sambhaveyyāti.
anya-e0104n0:835_9: yehi kāraṇabhūtehi āyatanehi uppannena phassena phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:835_14: Imasmiñhi sutte saṅkhāre avijjātaṇhānissite eva katvā kāyaggahaṇena viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanāni gahetvā
anya-e0104n0:835_15: tasmiṃ kāye saḷāyatanānaṃ phassaṃ taṃnissitameva katvā vedanāya visesapaccayabhāvaṃ dassentena bhagavatā
anya-e0104n0:836_3: yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ kāyo samudāgato,
anya-e0104n0:836_9: Tasmā bālo kāyassa bhedā kāyūpago hoti,
anya-e0104n0:836_10: so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:837_1: upādānabhave ca tannissite katvā “kāyūpago hotī”tiādinā jātiādike dassentena paccuppannahetusamuṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n0:837_3: tabbipariyāyena ca paṇḍitassa paccuppannahetuparikkhayato pabhuti ubhayamūlako paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādoti.
anya-e0104n0:838_4: tathā visesapaccayo vindiyassa na hotīti “vindiyaṃ na vindatī”ti ca.
anya-e0104n0:838_5: Attanissitāni katvā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattanaṃ uppādanaṃ āyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:838_7: Antavirahite javāpetīti vaṇṇāgamavipariyāyavikāravināsadhātuatthavisesayogehi pañcavidhassa niruttilakkhaṇassa vasena a- kāra vi- kāra ja-
anya-e0104n0:838_8: kāre gahetvā aññesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ, ja-
anya-e0104n0:838_12: idaṃ ārammaṇa”nti avijjāya ñātuṃ na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:840_4: te pana imissā desanāya padhānāti visuṃ vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:840_5: tasmā “duvidhā”ti ettha saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhāresu abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāraṃ vajjetvā tadaññe saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:840_7: Tadekadesā ca idha vaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahitā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
anya-e0104n0:841_1: Satipi paccayanibbattānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatabhāve “mametaṃ phala”nti tatthābhimukhena viya kammunā nibbattitattā
anya-e0104n0:841_2: tebhūmakavipākakaṭattārūpesu sātisayo saṅkhatabhāvoti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammanibbattānaṃ abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhāratā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:841_5: Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti vuttā ubhuādisamuṭṭhānāpi sabbadhammā.
anya-e0104n0:844_5: Na hi ettha kiñci uppādavayarahitaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:845_11: Purimabhavena saddhiṃ ghaṭanaṃ hutvā gayhatīti paṭisandhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:845_17: Tato eva hi pisiyamānā taṇḍulādayo vikiranti,
anya-e0104n0:845_19: nāmassa kadāci kusalādibhāvopi atthīti tato visesanatthaṃ “abyākatapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:845_20: “Acetano abyākato”ti ettha viya anārammaṇatā vā abyākatatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:845_31: puggalassa vā rūpādīsu atittabhāvo hutvā gayhatīti atittabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:846_10: Ayaṃ pana vibhāgo na avijjāya eva,
anya-e0104n0:849_2: evaṃ atītānāgatampīti addhadvayapariyāpannassāpi nayato gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “atītādito tividha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:855_0: Jāti ekavidhā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:856_3: phalena pana kāraṇaṃ avijjaṃ mūlaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ te vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:856_4: Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavantīti sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:856_5: na pana “kāyikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho”ti ca sutte jarāmaraṇanimittañca dukkhaṃ saṅgahitanti taṃ
anya-e0104n0:856_7: Yasmā pana jarāmaraṇeneva sokādīnaṃ ekasaṅkhepo kato,
anya-e0104n0:856_9: Jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāve hi avijjāya ekasaṅkhepo kātabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n0:856_11: sokādayo ca sambhavantīti tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ ekantikaṃ aṅgabhāvena gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:856_12: Sokādayo pana rūpabhavādīsu abhāvato anekantikā kevalaṃ pākaṭena phalena avijjānidassanatthaṃ gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:856_13: Tena anāgate jātiyā sati tato parāya paṭisandhiyā hetuhetubhūtā avijjā dassitāti bhavacakkassa avicchedo dassito hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:856_14: Suttañca sokādīnaṃ avijjā kāraṇanti etasseva atthassa sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:856_16: “Assutavā puthujjano”ti hi vacanena avijjā sokādīnaṃ kāraṇanti dassitā,
anya-e0104n0:857_4: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “jarāmaraṇapaccayā sokādayo sambhavantī”ti avatvā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:857_6: Yasmā tadaññenapi dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa te sambhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:857_7: tasmā appahīnasaṃyojanassāpi tesaṃ tappaccayatā na ekaṃsikāti jātipaccayatāva vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:857_14: kammādiupaṭṭhāne cutianantaraṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetīti upapattibhavo jātiyā paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:857_16: Yasmā pana “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettheva upapattibhavassa jātiyā paccayatā saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n0:857_17: tasmā vuttapariyāyasaṅgahato ca “jarāmaraṇapaccayā jātī”ti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:857_18: Evaṃ jarāmaraṇassāpi paccayabhāvasiddhito paṭiccasamuppādatāti dvādasaṅgatā vavatthitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:859_4: avijjā dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā suttantesu catuṭṭhānikā avijjā vuttāti “suttantapariyāyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:859_5: Nikkhepakaṇḍe pana suttantesu catūsu ṭhānesu kathitāya eva avijjāya aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kiccajātito kathitattā
anya-e0104n0:859_17: “Paṭicchādetvā”ti ettha vuttaṃ paṭicchādanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:859_21: yo “pīḷanaṭṭho”tiādinā vutto dukkhasaccappabhedā eva ca pubbantādayo,
anya-e0104n0:859_23: Taṃ paṭivijjhituṃ paccakkhato jānituṃ na deti.
anya-e0104n0:860_3: Ayaṃ avijjā ime saṅkhārāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannadhammesu paccakkhato jānanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:860_6: yathā pana nirodhamagge ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontī te jānitukāmassa tappaṭicchādanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:860_7: anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggahaṇakāraṇabhāvena ca pavattamānā te yāthāvato paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
anya-e0104n0:861_4: Hitasukhajjhāsayena puññaṃ karotīti tannipphādanena kārakassa ajjhāsayaṃ pūreti,
anya-e0104n0:861_8: Puññañca so attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena abhisaṅkhāro cāti puññābhisaṅkhāro.
anya-e0104n0:862_3: na dānasīlavasenāti tattha labbhamānaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:862_5: Ye pana “bhāvanāvasenevā”ti avadhāraṇena abhiññācetanaṃ nivattetīti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:862_6: tadayuttaṃ tāsampi avijjāpaccayatāya viya puññābhisaṅkhārabhāvassa ca icchitattā.
anya-e0104n0:862_7: Aññathā abhiññācittuppādassa puññakiriyavatthūsu asaṅgaho eva siyā,
anya-e0104n0:862_8: na ca yuttaṃ “kusalañca puññakiriyavatthuñca na hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:863_1: Puññābhisaṅkhārādayo pavattamānā imehi dvārehi pavattantīti dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:863_5: evaṃ sante abhiññācetanāyapi kusalāya tathā pavattāya vacīsaṅkhārabhāvo vattabboti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “abhiññācetanā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:863_8: Na gahitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na gahitā “abhiññācetanā viññāṇassa paccayo na hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:863_13: anupacchinnataṇhāvijjamāne pana santāne sabyāpārappavattiyā tassā kusalatā,
anya-e0104n0:863_16: Sā pana vipākaṃ uppādentī rūpāvacarameva uppādeyya.
anya-e0104n0:863_17: Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ vipākaṃ uppādetīti.
anya-e0104n0:863_18: Attanā sadisārammaṇaṃ tiṭṭhānikameva ca uppādeyya cittuppādakaṇḍe rūpāvacaravipākassa kammasadisārammaṇasseva vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:863_22: Kasiṇesu ca uppāditassa catutthajjhānasamādhissa ānisaṃsabhūtā abhiññā.
anya-e0104n0:863_26: Dānasīlānisaṃsabhūto tasmiṃ bhave paccayalābho viyāti sāpi vipākaṃ na uppādetīti.
anya-e0104n0:864_1: evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi na hotī”ti idaṃ uddhaccasahagatadhamme visuṃ uddharitvā “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttattā vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:864_2: Sā pana vicāraṇā heṭṭhā khandhaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ akusalakathāyaṃ vicāritā evāti tattha vicāritanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:864_6: tesaṃ taduppattikāle tehi pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā akusalā dassanena pahātabbā,
anya-e0104n0:864_8: Puthujjanānaṃ pana bhāvanāya abhāvā bhāvanāya pahātabbacintā natthi.
anya-e0104n0:864_9: Tena tesaṃ pavattamānā dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyāpi bhāvanāya pahātabbāti na vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:864_11: dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kesañci kenaci kadāci ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayehi paccayo bhaveyyuṃ?
anya-e0104n0:864_12: Na ca paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayoti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:864_13: Sekkhānaṃ pana vijjamānā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
anya-e0104n0:864_15: cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā ukkheṭitattā samukkheṭitattā assāditabbā,
anya-e0104n0:864_19: uddhaccañca uppādentīti na te tesaṃ ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatibhāvaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:864_21: Na hi pahīne upanissāya ariyo rāgādikilese uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:865_1: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati…pe…
anya-e0104n0:865_4: Na ca puthujjanānaṃ dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā,
anya-e0104n0:865_5: itaresaṃ na kenaci paccayena paccayo hontīti na sakkā vattuṃ “diṭṭhiṃ assādeti abhinandati,
anya-e0104n0:865_11: Ettha hi uddhaccanti uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:865_12: Evañca katvā adhipatipaccayaniddese “diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
anya-e0104n0:865_16: Tasmā dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbānaṃ atītādibhāvena na vattabbattepi yādisānaṃ tāhi anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:865_17: tesu puthujjanesu vattamānā dassanaṃ apekkhitvā tena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanena pahātabbā,
anya-e0104n0:865_18: sekkhesu vattamānā bhāvanaṃ apekkhitvā tāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
anya-e0104n0:866_0: Tesu bhāvanāya pahātabbā sahāyavirahā vipākaṃ na janayantīti bhāvanāya pahātabbacetanāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vutto,
anya-e0104n0:866_1: apekkhitabbadassanabhāvanārahitānaṃ pana puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:866_3: vipākuppādanaṃ na sakkā paṭisedhitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ vipāko vibhaṅge vutto.
anya-e0104n0:867_0: Evampi te imasmiṃ tike “navattabbā”ti vattabbā āpajjantīti?
anya-e0104n0:867_2: cittuppādakaṇḍe dassitānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā.
anya-e0104n0:867_3: Yathā hi dhammavasena sabbe saṅkhatadhammā saṅgahitāti uppannattike kālavasena asaṅgahitāpi atītā “navattabbā”ti
anya-e0104n0:867_4: na vuttā cittuppādarūpabhāvena gahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā,
anya-e0104n0:867_5: evamidhāpi cittuppādabhāvena gahitesu navattabbassa asaṅgahitassa abhāvā navattabbatā navuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:867_6: Yattha hi cittuppādo koci niyogato navattabbo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:867_7: tattha tesaṃ catuttho koṭṭhāso atthīti yathāvuttapadesu viya tatthāpi bhinditvā bhajāpetabbacittuppāde
anya-e0104n0:868_0: Atha vā yathā sappaṭighehi samānasabhāvattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā sappaṭighāti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:868_1: Yathāha “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā,
anya-e0104n0:868_3: evaṃ puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānā bhāvanāya pahātabbasamānasabhāvā bhāvanāya pahātabbāti vucceyyunti?
anya-e0104n0:868_5: Evañca sati puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānāpi bhāvanāya pahātabbā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:868_6: rāgo ca rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayoti ayamattho laddho hoti.
anya-e0104n0:868_7: Yathā pana aphoṭṭhabbattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā na paramatthato sappaṭighā,
anya-e0104n0:868_8: evaṃ apekkhitabbabhāvanārahitā puthujjanesu vattamānā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo na paramatthato bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:868_9: pahātabbāti bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayatā na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:868_10: Na ca dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayoti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:868_13: Dassanena pahātabbapaccayassapi pana uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:868_14: na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:868_15: Tasmā tassa tādisasseva sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:869_0: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ ahopurisikāmattanti apare. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:869_2: Evañhi vuttaṃ bhagavatā “katame dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā?
anya-e0104n0:869_5: yathā atītārammaṇattike “niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā vibhajja vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:869_6: evamidhāpi “niyogā bhāvanāya pahātabbā natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbo,
anya-e0104n0:869_8: Yā ca taṃ samatthentena “yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:869_10: Yasmā dassanena pahātabbārammaṇānaṃ rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchāuddhaccānaṃ dassanena pahātabbabhāvo eva icchitoti.
anya-e0104n0:869_11: Yaṃ pana uddhaccaggahaṇena pāḷiyaṃ uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo vuttoti vatvā taṃ sādhetuṃ adhipatipaccayaniddese
anya-e0104n0:869_15: anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:869_16: katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti etassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi na uddhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:870_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbassa vipākadānaṃ pati dassanena pahātabbassa sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:870_1: Kiṃ avijjādi viya dānasīlādīnaṃ uppattiyāyeva vipākadānasāmatthiyā ṭhānavasena dassanenapahātabbaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbassa sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
anya-e0104n0:870_2: udāhu kilesā viya kammassa paṭisandhidānaṃ patīti?
anya-e0104n0:870_4: yadi tāva purimo pakkho pahīnadassanappahātabbattā sekkhasantāne pavattino bhāvanāpahātabbassa kiriyabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:870_8: tasmā heṭṭhā vicāritanayeneva uddhaccasahagatassa vipākadānaṃ pati pāḷiyā,
anya-e0104n0:871_3: kasmā “samavīsati cetanā”ti vuttanti tassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “avijjāpaccayā pana sabbāpetā hontī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:871_5: Yadi evaṃ abhiññācetanāya saha ekavīsatīti vattabbaṃ, na,
anya-e0104n0:871_7: Taṃ pana itarāvacanassāpi kāraṇanti samānarūpāya ekissā avacane yaṃ kāraṇaṃ apekkhitvā ekā na vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:871_12: Puññābhisaṅkhāro hi aṭṭhakāmāvacaracetanāpabhedo kāyaduccaritato viramantassa siyā kāyasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:871_14: manodvāre pana uppannā terasapi cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro ca hoti cittasaṅkhāro ca.
anya-e0104n0:871_17: dve dvārāni muñcitvā manodvāre pavattiyaṃ siyā cittasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:871_18: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro cāti evaṃ dutiyattiko purimattikameva pavisati.
anya-e0104n0:871_19: Tena vuttaṃ “atthato puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃyeva vasena avijjāya paccayabhāvo veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:872_1: Avijjābhāve bhāvatoti avijjāya atthibhāve saṅkhārānaṃ bhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:872_2: Na hi avijjāya asati kadāci saṅkhārā sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n0:872_3: Idāni taṃ avijjāya bhāvaṃ dassento “aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:872_4: Tena maggena anirodho idha avijjāya atthibhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:872_7: “Avijjāsaṅkhāta”nti ca iminā ñāṇābhāvādiṃ nivatteti. Ayañhi a-
anya-e0104n0:872_8: kāro “ahetukā dhammā abhikkhuko āvāso”tiādīsu taṃyoganivattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0104n0:872_11: Paccayuppannañhi paccayasambandhīti appaccayuppannattāti taṃsambandhitā ettha jotīyati.
anya-e0104n0:872_14: Atha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nidassanaṃ na passatīti taggahetabbatānivattiyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:872_36: Imesaṃ pana atthānaṃ asambhavato pārisesena yathā kusalapaṭipakkhā dhammā akusalā,
anya-e0104n0:872_37: evaṃ vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjāti katvā ñāṇapaṭipakkho dhammo aññāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:873_0: Sukhasaññāya gahetvā dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhatāhi viññūhi dukkhantveva gahetabbaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhanti saññāya abhinivisitvā,
anya-e0104n0:873_5: Taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayoti ajānanto bālo “aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:873_9: rūpādiñca abhisaṅkharitvā taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ dentā saṅkharā taṇhāya upanentā tassā parivārā viya hontīti.
anya-e0104n0:873_15: Dukkhattā vā maro mārako tapo amaratapo.
anya-e0104n0:873_16: Diṭṭhe adiṭṭhasaddo viya mare amarasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:874_5: Ramaṇīyabhāvena ca assādabhāvena ca gayhamānaṃ puññaphalaṃ dīpasikhāmadhulittasatthadhārāsadisaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:874_7: “Sukho imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso”tiādinā sukhasaññāya asubhabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:874_9: kilesābhibhūtatāya kodhāratiabhibhūto asavaso maritukāmo viya visakhādanaṃ sampati kiriyākhaṇe,
anya-e0104n0:874_14: Sabhayassāpi pisācanagarassa kāmaguṇasamiddhiyā sukhavipallāsahetubhāvo viya āruppavipākānaṃ nirantaratāya,
anya-e0104n0:875_1: na abhāvatoti saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayabhāve saṅkhepena anvayato,
anya-e0104n0:875_2: byatirekato ca vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādinā suttapadaṃ ābhataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:877_2: tena “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo”ti idaṃ tāva siddhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:877_5: taṃ dassetuṃ paccayadhammā nāma yesaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:877_7: tadubhayesaṃ bahubhāvato anekadhāva paccayā hontīti avijjāyapi taṃ āsaṅkanto pucchi “katamesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kathaṃ paccayo hotī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:877_11: tasmā imesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ evaṃ paccayo hotīti idaṃ vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:877_14: ekadesena pana samudāyopalakkhaṇametanti dvādasannaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paccayabhāvo vattabboti taṃ dassetuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:877_15: avijjāya vā paccayabhāve pucchite tappasaṅgena sabbesampi paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ visajjetukāmo
anya-e0104n0:877_16: paccaye tāva pāḷinayeneva dassetuṃ “bhagavatā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:877_17: Tattha ca bhagavatā catuvīsati paccayā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:877_18: Tesaṃ vasena avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo veditabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:878_0: “Hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti iminā vacanena hetuno,
anya-e0104n0:878_1: adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa ca gahaṇaṃ siyāti taṃ nivārento āha “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:878_2: Evampi so eva doso āpajjatīti puna āha “hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:878_3: Tena na idha hetusaddena dhammaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:878_4: atha kho dhammassa sattiviseso gahitoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:878_5: Tassa hi paccayasaddassa ca samānādhikaraṇataṃ sandhāya “hetu ca so paccayo ca,
anya-e0104n0:878_8: hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tena tena hetubhāvādiupakārena tassa tassa dhammassa upakārakattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:878_9: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ appaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā,
anya-e0104n0:878_11: “mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo”ti ca evamādinā dhammapaṭṭhānaniddesena dhammato aññā dhammasatti
anya-e0104n0:878_12: nāma natthīti dhammeheva dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:878_13: Idhāpi vā “hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti dhammeneva dhammasattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:878_14: Na hi “hetupaccayo”tiādiko uddeso kusalādiuddeso viya dhammappadhāno,
anya-e0104n0:879_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā tabbhāvena paccayabhāvaṃ ārammaṇādīsu atidisati “ārammaṇañca taṃ paccayo cāti ārammaṇapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:880_2: Vacanasabhāvañhi sādhanaṃ paresaṃ aviditatthañāpanato loke sādhananti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:880_5: avayavapakkhādīni vacanāni sādhananti ca ñāyavādino vadanti. Paṭiññā,
anya-e0104n0:880_10: Virūpo hetūti ca evamādīsu kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:880_16: Mūlanti hetuhetūti kāraṇavisesavisayattā mūlassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:880_20: Ekacco hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva upakārako hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:881_0: Upakārakalakkhaṇoti ca dhammena dhammasattiṃ upakāraṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:881_4: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ atiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati pavattati vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu.
anya-e0104n0:881_8: Pabhavati etasmāti pabhavoti paccayahetusaddehi itaresampi samānatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:881_12: paccayaṭṭho ca heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttoti taṃ saṅkhippaṃ dassento āha “saṅkhepato…pe…
anya-e0104n0:882_2: evaṃ hetupaccayo yathārahaṃ attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvassa sādhakoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “so sāliādīna”ntiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:882_7: Yathā kusalākusalahetu taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa kusalākusalabhāvāya na pariyatto,
anya-e0104n0:882_9: Sabhāveneva hi taṃ abyākatanti āha “na hi so tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhetī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:882_10: Hetupaccayo ca tesaṃ hotiyevāti āha “na ca paccayo na hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:882_12: Vinā etenāti etena hetunā abyākatabhāvasādhakena vinā ahetukattā,
anya-e0104n0:883_2: manasi karoto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:883_3: uppannā ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādi vacanehi kusalabhāvassa yonisomanasikārappaṭibaddhatā siddhāti
anya-e0104n0:883_5: Eteneva akusalaabyākatabhāvāpi kusalabhāvo viya na hetupaṭibaddhāti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:883_6: Yaṃ paneke maññeyyuṃ “ahetukahetussa akusalabhāvo viya sahetukahetūnampi sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:883_9: Alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vāti yadi alobho sabhāvato kusalo,
anya-e0104n0:883_11: Atha abyākato taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya.
anya-e0104n0:883_13: tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu saddhādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesetha,
anya-e0104n0:883_16: na sabhāvatoti yaṃ vuttaṃ “sampayuttahetūsu sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:883_18: Sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya sampayuttesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:884_0: Viruḷhamūlā viyāti etena mūlāni viya mūlānīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:884_8: abyākato dhammo abyākatassā”ti evaṃ sattadhā pañhāvāre niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:884_9: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ hetukiccaṃ dassentena “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:884_14: tena na yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttakānaṃ hetū hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:884_16: Nanu ca sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā dutiye hetusadde avijjamānepi aññassa apekkhitabbassa aniddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0104n0:884_17: hetū attanāva sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayoti ayamattho viññāyatīti?
anya-e0104n0:884_19: Hetusaddo hi paccattaniddiṭṭho “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettheva byāvaṭo yadā gayhati,
anya-e0104n0:884_20: na tadā sampayuttavisesanaṃ hotīti sampayuttaavisiṭṭhā ye keci gahitā bhaveyyunti.
anya-e0104n0:884_21: Nanu ca yathā “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:884_22: arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti ca vutte dutiyena āhāraggahaṇena,
anya-e0104n0:884_26: Vajjetabbābhāvato hi tattha dutiye āhārindriyaggahaṇe asatipi taṃsampayuttakāva gayhantīti taṃ na kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:884_27: idha pana vajjetabbaṃ atthīti kattabbaṃ dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:884_28: Evampi “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”nti ettha hetusampayuttakānaṃ so eva sampayuttakahetūti visesanassa akatattā
anya-e0104n0:884_29: yo koci hetu yassa kassaci hetusampayuttassa hetupaccayena paccayoti āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n0:884_32: Etadatthameva hi vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepi tassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:885_0: Atha vā asati dutiye hetusadde hetusampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:885_1: na pana hetūnanti evampi gahaṇaṃ siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ so vutto.
anya-e0104n0:885_4: aññesampi hetū hetupaccayena paccayoti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:885_9: tasmā te vināpi dutiyena āhārindriyaggahaṇena attanā eva āharitabbe,
anya-e0104n0:885_11: aññe ca sampayuttake paricchindantīti taṃ tattha na kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:885_12: Idha ca dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ hetunā,
anya-e0104n0:885_14: aññesañca paricchinnattā puna visesena kiccaṃ natthīti pañhāvāre “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:886_5: rūpāyatanādimatte yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ aṭṭhatvā “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti (paṭṭhā 1.1.2) aniyamena sabbarūpāyatanānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0104n0:886_6: sabbadhammāyatanānañca ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā rūpādibhedena chabbidhesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu
anya-e0104n0:886_7: na koci dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:886_10: Ekantasārammaṇabhāvato anārabbha pavatti eva natthīti āha “ārabbhevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:887_4: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde
anya-e0104n0:887_5: chandādayo dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā vase vattayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
anya-e0104n0:887_6: sampayuttadhammā ca tesaṃ vasena vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato,
anya-e0104n0:887_8: Garukātabbampi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ assādanapaccavekkhaṇamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:887_9: Tasmā ayaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakattā adhipatipaccayoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:887_11: chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittuppattikāle uppannassa kattukamyatāchandassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:887_13: Kasmā pana yathā hetupaccayaniddese “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:887_14: evamidha “adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna”nti avatvā “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna”ntiādinā nayena vuttanti?
anya-e0104n0:887_16: Hetavo hi dve tayopi ekakkhaṇe hetupaccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:887_19: na ca ekakkhaṇe bahū jeṭṭhakā honti.
anya-e0104n0:887_20: Tasmā ekato uppannānampi tesaṃ ekakkhaṇe adhipatipaccayabhāvo natthīti “adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna”nti
anya-e0104n0:888_0: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammanti yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇadhammaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:888_1: Garuṃ katvāti garukāracittīkāravasena vā assādanavasena vā garukārikaṃ laddhabbaṃ avijahitabbaṃ anavaññātaṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:888_2: Te te dhammāti te te garukātabbā dhammā.
anya-e0104n0:888_14: tathā akusalassāti abyākatamūlā tayo”ti saṅkhepato dasappakāro adhipatipaccayo.
anya-e0104n0:889_4: anantaro ca so paccayo cāti anantarapaccayo.
anya-e0104n0:889_10: ete pana cittaniyamahetubhāvena vuttāti taṃ cittaniyamahetubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yo hi esā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:889_13: cutianantarā paṭisandhīti yassa yassa cittassa anantarā yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:889_14: tassa tassa tadanantaruppādaniyamo taṃtaṃsahakāripaccayavisiṭṭhassa purimapurimacittasseva vasena ijjhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:890_5: Bhāvanābalena pana vāritattāti ettha yathā rukkhassa vedhe dinne pupphituṃ samatthasseva pupphanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:890_6: vedhe pana apanīte tāya eva samatthatāya pupphanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:890_8: tasmiñca apagate tāya eva samatthatāya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:890_9: Tampi vacanaṃ kālānantaratā natthi sattāhādinā kālena antaritabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:890_11: Nanu ca kālo nāma koci paramatthato natthīti vadeyyāti āsaṅkanto āha “kālānantara…pe…
anya-e0104n0:891_1: na atthatoti upacayasantatiadhivacananiruttipadānaṃ viya saddatthamattato nānākaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:891_7: tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādanasamatthatā samanantarapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:891_8: Uppādanasamatthatāti ca abyāpārattā dhammānaṃ yasmiṃ yadākāre niruddhe,
anya-e0104n0:891_9: vattamāne vā sati taṃtaṃvisesavanto dhammā honti,
anya-e0104n0:891_11: Dhammānaṃ pavattimattameva ca upādāya kālavohāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ asaññabhavā cavantassa,
anya-e0104n0:891_13: Na hi tesaṃ antarā arūpadhammappavatti atthi,
anya-e0104n0:891_15: na ca rūpadhammappavatti arūpadhammappavattiyā antaraṃ karoti aññasantānattā.
anya-e0104n0:891_16: Rūpārūpasantatiyo hi dve aññamaññaṃ visadisasabhāvattā aññamaññūpakārabhāvena pavattamānāpi visuṃyeva honti.
anya-e0104n0:891_17: Ekasantatiyañca purimapacchimānaṃ majjhe pavattamānaṃ taṃsantatipariyāpannatāya antarakārakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:891_19: na ca abhāvo antarakārako hoti abhāvattā eva.
anya-e0104n0:891_21: bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viya ca nirantaratā suṭṭhu anantaratā hotīti tathā uppādanasamatthatā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacutīnampi daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:891_22: Uppattiyā paccayabhāvo cettha anantarapaccayādīnaṃ pākaṭoti uppādanasamatthatāva vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:891_23: Paccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ pubbantāparantaparicchedena gahitānaṃ uppajjatīti vacanaṃ alabhantānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:891_24: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā anantarādipaccayabhāvo vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:891_26: Na hi kusalādiggahaṇaṃ viya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ aparicchedaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:891_28: Teneva ca atītattike paṭiccavārādayo na santīti.
anya-e0104n0:891_35: abyākato dhammo akusalassā”ti sattadhā bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:892_1: Uppajjamānova saha uppādanabhāvenāti etthāpi uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭena ṭhitiyāpi paccayabhāvaṃ nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:892_7: Tasmiṃ hi khaṇe nāmarūpaṃ okkantaṃ viya paralokato āgantvā idha mātukucchiādiṃ pavisantaṃ viya uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:892_12: Cittacetasikāti pavattiyaṃ cattāro khandhā paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:892_15: tathāpi tena khaṇantare sahajātapaccayabhāvo rūpadhammānaṃ na nivāritoti tannivāraṇatthamidaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:892_16: Kiñci kāleti keci kismiñci kāleti attho,
anya-e0104n0:892_17: tena rūpino dhammā keci vatthubhūtā kismiñci paṭisandhikāleti aññesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:892_18: vatthuno ca pavattiyaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvaṃ pubbe anivāritaṃ nivāreti.
anya-e0104n0:892_19: Evañca katvā “kiñci kāla”nti vā “kismiñci kāle”ti vā vattabbe tathā avatvā vibhattivipallāsaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:892_24: vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”nti ādivacanena nāmasahitaṃ eva vatthu nāmassa paccayoti vattabbe āpanne itarena kevalassa ca tathāvattabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:893_5: Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:893_6: na ca sahajātādipaccayadhammehi vinā imassa pavatti atthi.
anya-e0104n0:893_7: Tathā hi sahajātādipaccayo ca hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:893_8: Yadi ca attano upakārakassa upakārakatāmattaṃ aññamaññapaccayo siyā,
anya-e0104n0:893_9: purejātapacchājātabhāvena upakārassa upakārakā vatthukhandhā aññamaññapaccayā siyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:894_1: Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:894_2: cakkhādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ upakārakā cittakammassa paṭādayo viya nissayākārena khandhādayo taṃtaṃnissayānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:894_3: Pathavīdhātuyaṃ patiṭṭhāya eva hi sesadhātuyo upādārūpāni viya yathāsakaṃ kiccaṃ karonti.
anya-e0104n0:895_1: Ādhārākāro cettha tesaṃ sātisayaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:895_3: evañca katvā cakkhādīnampi adhiṭṭhānākārena upakārakatā suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:895_4: Na hi yathāvuttaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāvisesaṃ muñcitvā añño cakkhādīsu adesakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānākāro sambhavati.
anya-e0104n0:895_5: Yadipi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ye ye dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:895_7: Yena pana paccayabhāvavisesena cakkhādīnaṃ paṭumandabhāvesu cakkhuviññāṇādayo tadanuvidhānākāreneva pavattanti,
anya-e0104n0:895_9: Evañhi paccayabhāvasāmaññe satipi ārammaṇapaccayato nissayapaccayassa viseso vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:895_11: Chaṭṭho panāti ettha “rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kismiñci kāle”ti idaṃ na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:895_13: tattha te eva dhamme dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatana”ntiādi niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:896_1: Tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissitoti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vatvā tattha yo bhuso nissayo,
anya-e0104n0:897_3: Datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodapetvā visuddhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:897_6: sampattaviratisamucchedaviratiyo pana loke “sīla”nti apākaṭattā na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:897_9: Tattha samucchedavirati sekkhānaṃyeva kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:897_13: Taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhatīti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kusalaṃ sekkhopi puthujjanopi paccavekkhati,
anya-e0104n0:897_15: Arahatopi hi pubbe kataṃ kusalaṃ kusalameva.
anya-e0104n0:897_18: Tasmā “kusalo kusalassā”ti imasmiṃ adhikāre na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:897_19: Pubbe suciṇṇānīti “datvā katvā”ti hi āsannakatāni vuttāni,
anya-e0104n0:897_21: dānādīhi vā sesāni kāmāvacarakusalāni dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:897_22: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti jhānaṃ samāpanno jhānato vuṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0104n0:897_27: Tesañhi taṃ cittaṃ vodānaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:897_29: Maggā vuṭṭhahitvāti maggaphalabhavaṅgātikkamavasena attanā paṭiladdhamaggā vuṭṭhahitvā,
anya-e0104n0:897_30: suddhamaggatoyeva pana vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ādi-
anya-e0104n0:897_31: saddena “kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:897_33: tathāpi idampi ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayānaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:898_2: itaro kusalādivasenapīti sopi nikkhepaviseso atthato ekībhāvameva gacchati sabbesupi cittuppādesu tadubhayassa icchitabbattā.
anya-e0104n0:899_2: so attano phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena suṭṭhukatataṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:899_3: Tathā ca kataṃ attano santāne kataṃ hotīti āha “attano santāne”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:899_9: Teneva anāgatānampi utusampadādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanena upasevitānaṃ pakatūpanissayatā vuttā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:899_11: Paccuppannassāpi hi “paccuppannaṃ utubhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādetī”tiādivacanato pakatūpanissayabhāvo labbhatīti.
anya-e0104n0:900_0: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:900_1: purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ kesañci,
anya-e0104n0:901_0: Tattha ye purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ anantarūpanissayo honti,
anya-e0104n0:901_4: tesu “kesañcī”ti na sakkā vattunti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:901_5: Ye pana purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayo vā pakatūpanissayo vā honti, te tesaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:901_10: Tasmā yesu padesu anantarapaccayo na labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:902_0: Kasiṇapaññattiyā ārammaṇūpanissayatābhāvato ekaccāya paññattiyā saddhiṃ sabbo dhammo ārammaṇūpanissayo,
anya-e0104n0:903_5: Nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārakabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:903_6: Evaṃ vatthārammaṇavasena duvidhe purejātapaccaye “cakkhāyatana”ntiādi vatthuvasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:904_4: tesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapurejātadassanena manodvārepi yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇapurejātena vattati,
anya-e0104n0:904_5: tassa tassa ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ sabbaṃ rūparūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dassitameva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:904_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ pañhāvāre “ārammaṇapurejātaṃ sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:904_8: abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo,
