anya-e0104n0:904_9: abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti abyākatamūlakā tayova vārā.
anya-e0104n0:905_1: Paccayuppannadhammassa puretaraṃ siddhabhāve sati paccayadhammassa pacchājātatāti vuttaṃ “purejātāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:905_6: Pacchājātena hi vinā santānāvicchedahetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye pacchājātākārena upakārakā,
anya-e0104n0:905_7: tesaṃ sā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā upakārakatā pacchājātapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:905_9: “Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viyā”ti etena manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehi arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:905_12: Saṅkhepato ṭhapetvā rūpadhamme avisiṭṭho arūpakkhandho pacchājātapaccayo.
anya-e0104n0:906_1: Kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ āsevanaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n0:906_4: Tīsu pana etesu purimā purimāti samanantarātītā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:906_5: Kasmā panettha anantarapaccaye viya “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatāna”ntiādinā bhinnajātiyehi saddhiṃ niddeso na katoti?
anya-e0104n0:906_7: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvaṃ sampādentā attanova kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gatiṃ gāhetuṃ na sakkuṇanti.
anya-e0104n0:906_8: Tasmā tehi saddhiṃ niddesaṃ akatvā ye yesaṃ vāsanāsaṅkhātena āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:906_10: tesaṃ tehi samānajātikeheva saddhiṃ niddeso katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:907_2: Vipākābyākatañhi kammavasena vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ nirussāhaṃ dubbalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:907_3: santaṃ āsevanaguṇena attano sabhāvaṃ gāhetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ vipākaṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0104n0:907_5: atha kho kammavegakkhittaṃ patitaṃ viya hutvā uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:907_6: Tasmā sabbathāpi vipāke āsevanā natthīti na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:907_7: Kusalākusalakiriyānantaraṃ uppajjamānampi sakammapaṭibaddhavuttitāya āsevanaguṇaṃ na gaṇhātīti kusalādayopi tassa āsevanapaccayo na honti.
anya-e0104n0:907_8: Nānājātikattāpi cete tassa āsevanādhānaṃ na karonteva. Bhūmito,
anya-e0104n0:907_9: pana ārammaṇato vā nānājātikatā nāma natthīti parittakusalakiriyā mahaggatakusalakiriyānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:907_13: abyākato dhammo abyākatassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti tidhāva vutto.
anya-e0104n0:908_5: Tena hi sā uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānampi
anya-e0104n0:908_7: Tassa hi kiriyābhāvassa pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti,
anya-e0104n0:908_9: Sahajātānaṃ pana āyūhanakiriyābhāvena pavattamānā upakārikāti kiṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:908_11: Na hi cetanāsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ abhijjhādi kammapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:908_12: Satipi vipākadhammabhāve cetanāvajjānaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā vipākāpi cetanā sahajātakammapaccayo hotiyeva,
anya-e0104n0:908_13: svāyaṃ kammapaccayo jātivasena catubbidhoti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:909_1: “Nirussāhasantabhāvenā”ti etena saussāhehi vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi sārammaṇādibhāvena sadisānampi asadisaṃ vipākabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:909_2: So hi vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāya payogena,
anya-e0104n0:909_3: aññathā vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattā eva sijjhanato nirussāho santabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:909_6: Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati,
anya-e0104n0:909_9: Etena tappaccayavantānaṃ avipākānampi rūpadhammānaṃ vipākānukūlaṃ pavattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:909_11: Paṭiccavāre pana “vipākā cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā āgatā.
anya-e0104n0:909_12: Ettha ca yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:909_14: Na hi āruppe kāmarūpabhūmīsu viya vipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:910_1: Satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:910_5: asati pana upatthambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:910_6: Atha vā janayamānopi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhento janetīti upatthambhanabhāvo eva āhārabhāvoti “upatthambhakattenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:910_7: Keci pana “rūpāhāro attanā janitassa āhārapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:910_10: Taṃ “āhāro rūpassa paccayo honto āhārapaccayo na hotīti viruddhameta”nti apare nānujānanti.
anya-e0104n0:910_11: Rūpāhāro cettha rūpadhammānaṃ eva āhārapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:910_13: Tañca kho na kevalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānameva,
anya-e0104n0:910_14: atha kho kadāci kaṭattārūpānampīti dassetuṃ “pañhāvāre panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:911_1: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n0:911_8: aññātāvibhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi dhammehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatā.
anya-e0104n0:911_15: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:911_18: na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti.
anya-e0104n0:911_20: kevalaṃ pana yathāsakehi eva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthiādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:911_21: tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā,
anya-e0104n0:911_24: Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti ettha sukhindriyadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:912_1: Lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānabhūtānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanādivasena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:912_2: cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:912_3: “Ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇe sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti vatvāpi “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti vacanena ajhānaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:912_5: Yadi evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā vuttaṃ?
anya-e0104n0:912_6: Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa ekantena ajhānaṅgabhāvadassanatthaṃ jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0104n0:912_7: satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre vedanābhedadvayassa ekantena jhānapaccayattābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:912_9: najhānapaccayabhāvo pana natthīti sabbānipi satta jhānaṅgānīti ettha gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:913_1: Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:913_2: Pañhāvāre panātiādi yadipi paccayaniddese taṃsamuṭṭhānaggahaṇena so attho ñāpito eva,
anya-e0104n0:913_3: pañhāvāre pana sarūpeneva gahitoti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:913_6: Paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu na labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:913_13: Evañhi atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci kassaci lābho na nivāritoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:913_14: Tena savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa sambhavo anuññāto hoti.
anya-e0104n0:913_15: Tattha hi yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ saṅgahasuññatavāresu jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:913_16: taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu alābho vutto.
anya-e0104n0:913_17: Yathā hi sahetukacittuppādesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā,
anya-e0104n0:913_19: Idha pana dubbalampi upanijjhāyanaṃ yadi kiñcimattampi atthi,
anya-e0104n0:913_20: na tena upakārakatā na hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi jhānapaccayaṃ anujānantena “ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:914_2: saha vā pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvūpagamena viya upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:914_3: Kā pana sā pakārehi yuttatāti āha “ekavatthukaekārammaṇaekuppādekanirodhasaṅkhātenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:914_5: te sampayuttāti ettake vuccamāne avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sesamahābhūtupādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:914_7: cakkhādinissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānīti kappentassa tesaṃ sampayuttatāpatti
anya-e0104n0:914_11: te sampayuttāti evampi cutiāsannānaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekuppādaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:914_13: te sampayuttāti kiṃ pana nānānirodhāpi evaṃtividhalakkhaṇā honti,
anya-e0104n0:914_14: udāhu ekanirodhā evāti vicāraṇāyaṃ ekanirodhā eva evaṃlakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ “ekanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:915_0: Paṭilomato vā ekanirodhā sampayuttāti vuccamāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe nirujjhamānānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:915_1: Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ atthi ekuppādekanirodhatāti tesampi sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ ekārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:915_3: te sampayuttāti ayañca nayo ekavatthukesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:915_7: Āruppe pana vatthuyeva natthīti kuto ekavatthukaggahaṇassa avasaro.
anya-e0104n0:916_1: Aññamaññaṃ sambandhatāya yuttānampi samānānaṃ vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:916_2: Ayañca vippayuttatā na sampayuttapaccayatāya viya aññamaññaṃ paccayapaccayuppannadhammavasena gahetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:916_8: Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ vippayuttānampi vippayuttapaccayatā atthi.
anya-e0104n0:916_11: pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato vatthunā,
anya-e0104n0:916_14: Yadi evaṃ rūpānaṃ rūpehi kasmā vippayuttapaccayo na vuttoti?
anya-e0104n0:916_15: Rūpānaṃ rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge sampayogo viya vippayogo natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:916_19: rūpānañca tehi siyā sampayogāsaṅkāti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:916_20: Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi sampayogo natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:917_1: arūpinopi rūpīnanti ettha arūpaggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:917_2: Arūpadhammesu hi cattāro eva khandhā sahajātapurejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti.
anya-e0104n0:917_3: Nibbānaṃ pana yathā arūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:917_8: Vuttañca pañhāvāre “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:917_9: Rūpino dhammāti cetaṃ hadayavatthuno ceva cakkhādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:917_10: Rūpadhammesu hi cha vatthūniyeva arūpakkhandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayo.
anya-e0104n0:917_15: Arūpakkhandhā hi cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantā viya uppajjantīti siyā tattha āsaṅkā “kiṃ nu kho ime imehi sampayuttā,
anya-e0104n0:917_17: Ārammaṇadhammā pana vatthusannissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattaṃ hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkāti na te vippayuttā.
anya-e0104n0:917_19: Vuttampi cetaṃ pañhāvāre “vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:918_3: atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattitūpalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti.
anya-e0104n0:918_4: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti āha “upatthambhakattenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:918_5: Idañca upatthambhakattaṃ vatthārammaṇasahajātādīnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ atthibhāvena upakārakattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:918_6: “Sattadhā mātikā nikkhittā”ti vuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:919_0: Aññattha pana tato aññathāpi āgatoti dassetuṃ “pañhāvāre panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:919_2: Purimapāṭhe pana sāvasesā desanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:919_11: sahajātato eva kusalena kusalābyākatanti kusalamūlā tayo,
anya-e0104n0:919_19: sahajātapurejātapacchājātāhārindriyato akusalañca abyākatañca abyākatassā”ti evaṃ terasavidho.
anya-e0104n0:919_22: Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti,
anya-e0104n0:919_24: Nibbānañca nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ hutvā atthibhāvalābhena upakārakaṃ hotīti,
anya-e0104n0:920_1: Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena pavattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:920_2: asati pana hotīti tena natthibhāvena upakārakatā natthipaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:920_3: Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tena tāni natthibhāvena upakārakāni,
anya-e0104n0:920_4: anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānaṃ natthibhāvena okāsaṃ dadamānaṃ viya upakārakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:921_1: Evaṃ santepi abhāvamattena upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā,
anya-e0104n0:922_2: Tena na kevalaṃ natthivigatapaccayā eva dhammato avisiṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n0:922_6: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso dhammāvisesepi veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:922_7: Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti
anya-e0104n0:922_8: dhammassāmimhi saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya
anya-e0104n0:926_2: natthivigatapaccayā cāti ime paccayā janakā eva,
anya-e0104n0:926_6: Sesā janakā ca upatthambhakā cāti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:929_4: sabbā tā mohamūlikāti ca avijjāya ādīnavadassanena avijjāsamatikkamatthāya vivaṭṭābhipatthanāyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:930_1: Avijjāsampayuttattā rāgādīnaṃ rāgādiassādanakālesu avijjaṃ ārabbha uppatti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:930_2: Garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ rāgadiṭṭhisampayuttāya eva avijjāya yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:930_4: tadaviyuttā ca diṭṭhīti assādanavacaneneva yathāvuttaṃ avijjaṃ garuṃ karontī diṭṭhi ca vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:930_5: Rāgādīhi ca pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato vuttehi taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārassa avijjārammaṇāditaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:930_9: vuttassa ca sabbassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:932_2: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti ettha sambhavanti evāti avadhāraṇaṃ na yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:932_4: Tathā saṅkhārā evāti avadhāraṇampi na yujjati. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:932_6: Vākyassa avadhāraṇaphalattā avijjāpaccayā eva saṅkhārā sambhavantīti avadhāraṇe gayhamānepi ayaṃ doso. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:932_11: Dosamettha vattukāmo codako pucchatīti ñatvā ācariyo āha “kiṃ panetthā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:932_12: Ettha avijjāya paccayantarena rahitabhāve ca sahitabhāve ca kiṃ pana vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:932_16: Aniṭṭho hi ekakāraṇavādo sabbattha sabbakālaṃ sambhavāpattito,
anya-e0104n0:933_0: Yasmā ekaṃ na ekatotiādīsu tīsu pakāresu avijjamānesu pārisesena anekato anekamevāti etasmiṃ catutthe
anya-e0104n0:933_1: eva pakāre vijjamāne ekahetuphaladīpane attho atthi,
anya-e0104n0:933_5: Anekatopi ekaṃ phalaṃ no atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:934_1: “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ekaphaladīpananti evaṃ tattha tattha ekekahetuphaladīpanaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:935_2: phalassa ca dīpanā satthu desanāvilāsato vā veneyyapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayato vā.
anya-e0104n0:935_3: Tadubhayassa panettha kāraṇaṃ tattha tattha desetabbassa atthassa padhānatā, pākaṭatā,
anya-e0104n0:935_5: Desanāvilāsappattā ca buddhā bhagavanto te desetabbe atthe bahūsupi pariyāyesu labbhamānesu yathārucitaṃ gahetvā dhammaṃ desenti,
anya-e0104n0:935_7: Tattha pana yena pariyāyena ye veneyyā bujjhanti,
anya-e0104n0:936_8: aññapaccayasāmaññepi cakkhusamphassavasena sukhādicakkhusamphassajādīnaṃ oḷārikasukhumādisaṅkarābhāvato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:936_9: Yathāvuttaphassassa sukhādīnaṃ aviparīto paccayabhāvo eva yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:936_10: Kāraṇaphalavisesena vā phalakāraṇavisesanicchayo hotīti ubhayatthāpi nicchayo pavatthānanti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:937_1: Semhassa mandabhāvādinā ca semhaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:937_2: Ayamidha avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:937_7: upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti iminā suttena taṇhāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa vuttattāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:937_8: Puna tassāpi avijjāya kāraṇanti dassanatthaṃ “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayoti ca vacanato”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:937_9: Taṇhā vā caturupādānabhūtā kāmāsavadiṭṭhāsavā ca saṅkhārassa kāraṇanti pākaṭā avijjāhetukāti suttadvayenāpi
anya-e0104n0:937_11: “Assādānupassino”ti hi vacanena bhavādīnavappaṭicchādanakiccā avijjā taṇhāya kāraṇanti dassitā hoti.
anya-e0104n0:937_13: tasmā puññābhisaṅkhārādike abhisaṅkharotīti avijjāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa pākaṭattā aviddasubhāvova saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvena vutto.
anya-e0104n0:937_15: asādhāraṇattā ca puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇāni vatthārammaṇādīnīti puññabhavādīnavappaṭicchādikā
anya-e0104n0:937_16: avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:937_21: vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādīsu bodhaneyyajjhāsayavasena dhammassa bodhanasaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:938_12: Na hi aniṭṭhavepakkaṃ kāraṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ phalati,
anya-e0104n0:938_14: Yasmā panettha paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvalakkhaṇadhammānaṃ dhammatā adhippetā,
anya-e0104n0:938_15: tatra cāyaṃ niyamo natthi vicittarūpattā tassāti.
anya-e0104n0:939_4: Evaṃ sati “purimacittaṃ pacchimacittassa ṭhānaviruddho paccayo”ti nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n0:940_8: tasmā dukkhavipākāyapi avijjāya adukkhavipākānaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayattaṃ na na yujjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:941_2: na itaresanti etassa pasaṅgassa nivāraṇatthaṃ “viruddho cāviruddho ca,
anya-e0104n0:941_5: Tasmā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto “iti ayaṃ avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:942_1: Sabbattha khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇanti cutiṃ aggaṇhantoti idha cuti nāma tattha tattha bhavādīsu rūpādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:942_2: khandhānaṃ maraṇasaññito carimo bhedoti yāthāvato ajānanto.
anya-e0104n0:943_0: Sabbattha khandhānaṃ pātubhāvoti tattha tattha bhavādīsu khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti.
anya-e0104n0:943_1: Navasarīrapātubhāvoti idha jiṇṇassa sarīrassa nikkhepe paralokapariyāpannassa navakāyassa uppādo.
anya-e0104n0:948_0: Ayaṃ sattoti ayamattā, yo sāmī, nivāsī, kārako,
anya-e0104n0:949_3: Saṅkhāre attato attaniyatoti rūpādīsu ekaccaṃ attato,
anya-e0104n0:950_0: Attā jānāti vāti vikappeti kāpilādayo viya.
anya-e0104n0:950_2: Kāṇādopi hi attā sabhāvena na jānāti.
anya-e0104n0:950_5: So eva karoti ca kāreti cāti yo parattha sukhadukkhaṃ anubhavati,
anya-e0104n0:950_14: Sabbañhetaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ kiccaṃ attano byāpāraṃ katvā diṭṭhigatiko vimuyhatīti dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:950_16: niyati eva vā saṅgati samāgamo niyatisaṅgati,
anya-e0104n0:950_17: tāya bhāvesu pariṇatā manussadevavihaṅgādibhāvaṃ pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā. Niyatiyā,
anya-e0104n0:950_19: bhāvasaṅkhātena sabhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti ca atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:951_0: Etehi ca vikappanehi avijjā akusalaṃ cittaṃ katvā satte puññādīsu saṅkhāresu yattha katthaci pavattetīti
anya-e0104n0:952_1: arahattamaggañāṇāvasānaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ samavisamaṃ dassetvā satte nibbānaṃ nayatīti pariṇāyakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:952_3: Dhammaṃ ñatvāti sappurisūpassayena catusaccappakāsakaṃ suttādidhammaṃ ñatvā,
anya-e0104n0:952_5: Taṃjānanāyattaṃ pana sesasaccattayābhisamayaṃ samānakālampi taṃ purimakālaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:952_6: Upasanto carissatīti aggamaggādhigamena sabbaso avijjūpasamā upasanto saupādisesanibbānadhātuyaṃ ṭhito yāva anupādisesanibbānadhātupatti,
anya-e0104n0:952_7: tāva sattānaṃ hitacariyāya attabhāvaṃ pavattento carissati,
anya-e0104n0:954_1: Yathāvuttasaṅkhārapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ taṃ kammanibbattameva bhavituṃ arahatīti “bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni saṅgahitānī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:954_2: Dhātukathāyaṃ pana vippayuttena saṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā,
anya-e0104n0:954_7: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena,
anya-e0104n0:954_13: sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti vacanato sabbaviññāṇaphassavedanāpariggaho kato.
anya-e0104n0:954_14: Yadi hi ettha viññāṇaphassavedanā sappadesā siyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:954_16: Tasmā tattha abhidhammabhājanīyavasena saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇādayo gahitāti adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:954_18: akusalasaṅkhāro ca vuttoti eso eva dhātukathāyaṃ gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:954_19: Bhavo pana dhātukathāyaṃ kammūpapattibhavavisesadassanatthaṃ na abhidhammabhājanīyavasena gahito,
anya-e0104n0:954_20: evañca katvā tattha “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti anuddharitvā “kammabhavo”tiādinā nayena bhavo uddhaṭo.
anya-e0104n0:955_1: Chahi viññāṇehīti yathāadhikatehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi viññāṇehi.
anya-e0104n0:955_2: Kasmā panettha lokiyavipākaviññāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti āha “lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:955_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dhātukathāyaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu lokuttaravipākānampi gahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0104n0:955_4: Taṃ yathādhammasāsanattā abhidhammadesanāya vipākattike viya anavasesavipākadhammasaṅgaṇhanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:955_5: Suttantadesanā pana yathānulomadesanāti tattha pavattinivattiyo asaṅkarato dassetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:955_6: Tasmā tadatthasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā pavattikathāyaṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇāniyeva gahitāni.
anya-e0104n0:956_0: Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladāne samatthaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:956_1: tathā kataṃ “upacita”nti vuccatīti vipākadānayogyameva saṅkhāraṃ gaṇhanto “upacitakammābhāve”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:956_5: Yathā panassa viññāṇassa saṅkhārapaccayatā na siddhā,
anya-e0104n0:956_9: Tassa pana sādhanatthaṃ “upacitakammābhāve vipākābhāvato”ti vuttanti taṃ vivaranto “vipākañcā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:956_10: Yadi uppajjeyyāti yadi kammanirapekkho vipāko uppajjeyya.
anya-e0104n0:956_11: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ brahmattaṃ upagatānaṃ ghānādiviññāṇāni mahāvipākaviññāṇānīti tassa tassa vipākassa anokāse ṭhitānampi.
anya-e0104n0:957_2: na ca sabbato sabbānīti āha “katarasaṅkhārapaccayā kataraviññāṇanti ce”ti.
anya-e0104n0:957_6: na ca tattha nesaṃ saṅkhārapaccayatā vibhāvitāti taṃ pavattiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:957_7: paṭisandhiyañca bhavādīsu pavattanākāravasena vitthārato dassetuṃ “kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:957_10: Mahāvipākāti pana pāṭhe manoviññāṇadhātuyoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:958_2: Yaṃ viññāṇanti “yaṃ yaṃ viññāṇa”nti evaṃ ubhayattha āmeḍitalopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:958_4: na pavattivisesoti taṃ dassento “evaṃ pavatti veditabbā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:958_5: Brahmānampi aniṭṭharūpādiāpāthagamane akusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇādīni kadāci uppajjantīti “imāni terasa…pe…
anya-e0104n0:958_7: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vokāro vitthāro etthāti pañcavokāro,
anya-e0104n0:958_11: Atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānehi pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro,
anya-e0104n0:958_12: so eva bhavoti sabbaṃ pubbe viya.
anya-e0104n0:960_7: akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n0:960_10: Javanena tadārammaṇaniyame somanassasahagatānantaraṃ somanassasahagatāneva sandhāya vuttanti apare,
anya-e0104n0:961_0: Yasmā pana tihetukajavanāvasāne ca kadāci ahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:961_3: tadā tattha ekameva tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti keci.
anya-e0104n0:961_5: taṃ ekacittakkhaṇike tathā āsannabhede ārammaṇe nuppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:961_6: Tasmā “sakiṃ vā”ti idaṃ dirattatirattādi viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:961_9: saddassa abhāvā vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattena dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:961_11: saddo vikappattho vuttoti sakiṃ eva ca kadāci pavattiṃ sandhāya “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:961_12: Teneva hi sammohavinodaniyaṃ sakiṃ tadārammaṇappavattiyā vicāretabbataṃ dassentena “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:961_13: pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:962_0: Tattha cittappavattigaṇanāyanti vipākakathāyaṃ balavarūpādiārammaṇe vuttaṃ cittappavattigaṇanaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:962_2: Tadeva hi sandhāya idhāpi vuttaṃ “abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe dve cittavārā āgatā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:962_3: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantīti dvāraṃ anāmasitvā eva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:962_4: taṃ anantaraṃ parato vuttasahetukavipākaviññāṇānaṃ sadisasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātukāmatādhippāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:962_8: aniyataṃ vā dvāraṃ etesanti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0104n0:963_1: tañca aniyatanti tampi gaṇhanto “aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:963_2: Teneva cettha mahāvipākānampi tadārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dvāraṃ labbhatīti tatthāpi dvāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:964_0: Ekassa sattassa pavatto rūpāvacaravipāko pathavīkasiṇādīsu yasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavatto,
anya-e0104n0:964_1: tato aññasmiṃ tassa pavatti natthīti rūpāvacarānaṃ niyatārammaṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:965_1: Evaṃ pavattiyaṃ viññāṇappavattiṃ dassetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:965_4: Bhavantarena bhavantarassa sandhānaṃ idha paṭisandhīti taṃ acittakampi atthevāti katvā “kati paṭisandhiyo”ti
anya-e0104n0:966_4: Keci pana ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi hontiyeva,
anya-e0104n0:966_5: tasmā tādisānampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahoti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:966_7: asukāya paṭisandhiyā asukaṃ ārammaṇanti vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:967_1: paṭhamatatiyāruppā dveti imāsaṃ vuttāvasesānaṃ sattannaṃ paṭisandhīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:967_2: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ nāma natthi paṭisandhiārammaṇe eva pavattanato.
anya-e0104n0:968_3: Olambantīti sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā viya bhūmiyaṃ tassa citte avalambanti upatiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0104n0:968_4: Tasmiṃ niruddheti tasmiṃ cuticitte niruddhamatte tassa nirodhasamanantarameva.
anya-e0104n0:968_7: tañca ārabbha cittasantānassa bhavantaraninnapoṇapabbhāratā hotīti āha “anupacchinnakilesabalavināmita”nti.
anya-e0104n0:968_8: Santāne hi vināmite tadekadesabhūtaṃ paṭisandhicittañca vināmitameva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:968_9: na ca ekadesavināmitabhāvena vinā santānassa vināmitatā atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:968_10: Sabbattha pana duggatipaṭisandhininnāya cutiyā purimajavanāni akusalāni,
anya-e0104n0:968_18: yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:968_21: Arahato pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ upacchinnattā paṭippassaddhasabbabhavussukkatāya kammādinimittaṃ na upaṭṭhahati,
anya-e0104n0:968_22: tato vijjamānampi kammaṃ aladdhasahāyattā paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.
anya-e0104n0:969_3: Na hi so eva nirayaggivaṇṇādi tadā tassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0104n0:969_8: Manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitavaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya,
anya-e0104n0:969_9: dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0104n0:970_0: Rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇanti akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ aniṭṭhamārammaṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:970_1: Tampi hi saṅkappanavasena rāgassāpi hetu hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:970_2: Akusalavipākajanakakammasahajātānaṃ vā taṃsadisāsannacutijavanacetanāsahajātānañca rāgādīnaṃ hetubhāvo eva hīnatā.
anya-e0104n0:970_3: Tañhi pacchānutāpajanakakammānamārammaṇaṃ kammavasena aniṭṭhaṃ akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n0:970_4: Aññathā ca iṭṭhārammaṇe pavattassa akusalakammassa vipāko akusalakammanimittārammaṇo na bhaveyya.
anya-e0104n0:970_5: Na hi akusalavipāko iṭṭhārammaṇo bhavituṃ arahatīti.
anya-e0104n0:971_0: Pañcadvāre ca āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇasantatiyaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:971_5: etasmiṃ tayā pavattitabbanti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppādentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannāni javanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:971_7: Tadā ca taṃsamānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ?
anya-e0104n0:971_9: Na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:971_10: “Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:971_11: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:971_12: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā hoti samādinnā.
anya-e0104n0:971_13: Tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādinā sutte maraṇakāle samattāya samādinnāya micchādiṭṭhiyā,
anya-e0104n0:971_17: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “sabbampi hetaṃ kusalākusaladhammapaṭivijānanādicavanapariyosānaṃ kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:971_18: na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassapetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni paṭikkhittānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:972_0: Tattha hi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānātīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:972_1: Yesaṃ paṭivibhāvanappavattiyā sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā anveti,
anya-e0104n0:972_5: tadanantarā ca upapatti manodvārikā eva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:972_6: na sahajavanakavīthicittapariyāpannāti iminā adhippāyena idha pañcadvārikatadārammaṇānantarā cuti,
anya-e0104n0:972_8: Tattha avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke rūpādimhi uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya “paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:972_10: avasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke ca uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya “paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ atītārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:972_11: bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:973_1: Kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti ettha yathā pubbe “pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti vutte kaṇhapakkhe
anya-e0104n0:973_4: narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimitta”nti ca vutte kaṇhapakkhe “sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:973_6: devaloke vā uyyānavimānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ sugatinimitta”nti evaṃ sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:974_1: Tañca khoti yadetaṃ “anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti aniyamanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:974_3: Kammanimittameva āpāthamāgacchati ekantato attano kammārammaṇatāya mahaggatavipākassa.
anya-e0104n0:974_6: sā pana javanavīthi mahaggatavipākassa upacāro viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:974_7: Keci pana tañca vīthiṃ mahaggatāvasānaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:975_1: Tattha saddo tāva anupādinnabhāvena sugatipariyāpannatāya gatinimittabhāvena aṭṭhakathāsu nāgatoti yuttametaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:976_0: Ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyatītiādīsu pubbacetanāvasena puññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:977_1: “Etenānusārena āruppacutiyāpi anantarā paṭisandhi veditabbā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:977_2: nanu “pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassā”ti evamādike eva naye ayampi paṭisandhi avaruddhāti? Na,
anya-e0104n0:977_4: Tattha hi “pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimittaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0104n0:977_5: cakkhusotānaṃ vā”tiādinā tena vacanena rūpāvacaracutiyā eva anantarā paṭisandhi vuttāti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:977_6: Athāpi yathāsambhavayojanāya ayampi paṭisandhi tattheva avaruddhā,
anya-e0104n0:977_8: Arūpāvacare ca uparūpari cutiyā anantarā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā paṭisandhi natthīti catutthāruppacutiyā navattabbārammaṇapaṭisandhi natthi.
anya-e0104n0:977_12: atītapaccuppannārammaṇā ca kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi yojetabbāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ visuṃ uddharaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:978_1: Evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ekavidhāya kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā duvidhā duggatipaṭisandhi,
anya-e0104n0:978_3: kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā dviekadvippakārānaṃ kāmarūpārūpānaṃ vasena pañcavidhā sugatipaṭisandhi,
anya-e0104n0:978_5: duvidhāya āruppacutiyā paccekaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kāmāruppānaṃ vasena aṭṭhavidhā ca paṭisandhi dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:978_6: Duggaticutiyā pana ekavidhāya duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā na dassitā,
anya-e0104n0:979_0: Dve dve pañcātha pañcaṭṭha, dve bhavālambabhedato;
anya-e0104n0:981_1: “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā”tiādinā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā dassitappakāroti
anya-e0104n0:982_0: Nissayapaccayabhūtena rūpena sahapavattiyevettha viññāṇassa tena missitā,
anya-e0104n0:982_2: Yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññamissitā hontīti yoniyo.
anya-e0104n0:982_7: Asaññasattāvāsassa idha asambhavato “sattāvāsavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:984_2: Ādināti “missaṃ amissa”nti etasmiṃ duke ādimhi vuttena missaviññāṇena.
anya-e0104n0:984_3: Omato dve vā tayo vā dasakā uppajjantīti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:984_4: Aññattha pana aneke kalāpā saha uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n0:984_5: Brahmattabhāvepi hi anekagāvutappamāṇena aneke kalāpā saha uppajjantīti tiṃsato adhikāneva rūpāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:984_10: imāsu na sambhavantīti evaṃ yonīnaṃ gativasena sambhavabhedo.
anya-e0104n0:985_1: Bhummavajjesūti bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ pati tesaṃ manussasadisattā.
anya-e0104n0:985_2: Yoniyo tisso purimikā na hontīti yonittayapaṭikkhepena pacchimā yoni anuññātāti atthato āpannameva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:986_3: Kasmā pana nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti?
anya-e0104n0:986_5: Tāsañhi niccāturabhāvato kāmasevā natthīti na tā aṇḍajādayo honti.
anya-e0104n0:986_6: Kucchiyaṃ tāsaṃ gabbho nāvatiṭṭhati jālasabbhāvatoti keci.
anya-e0104n0:986_8: pupphādīsu ca sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatāpi tāsaṃ natthevāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:987_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesūti opapātikayonikehi rūpībrahme niddhāreti.
anya-e0104n0:987_3: Tena “opapātikayonikesū”ti sāmaññato vuttarāsito “rūpībrahmesū”ti visesena tadekadesaṃ niddhāreti.
anya-e0104n0:987_6: jīvitachakkassa cāti catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena rūpabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:987_7: tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā taṃ samatthentā “pāḷiyañhi ‘rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:987_11: nava dhātuyo’ti sabbasaṅgahakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:987_12: Kathāvatthumhi ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto ‘atthi tattha ghānāyatananti? Āmantā.
anya-e0104n0:987_15: Na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ tattha bhāvo sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:987_16: phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa gandharasasabhāvassa abhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:987_17: Yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo natthīti ‘āyatanānī’ti te na vucceyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:987_18: dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavācakoti ‘gandhadhātu rasadhātū’ti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n0:987_19: dhammabhāvo ca tesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:987_20: Dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantiko yamake vutto ‘dhammo āyatananti?
anya-e0104n0:987_22: Tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci āyatanabhāvo vattabbo.
anya-e0104n0:987_23: Yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā,
anya-e0104n0:987_25: Gandharasabhāve pana āyatanabhāve ca sati ‘gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:987_26: raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatana’nti idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:987_27: ‘Tayo āhārā’ti ca vacanato kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:987_30: Evañhi dhammatā na vilomitā hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:988_1: rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontīti te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:988_3: “tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato,
anya-e0104n0:988_10: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ yathā tattheva
anya-e0104n0:988_13: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa.
anya-e0104n0:989_3: acakkhāyatanabhāvena ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti?
anya-e0104n0:989_5: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:989_6: tena rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:989_7: Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:989_8: tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato,
anya-e0104n0:989_9: manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:990_0: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:990_1: tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:990_2: Asatipi hi tattha attano indriye rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:990_3: Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni,
anya-e0104n0:990_6: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ vacīghoso eva na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:990_8: na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:990_9: phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:990_10: Tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n0:990_11: Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:990_12: Vuttañhi “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:991_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanādvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:991_2: So ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvassa ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
anya-e0104n0:991_3: Yadi tattha asatipi visayini rūpāyatanaṃ gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:991_4: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti?
anya-e0104n0:991_6: Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya,
anya-e0104n0:991_11: na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:991_12: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
anya-e0104n0:992_0: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:992_3: aṭṭhakathāsu tattha nesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:992_5: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
anya-e0104n0:992_14: tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:992_15: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva.
anya-e0104n0:992_17: tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:993_0: Aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesūti rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu opapātikesu,
anya-e0104n0:993_6: Kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu yathāvuttāya santatiyā rūpānaṃ labbhanato vuttaṃ “tāni ca niccaṃ devesū”ti.
anya-e0104n0:993_9: Cakkhu nesaṃ dasannaṃ pūraṇoti katvā cakkhudasako nāma,
anya-e0104n0:993_10: asādhāraṇena vā cakkhunā lakkhito dasako cakkhudasako.
anya-e0104n0:993_14: avakaṃsato tiṃsā”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “avakaṃsato panā”tiādimāha,
anya-e0104n0:993_16: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:993_17: Dhammahadayavibhaṅge hi “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:994_10: Sati ca aghānakūpapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparānipi dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0104n0:994_11: Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:994_14: kassaci aparānipi navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:994_16: Ettha ca yathā “sattati ukkaṃsatotha rūpānī”ti padaṃ “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti ettha yonidvayavasena yojīyati,
anya-e0104n0:994_19: Ekayoganiddiṭṭhassāpi ekadeso sambandhaṃ labhatīti saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa
anya-e0104n0:994_20: jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:995_0: Ye pana “opapātikassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni
anya-e0104n0:995_4: Evañca katvā āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthi.
anya-e0104n0:995_7: Apare panāhu “kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantīti yāva ‘kassaci navāyatanānī’ti pāḷi opapātike sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:995_9: Tathā ca yathāvuttapāḷiyā ayamatthavaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametiyevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:995_11: Tathā hi dhammahadayavibhaṅge ‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī’tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:995_14: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahaṇavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:995_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanāparipuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:995_16: padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ “opapātikānanti vutta”nti ca,
anya-e0104n0:995_18: saṃsedajayonivaseneva ca avakaṃsato rūpapavattiṃ dassetuṃ opapātikayoniyā itaraṃ asaṅgahetvā “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:996_1: tiṃsā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ rūpassa ukkaṃsāvakaṃsaparicchedānaṃ majjhe.
anya-e0104n0:996_2: Anurūpato vikappo veditabboti apāyesu andhassa cha cakkhudasakābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:996_4: andhabadhirassa pana pañca cakkhusotadasakābhāvatoti evamādinā nayena veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:997_0: 631. Cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ khandhādīhi aññamaññasamānatā abhedo. Asamānatā bhedo.
anya-e0104n0:998_0: Ārammaṇatopi abhinnāti catūsu āruppesu tato tato cavitvā tattha tattheva upapajjantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:998_3: Arūpabhūmito cavitvā heṭṭhā upapatti nāma kāmabhave eva,
anya-e0104n0:998_5: Rūpabhavato pana cuto duhetukopi hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:998_8: avuttañca sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā āha “ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:998_9: Rūpārūpāvacarānaṃ upacārassa balavatāya tato cavitvā duggatiyaṃ upapatti natthīti “ekaccasugaticutiyā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:998_12: nānattakāyanānattasaññīsu vuttā ekacce ca vinipātikā tihetukādipaṭisandhikā,
anya-e0104n0:998_13: tesaṃ paṭisandhiṃ vinipātikabhāvena “duggatipaṭisandhī”ti gahetvā sabbasugaticutiyā ca sā paṭisandhi hoti,
anya-e0104n0:998_14: na ekaccasugaticutiyā evāti tannivattanatthaṃ ekaccaduggatiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:998_17: Atha vā duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā ekaccasugaticutiyā anantarā,
anya-e0104n0:998_19: Tattha pacchimaṃ vajjetvā purimaṃyeva gahetuṃ vuttaṃ “ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:998_20: Ahetukacutiyā sahetukapaṭisandhīti duhetukā ca tihetukā ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:998_21: Maṇḍūkadevaputtādīnaṃ viya hi ahetukacutiyā tihetukapaṭisandhipi hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:999_0: Tassa tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbanti “ekaccasugaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:999_6: Na hi mahaggataajjhattārammaṇāya cutiyā arūpabhūmīsu amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇā paṭisandhi atthi.
anya-e0104n0:999_7: “Catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhī”ti etassa vipariyāyo sayameva yojito.
anya-e0104n0:999_8: “Atītārammaṇāya cutiyā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhī”ti etassa ca vipariyāyo natthi eva.
anya-e0104n0:999_9: Bhedaviseso eva ca evaṃ vitthārena dassito,
anya-e0104n0:999_10: abhedaviseso pana ekekasmiṃ bhede tattha tattheva cutipaṭisandhiyojanāvasena veditabbo “pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:999_13: Eteneva nayena sakkā viññātunti pañcakkhandhādīsu abhedaviseso na dassitoti.
anya-e0104n0:1000_2: Etaṃ viññāṇaṃ avijjādisahakārikāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena laddhappaccayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1000_6: atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1000_8: Tato hetuṃ vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā.
anya-e0104n0:1000_11: Pākaṭatā cettha tadāsannakkhandhavasena veditabbā “cavamāne upapajjamāne”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:1000_12: Manussacutipaṭisandhikkamenāti vā manussacutito yassa kassaci paṭisandhikkamena.
anya-e0104n0:1000_13: Tathā hi vakkhati “nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anāssādayamānaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1001_10: “Niruddhesu cakkhādīsū”ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1001_18: Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati,
anya-e0104n0:1001_21: cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī”tiādinā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:1002_1: Na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:1002_2: Hadayavatthupi tadā ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya appāvasesaṃ hotīti “taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita”nti vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1002_9: yadā tadā vā katampi paribyattaṃ hutvā anussaritaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1002_11: Laddho avaseso avijjādiko viññāṇassa paccayo etenāti laddhāvasesapaccayo, saṅkhāro.
anya-e0104n0:1002_13: Kammanimittaṃ nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati, taṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1002_14: Atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi hi kamme kate vipaccanakāle āgantvā kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upatiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:1002_16: So ca niraye nibbattanārahassa “aggijālavaṇṇādiko”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0104n0:1002_17: Avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte.
anya-e0104n0:1003_1: purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāraṃ hutvā pavattatīti āha “taṇhā nāmetī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1003_5: Khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvena pavattantīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1003_11: Santativasenāti ca vadanto “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti imañca micchāgāhaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n0:1003_12: Sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1003_13: Ettha ca orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajju viya purimabhavattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ kammādiārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1003_17: yathā ca so puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibaddhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno vā anassādayamāno
anya-e0104n0:1003_19: evamidampi bhavantarattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ hadayavatthusaṅkhātaṃ nissayaṃ pañcavokārabhave assādayamānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1003_20: catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇasampayuttakammeheva pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:1004_3: Tadetaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāpi idhāgataṃ imasmiṃyeva bhave uppannattā.
anya-e0104n0:1005_1: Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti tesaṃ ekattanānattabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1005_7: Honti aññatra agantvāti saddādipaccayadesaṃ anupagantvā saddādihetukā honti tato pubbe abhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:1005_8: Evaṃ idampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:1005_9: Tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato,
anya-e0104n0:1005_10: nāpi tattha hetunā vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1005_11: Atha vā honti aññatra agantvāti pubbe paccayadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā,
anya-e0104n0:1006_0: Natthi ekatā ekasantānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato.
anya-e0104n0:1006_2: Khaṇikāya hi padīpajālāya santānekattaṃ upādāya so evāti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1006_8: Esa nayoti atidesena bījaṅkurādīsu sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu yathāsambhavaṃ yojanā kātabbāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1006_9: Idhāpi hi hetuhetusamuppannaviññāṇānaṃ ekantamekatte sati na manussagatito devagati sambhūtā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1006_11: tato “rattassa bījaṃ rattassa phala”ntiādikassa viya “bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0104n0:1006_12: rohitasso nāma isi ahosi”ntiādikassa vohārassa lopo siyā,
anya-e0104n0:1006_13: tasmā ettha santānabandhesu hetuhetusamuppannesu na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbā na gahetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1006_14: Ettha ca ekantaekatāpaṭisedhena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti,
anya-e0104n0:1007_6: “Dhammamattaṃ bhavantaramupetī”ti vuttattā phalassa upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyāti anuyuñjeti.
anya-e0104n0:1008_3: Etassa atthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā taṃ phalaṃ “aññassa,
anya-e0104n0:1008_4: aññato”ti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa.
anya-e0104n0:1008_6: Ettha ca abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammavā satto,
anya-e0104n0:1008_9: Tatthuppannassa madhurassa rattakesarassa vā phalassa vā tasseva bījassa,
anya-e0104n0:1008_10: tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo viya kammakārakasseva sattassa,
anya-e0104n0:1008_11: taṃkammato eva ca phalassa bhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1008_17: na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva vuḍḍhasarīre uppajjanato,
anya-e0104n0:1008_18: na ca yathāpayuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve abhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1009_2: Tattha vā upabhuñjake asati siddhā bhuñjakasammutīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1010_1: Tasmāti yasmā yathā khandhasantāne kusalākusalacetanuppattiyaṃ “puññaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1010_5: tasmā na ettha khandhavinimuttena aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:1011_1: Evaṃ santepīti asaṅkantipātubhāve tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati,
anya-e0104n0:1012_1: vipakkavipākānampi katattaṃ samānanti tesampi phalāvahatā siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āha “na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1014_2: pavattiyañca paccayabhāve vibhajja avibhāvite pavattanakasammohassa apanayanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1015_4: “Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayapaccayo na hotī”ti paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāya dassitametaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1015_6: na vā vattabbaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvakathāya avipākārahassa pasaṅgābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1015_7: Abhiññācetanāya hi avipākatā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva.
anya-e0104n0:1016_4: Kathaṃ pana iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva pavattanakāni kusalavipākaviññāṇāni duggatiyaṃ pavattantīti āha “niraye mahāmoggallānattherassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1016_5: Thero hi tattha iddhiyā vassaṃ nimminitvā katipayaṃ velaṃ nirayaggiṃ vūpasametvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0104n0:1018_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedoti ettha uddhaccasahagatacetanāya gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0104n0:1019_2: rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha “so ca kho”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1019_3: “Tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepi aniṭṭharūpādayo natthī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1019_4: Bahulañhi tesaṃ iṭṭhā eva rūpādayo upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0104n0:1020_2: tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ kātukāmo āha “ādito paṭṭhāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1020_5: saṃsedajā ca hontīti tadapekkhāya “catūsu yonīsū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1020_6: Ekattakāyaekattasaññitāsāmaññena catutthajhānabhūmikāpi asaññāruppavajjā catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti.
anya-e0104n0:1022_1: Catūsu antogadhānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu paccayabhāvo yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1022_2: Aviññāṇake sattāvāse saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇe alabbhamānepi tassa saṅkhārahetukattaṃ labbhateva.
anya-e0104n0:1022_3: Tathā hi tattha puññābhisaṅkhāro kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1022_4: Etasmiñca mukhamattappakāsane puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ duggatiādīsu pavattiyaṃ kusalavipākādiviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1022_5: paccayabhāvo bhavesu vuttanayeneva viññāyatīti na vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1024_0: 638. Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti nāmassa, rūpassa ca pabhedato.
anya-e0104n0:1025_0: Tattha nāmassa tāva pabhedaṃ dassentena kāmaṃ viññāṇampi nāmameva,
anya-e0104n0:1025_1: paccayapaccayuppanne pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1026_0: Ekaṃ sattāvāsanti asaññasattāvāsaṃ. Purimesu catūsu, asaññasattāvāse cāti pañcasu.
anya-e0104n0:1027_4: lakkhaṇaparicchedarūpāni pana santīti tāni paramatthato aparinipphannānīti vajjento āha “rūparūpato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1027_5: Phassādike saṅkhārakkhandhabhāvena ekattaṃ netvā “tevīsati dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1028_0: Tesanti brahmakāyikādīnaṃ. Vitthārenāti catūsupi santatisīsesu rūpānaṃ asaṅkhipanena.
anya-e0104n0:1029_0: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānanti ettha kiñcāpi kāmabhave opapātikā vuttā na santi,
anya-e0104n0:1029_2: aṇḍajagabbhaseyyakehi pana opapātikasaṃsedajā sesā hontīti sesaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1029_3: Atha vā brahmakāyikādikehi opapātikehi vuttehi sese sandhāya “sesaopapātikāna”nti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1029_5: Aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ pana nāmarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ rūpamissakaviññāṇaniddese vuttanayena sakkā dhammagaṇanato viññātunti na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1030_0: Paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututoti paṭisandhicittena saha uppannarūpesu tejodhātuto.
anya-e0104n0:1030_2: Tesaṃ ajjhoharitāhārena anugate sarīre āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhaddhakanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1030_4: Avakaṃsato dve aṭṭhakāneva utucittasamuṭṭhānāni hontīti sasaddakālaṃ sandhāya “ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1030_5: Pubbeti yaṃ pubbe santatidvayādikaṃ sattakapariyosānaṃ rūpaṃ idha vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1030_6: taṃ ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu uppajjamānameva vuttanti katvā āha “pubbe…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1031_2: Catuddisā vavatthāpitāti aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasīsā mūlena catūsu disāsu vavatthāpitā.
anya-e0104n0:1031_3: Aññamaññaṃ āliṅgetvā ṭhitā bhinnavāhanikā viya ca.
anya-e0104n0:1032_4: Kammaviññāṇapaccayā pana tadāpi ubhayaṃ hotīti sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1032_7: Pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyanti bhavaṅgādijanakakammato aññena rūpuppattikālaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1032_10: Bhavaṅgādiuppattikāle hi taṃjanakena kammunā uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1032_11: so ca vipāko kammaviññāṇapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1032_12: Sahajātaviññāṇapaccayānapekkhampi hi pavattiyaṃ kammena pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1032_18: Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañcāti ettha nāmarūpasaddo attano ekadesena nāmasaddena nāmasaddassa sarūpo,
anya-e0104n0:1032_21: nāmarūpasaddassa ṭhānaṃ itaresañca nāmarūpasaddānaṃ adassananti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1033_0: Vipākato aññaṃ avipākaṃ. Yato dvidhā mataṃ, tato yuttameva idanti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1034_1: saddena akusalakiriyacittakkhaṇe viya vipākacittakkhaṇepi vipākājanakakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1034_2: Vipākacittakkhaṇe pana abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā pubbe vuttanayena ubhayañca labbhatīti tādisavipākacittakkhaṇavajjanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1035_1: Suttantikapariyāyatoti paṭṭhāne rūpānaṃ upanissayapaccayassa avuttattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1035_2: Suttante pana yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1035_4: so tassa upanissayo nidānaṃ hetu pabhavoti katvā “viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpa”nti rūpassa ca viññāṇūpanissayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1035_10: Tasmā vinā abhāvo eva suttantikapariyāyato upanissayabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1035_11: Nāmassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ kammārammaṇapaṭisandhiādikāle ārammaṇapaccayova hotīti vattabbameva natthīti
anya-e0104n0:1035_13: Sasaṃsayassa hi rūpassetaṃ paccayo hotīti vutte nāmassa hotīti vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0104n0:1036_0: Pavattassa pākaṭattā apākaṭaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā pucchati “kathaṃ paneta”ntiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:1037_0: Yuttito sādhetvā suttena taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto “kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1037_2: Ettha ca “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti bhāsamānena bhagavatā yasmā upaparikkhamānānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva pavattamānaṃ dissati, na satto, na jīvo,
anya-e0104n0:1037_3: tasmā kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1037_5: Atha vā nāmarūpamattatāvacanena pavattiyā dukkhasaccamattatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1037_11: nirodhassa ca upāyena vinā anadhigantabbattāti catusaccappakāsanaṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1039_0: 641. Tanti nāmarūpaṃ. Tassāti saḷāyatanassa. Tādisassevāti katekasesasseva.
anya-e0104n0:1040_0: Idhāpi nāmanti khandhattayasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:1040_3: jīvitassa ca yathāsambhavaṃ sahajātanissayapurejātaindriyādinā saḷāyatanassa pavattamānassa ekantena paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1040_4: Rūpāyatanādīnaṃ pana sahajātanissayānupālanabhāvo natthīti aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1040_6: na ca cakkhādīnaṃ viya ekappahārenevāti aniyamato paccayabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:1040_10: Chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ettha yadipi chaṭṭhāyatanasaḷāyatanasaddānaṃ saddato sarūpatā natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1040_11: atthato pana saḷāyatanekadesova chaṭṭhāyatananti ekadesasarūpatā atthīti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1040_12: Atthatopi hi sarūpānaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ icchanti “vaṅko ca kuṭilo ca kuṭilā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1041_0: Atha vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca manāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatananti vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatanañca
anya-e0104n0:1041_1: chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatanañca manāyatanañca manāyatananti vā ekasesaṃ katvā cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ “saḷāyatana”nti
anya-e0104n0:1041_3: nāmarūpapaccayassa ca manāyatanassa vasena kataṃ atthato dassento āha “chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1041_4: Yathāvuttopi hi ekaseso atthato chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañcāti evaṃ kato nāma hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1041_5: Sabbattha ca ekasese kate ekavacananiddeso katekasesānaṃ saḷāyatanādisaddavacanīyatāsāmaññavasena katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1042_1: rūpassa ca abhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ na hotīti byatirekaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:1044_1: Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsoti ettha sattadhā paccayabhāvato ukkaṃso aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:1044_4: Avakaṃso pana dasadhā paccayabhāvato navadhā paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:1044_7: na pana sattadhā paccayabhāvato eva dvepi ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā yojetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:1046_0: “Hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā”ti etena arūpe viya asahāyaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1046_1: hadayavatthu ca nāmena saha chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hotīti ettakameva dasseti,
anya-e0104n0:1046_2: na pana yathā hadayavatthu paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1046_4: Vatthu hi nāmassa vippayuttapaccayo hoti, na nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1046_7: Pavatte arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa ṭhitippattasseva paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:1046_8: na uppajjamānassāti vippayuttaatthiavigatā ca pacchājātavippayuttādayo eva cakkhādīnaṃ yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1047_0: “Tatthevā”ti iminā “pavatte”ti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha “tattheva hi pavatte”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1047_2: Pavattiyaṃ cakkhāyatanādikassa nāmaṃ vipākapaccayo na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1048_1: Yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjatīti paṭisandhiyaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ pañcasu āyatanesu kāyāyatanameva uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1049_0: Avasesamanāyatanassāti ettha “pañcakkhandhabhave panā”ti etassa anuvattamānattā pañcavokārabhave eva
anya-e0104n0:1049_1: pavattamānaṃ pañcaviññāṇehi avasesaṃ manāyatanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1049_4: “Rūpapaccayā pañcāyatanānī”ti ayampi nayo labbhati nirodhasamāpannānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0104n0:1049_5: so pana apacurabhāvato yebhuyyena ca paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayabhūtasseva nāmarūpassa pavattiyaṃ paccayabhāvo vibhāvitoti na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1051_0: 642. Bāvīsatiyā lokiyavipākaviññāṇehi sampayuttā bāvīsatilokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā. Tato eva bāvīsati.
anya-e0104n0:1052_3: Tañhi sasantatipariyāpannakammanibbattaṃ tādisassa phassassa paccayo hoti. Rūpādīni,
anya-e0104n0:1052_4: pana bahiddhā anupādinnāni ca phassassa ārammaṇaṃ honti,
anya-e0104n0:1052_5: na tāni cakkhādīni viya sasantatipariyāpannakammakilesanimittappavattibhāvena phassassa paccayā hontīti paṭhamācariyavāde na gahitāni,
anya-e0104n0:1052_6: dutiyācariyavāde pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāve sati na sakkā vajjetunti gahitāni.
anya-e0104n0:1053_1: Ye tāva ācariyā mahāvihāravāsinova yathā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1053_6: “Chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti abhidhammabhājanīyapāḷi āruppaṃ sandhāya vuttāti “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1054_3: athāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1054_4: tathāpi sabbāyatanehi sabbaphassasambhavato āyatanabhedena phassabhedo natthīti tadabhedavasena ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya,
anya-e0104n0:1054_5: tathā pana asambhavato na yuttanti codeti “na sabbāyatanehī”tiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:1054_6: Aññassāpi vā asambhavantassa vidhānassa bodhanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ “nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1054_7: “Na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhotī”ti idameva pana ekaphassavacanassāyuttattadīpakaṃ kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1054_9: Nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhonti,
anya-e0104n0:1054_10: evaṃ na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti.
anya-e0104n0:1054_12: Parihāraṃ pana anekāyatanehi ekaphassassa sambhavatoti dassento “tatridaṃ vissajjana”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1056_2: bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ārammaṇādinā yathāsambhavaṃ paccayatte vibhāvayeti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1057_2: “Mano ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1057_3: Tathā cāti paccuppannāni rūpādīni paccuppannañca dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ rūparūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1059_1: Dvārato saḷevāti pabhavasāmaññato ekavidhāpi uppattidvārato cha eva hontīti chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1060_0: Cittabhedena ekūnanavutividhāpi idhādhippetā eva dassetuṃ “vedanāsu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1060_1: “Sesāna”nti ettha sampaṭicchanasampayuttāya cakkhusamphassādayo pañca yadipi anantarādīhi paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:1060_2: anantarādīnaṃ pana upanissaye antogadhattā santīraṇatadārammaṇānañca sādhāraṇassa tassa vasena “ekadhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1060_3: Ekekasmiṃ dvāre hi cakkhudvārādīsu uppannacakkhuviññāṇādīhi sahajātā phassā sakasakavīthīsu sampaṭicchanādīhi sampayuttavedanānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1060_4: manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva pavattānaṃ tebhūmakavipākavedanānampi sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto so phasso aṭṭhadhā paccayo hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1061_2: Tāsampi hi sahajātamanosamphasso aṭṭhadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1061_3: Paccayaṃ anupādinnampi keci icchantīti “yā panā”tiādinā manodvārāvajjanasampayuttaphassassa paccayabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1061_6: anānantarassa ca phassassa tassā tassā vipākavedanāya upanissayatā yojetabbāti.
anya-e0104n0:1063_2: imasmiṃ vā sāsane cha taṇhā dīpitā.
anya-e0104n0:1064_1: ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya ca taṇhāya tadabhinandanānuguṇo rūpādīsu pavattiākāro,
anya-e0104n0:1064_2: kevalaṃ kāmassādavasena pavattiyā visiṭṭhākārattā vuttappavattiākārato taṇhāya tividhatā.
anya-e0104n0:1065_4: khīrādidāyikā dhāti viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo cha.
anya-e0104n0:1066_1: na upanissayo viya uppādakoti uppādakassa upanissayasseva vasena “ekadhāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1066_3: Tena ca ārammaṇabhāvena taṃsabhāgo aññopi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dīpito hotīti upanissayavaseneva paccayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1067_1: tissopi pana vedanā vipākā visesena taṇhāya upanissayapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:1067_4: sukhamicceva bhāsitāti tasmā sāpi bhiyyo icchanavasena taṇhāya upanissayoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1067_5: Upekkhā pana akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhattā dukkhe avarodhetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:1067_6: itarā iṭṭhattā sukheti sā dukkhaṃ viya,
anya-e0104n0:1067_7: sukhaṃ viya ca upanissayapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1067_8: “Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti vacanena sabbassa vedanāvato paccayassa atthitāya taṇhuppattippasaṅge tannivāraṇatthamāha “vedanāpaccayā cāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1068_0: Nanu “anusayasahāyā vedanā taṇhāya paccayo”ti vacanassa abhāvā atippasaṅganivattiṃ na sakkā kātunti? Na,
anya-e0104n0:1068_2: Vaṭṭassa ca anusayavirahe abhāvato anusayasahitāva paccayoti atthato vuttamevetaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1068_3: Atha vā “avijjāpaccayā”ti anuvattamānattā anusayasahitāva paccayoti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:1068_4: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhāti cettha vedanāpaccayā eva taṇhā,
anya-e0104n0:1068_5: na vedanāya vināti ayaṃ niyamo icchito,
anya-e0104n0:1071_6: kāmo ca soti ettha kattusādhano kilesakāmassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:1071_12: Purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti purimadiṭṭhiṃ sassatabhāvena gaṇhantī upādiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1071_13: purimadiṭṭhiākārena vā uttaradiṭṭhi uppajjamānā teneva purimadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ karontī taṃ upādiyatīti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1071_14: Atha vā purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti “sassato attā”ti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1071_15: Yathā hi esā daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1071_17: Attaggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti na idaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1071_18: Loko cāti vā attaggahaṇavinimuttaṃ gahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1072_10: taṃ sīlabbataṃ asuddhimaggaṃ “suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto tathā abhinivisanto upādiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1072_12: Sīlabbatasahacaritaṃ parāmāsaṃ sīlabbatanti gahetvā āha “sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1072_21: “Attā”ti hi abhinivisantā vacanamattameva daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇhantīti atthoti.
anya-e0104n0:1073_2: vitthārato panā”ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ saṅkhepaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1073_11: evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena kāmanandī,
anya-e0104n0:1074_1: taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0104n0:1074_9: phalaṃ vipākoti nissandādiphalañceva nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1074_12: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1074_14: parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti gantabbato,
anya-e0104n0:1074_15: āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhātīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1074_16: Na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke ṭhitasseva hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1074_17: Natthi paralokoti idhaloke ṭhito paralokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1074_21: paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.
anya-e0104n0:1075_3: Te pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1075_5: pavedentīti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1075_7: parañca lokaṃ attanā eva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā pavedanasamatthā sabbaññubuddhā nāma natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1075_8: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1076_1: sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato,
anya-e0104n0:1076_2: ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1076_3: Svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1076_5: Yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā,
anya-e0104n0:1076_6: so pana bhavarāgo taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1077_0: Taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā kāmupādānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1077_1: karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā kāmupādānanti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1078_10: anattani dhammamatte “attā”ti micchābhinivesassa sukhumataradhammupādānatāya sukhumatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1078_11: Upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1080_6: vibhāgato ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1080_7: Yaṃ yassa paccayoti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa yassa bhavassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1081_1: Upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1081_3: Dutiyo pana kammabhavo sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti bhavo.
anya-e0104n0:1082_10: attano pavattikāle bhavābhimukhaṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho,
anya-e0104n0:1082_15: Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanāti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi gahaṇaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1082_16: “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettha pana “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1083_0: “Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā”ti etena ācayagāmitāya tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā
anya-e0104n0:1083_3: Vuttañhi “kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto,
anya-e0104n0:1083_4: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1083_9: pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1083_15: kāmapaccayaṭṭhānatāya “sukho saggo”ti viya kāmāti avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:1084_1: tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:1084_4: so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena “kāmo”ti vattabbo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1084_10: Tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā “saññabhavo”tipi pāṭho.
anya-e0104n0:1084_15: so ekasseva khandhassa vasena pavattattā “eko vokāro”ti vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1085_1: Kiñcāpi bhavaniddese “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti iminā cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1085_2: Puññābhisaṅkhārādayovāti pana avadhāraṇaṃ paccayadhammavisesepi atthappabhedena saṅkhārabhavaggahaṇesu attheva visesoti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1085_4: Saṅkhārabhavānaṃ dhammabhedato na saṅkhārā eva puna vuttāti “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana”nti etaṃ ayuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n0:1085_6: Parena vā dhammavisesaṃ aggahetvā punavacanaṃ coditanti codakābhilāsavasena “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1086_1: Kāmabhavādinibbattakassa kammassa kāmabhavādibhāvo phalavohārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1086_2: Sahajātaviññāṇassapi paccayabhūtaṃ avijjāhetukaṃ saṅkhāraggahaṇena yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1086_3: idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato bhavassa nibbattakaṃ upādānahetukaṃ vipaccanāya katokāsameva bhavoti adhippeto.
anya-e0104n0:1086_7: tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavoti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū”ti atidisati.
anya-e0104n0:1086_12: Antogadhe hi visuṃ aggahetvā abbhantaragate eva katvā kāmabhavādike kammūpapattibhavavasena duguṇe katvā āha “cha bhavā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1087_1: Upādānabhedākaraṇeneva ca dvādasappabhedassa saṅgahavasena saṅgahato “cha bhavā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1088_2: kukkurānañca sahabyatā vuttāti “sīlabbatupādānavato jhānabhāvanā na ijjhatī”ti maññamānā tena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1088_3: Vakkhamānena pana pakārena paccayabhāvato “taṃ na gahetabba”nti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1088_4: Asuddhimagge ca suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ sīlabbatupādānanti suddhimaggaparāmasanena rūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ nibbattanaṃ na na yujjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1089_2: evaṃ devaloke ito samiddhatarāti diṭṭhānusārena vā.
anya-e0104n0:1089_6: Kāyaduccaritādīnipīti attano adhippetānaṃ kāmānaṃ anupāyabhūtānipi kāyaduccaritādīni karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1089_10: sucaritanibbatte ca kāmabhave antogadhā evāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1089_11: Antogadhāti ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1089_12: Na hi te niravasesā kāmabhave antogadhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1091_2: arūpabhave sesaucchedavādavasena ayamattā suucchinno hotīti tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karotīti āha “ayaṃ attā nāmā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1092_2: Tattha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānavaseneva upari cattāro diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā āgatā,
anya-e0104n0:1092_3: diṭṭhigatiko pana yaṃ kiñci gahetvā yathā tathā abhinivisatīti arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1093_0: Suddhimaggaparāmasanavasena pavattitaṃ yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1093_1: jhānañca sīlabbatamicceva idhādhippetanti āha “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1093_2: Kamena avatvā sīlabbatupādānassa ante bhavapaccayatāvacanaṃ attavādupādānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ asamudācārato,
anya-e0104n0:1094_3: tasmā tāni sahajātādīsu hetupaccayaṃ apanīya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhā paccayā hontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:1094_7: taṃ pana upanissayapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ “vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1096_2: saddena “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavantī”ti sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1096_5: Jāyamānassa pana jāti jātīti upapattibhavopi asati abhāvā jātiyā paccayoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1097_7: Bhinnasantānikassa visesakāraṇassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato “ajjhattasantāne”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1097_8: Aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti attasantānagatato aññassa visesakāraṇassa anupalabbhamānattā,
anya-e0104n0:1097_9: sati ca tasmiṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ abhāvatoti pasaṅgassa dunnivāraṇato kāraṇe avisiṭṭhe phalavisesassa ayujjamānakattā.
anya-e0104n0:1098_0: Tena tenāti ñātibyasanādinā jarāmaraṇato aññena dukkhadhammena.
anya-e0104n0:1098_5: Yo hi paṭṭhāne anāgato sati bhāvā,
anya-e0104n0:1100_1: Na kevalaṃ sokādīnaṃyeva jāti paccayo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1100_2: sokādīnaṃ pana paccayattā avijjāyapi paccayo evāti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1101_0: Tesūti sokādīsu. Siddhesūti labbhamānesu. Siddhā hoti avijjā avinābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1104_4: devo devāsane nābhiramatī”ti vuttāni pañca maraṇapubbanimittānīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1104_5: Tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave bhavacchandabalena devānaṃ balavasoko uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1106_0: Āsave sādhentīti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1107_0: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ bhavacakkassa aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati.
anya-e0104n0:1107_8: pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti ādimattāya avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1107_9: “Avijjā padhānā”ti vatvā tassā padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “avijjāggahaṇenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1108_4: taṃ taṃ hitāhitaṃ pavattāti attho. Vedeti,
anya-e0104n0:1108_11: Brahmādinā vā attanā vāti vā- saddo ca-
anya-e0104n0:1109_0: Dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ suññasabhāvānaṃ suññatāya suññaṃ dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1109_1: dhuvabhāvādisuññatāya vā catubbidhampi suññataṃ ekaṃ katvā dvādasaṅgagatattā dvādasavidhāti tāya dvādasasuññatāya suññanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1110_4: Vedanā vā taṇhāsahāyāya avijjāya paccayo hotīti vedanāto avijjā,
anya-e0104n0:1110_5: avijjāto saṅkhārāti sambajjhanato vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1110_9: sokādayo ca gahitāti evampi vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttamevetaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1110_12: Avijjā dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viparītābhinivesaṃ kārentī diṭṭhicarite saṃsāre nayati,
anya-e0104n0:1110_13: tesaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ saṅkhārādipavattiṃ nayati pavattetīti saṃsāranāyikā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1111_4: adiṭṭhānaṃ purimabhave attano hetūnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ phalaṃ anuppādetvā anupacchijjanaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0104n0:1111_6: Atha vā purimabhavacakkaṃ dutiyena sambandhaṃ vuttanti vedanāsaṅkhātassa phalassa uppattiyā taṇhādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ anupacchedaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0104n0:1111_7: tasmā phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya paṭhamassa bhavacakkassa hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanatoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1111_8: Saṅkhārādīnameva vā phalānaṃ uppattiyā avijjādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ phalaṃ ajanetvā anupacchedameva,
anya-e0104n0:1111_9: viññāṇādihetūnaṃ vā saṅkhārādīnaṃ anuppabandhameva pakāseti paṭhamaṃ bhavacakkaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1111_10: na dutiyaṃ viya pariyosānampīti “phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1111_12: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”ntiādinā dhammānaṃ anupubbato pavattiyā dīpanato.
anya-e0104n0:1111_13: “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti hi ettha aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ kalalarūpaṃ vatvā tato uddhaṃ “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti saḷāyatanappavatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1111_15: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti vā upapattikkhandhānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppattiyā dīpanato.
anya-e0104n0:1111_16: Na hi ettha paṭhame viya bhavacakke āyatanānaṃ kamena uppatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1112_3: Hetuphalahetuphalavasena catuppabhedo aṅgānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti catubhedasaṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1112_4: Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā.
anya-e0104n0:1112_6: Kilesakammavipākā vipākakilesakammehi sambandhā hutvā punappunaṃ parivattantīti tesu vaṭṭanāmaṃ āropetvā “tivaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1114_0: Paritassatīti taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pariggahakaraṇavasena tassati,
anya-e0104n0:1115_0: Tassa ca sabbhāvo kariyamānatā evāti āha “kammabhave kariyamāneti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1115_1: Dukkhādīsu mohoti dukkhādīnaṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādako appahīno moho.
anya-e0104n0:1115_7: sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā”ti idaṃ yathādassitāya dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇabhājanīye vuttāya paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1115_12: Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādinā hi saṅkhārānaṃ cetanābhāvo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1115_13: Tattha paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ “cetanāsampayuttā vipākadhammattā savipākena āyūhanasaṅkhātena saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1115_14: Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti bhavassa paccayabhāvena bhavagāmibhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1115_15: kammasaṃsaṭṭhasahāyatāya kammabhāvato ca upapattibhavaṃ bhāventīti “bhavo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1115_16: Upapattibhavabhāvanākiccaṃ pana cetanāya sātisayanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā cetanā “bhavo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1115_17: Bhavābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ cetanāya sātisayanti vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “kusalā cetanā”tiādinā cetanā “saṅkhārā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1115_18: Tasmā tena tena pariyāyena ubhayaṃ ubhayattha vattuṃ yuttanti natthettha virodho.
anya-e0104n0:1115_19: Tassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanāti “tassa sutaṃ hoti ‘cātumahārājikā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā’ti”ādisutānusārena
anya-e0104n0:1115_23: Āyūhanāvasāneti tīsupi atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne.
anya-e0104n0:1116_1: Bhavantarassa atītabhavassa iminā paccuppannabhavena paṭisandhānaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1117_0: Dvīsu atthavikappesu vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre “tassa pubbabhāgā”ti āha,
anya-e0104n0:1117_3: Daharassa cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā na hotīti “idha paṭipakkattā āyatanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1117_4: “Kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito”ti etena kammassa paccayabhūtaṃ sammohaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0104n0:1118_3: anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1118_9: kammabhavo ca vipākabhavo ca kammavaṭṭañca vipākavaṭṭañca,
anya-e0104n0:1127_0: Satte ca nupalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassata”nti. ;
anya-e0104n0:1128_0: Tattha kammāneva vipākaṃ sambharanti vaḍḍhentīti kammasambhārā,
anya-e0104n0:1128_5: avijjādayo ca kammasambhārāti kammañca kammasambhārā ca kammasambhārāti ekasesavasena kammasambhāraggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1128_6: Dasa dhammā kammanti avijjādayopi kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā,
anya-e0104n0:1129_2: tisandhiādivasena vā samuppannaṃ idaṃ bhavacakkanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1129_6: vikārāpattidīpakena calasaddena ca adīpitaṃ kālantaraṭṭhāyitābhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:1129_9: “Ṭhānaso hetuso”ti ettha evaṃ vuttaṃ vā ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1129_10: aññampi tassa tassa sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambhāro,
anya-e0104n0:1129_13: hetunirodhā ca vaṭṭacchede dhamme ca taṃnirodhāya desite satīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1129_14: Brahmacariyaṃ idha brahmacariyidha satte cāti ettha ca-
anya-e0104n0:1129_19: ucchedo vā siyāti nupalabbhante tasmiṃ neva ucchedo na sassatanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1130_0: 655. Saccappabhavatoti saccato, saccānaṃ vā pabhavato ca.
anya-e0104n0:1131_0: Kusalākusalaṃ kammanti vaṭṭakathāya vattamānattā sāsavanti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:1131_2: sabbampi taṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1131_4: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā”ti hi cetanācetanāsampayuttavisesaṃ akatvā vuttanti,
anya-e0104n0:1131_5: ariyasaccavisesaṃ vā akatvā samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1131_6: Saccavibhaṅge hi sabbepi kilesā sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ “samudayasacca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1132_3: Sammohetīti dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adentī tassa paṭicchādanavasena sammoheti.
anya-e0104n0:1132_5: Aññamaññañca upatthambheti aññamaññasannissayena vinā ṭhātuṃ asakkontā dve naḷakalāpā viya.
anya-e0104n0:1132_7: Jāyamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānā jāti te janentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “khandhe ca janetī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1132_9: Pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhatīti etthāpi “khandhe janetī”ti ettha vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1132_17: tehi siddhāya avijjāya sahitehi saṅkhārehi paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1132_18: Cuticittaṃ vā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hotīti “paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1132_19: Taṃ pana cuticittaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārarahitaṃ bhavantarassa paccayo na hotīti sasahāyattadassanatthamāha “sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1133_1: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhārānaṃ paccayuppannatādassanena “ko nu kho abhisaṅkharotīti esa no kallo pañho”ti dasseti,
anya-e0104n0:1133_3: Attā bhavato bhavantaraṃ saṅkamatīti dassanaṃ attasaṅkantidassanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1133_5: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ abhedato eko attāti gahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā,
anya-e0104n0:1133_6: taṃ yamakatālakandaṃ bhindantena viya “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamattameta”nti vacanena nivāritaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1133_8: Sokādayopi hi paccayāyattā avasavattinoti “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ soka…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1134_1: “Salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasenā”ti etena sabbappakārena dhammānaṃ yāthāvato adassanamāha tadubhayavinimuttassa
anya-e0104n0:1134_7: Gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viyāti bhedanatthaṃ paccamāne gaṇḍe tassa upari jāyamānā khuddakapīḷakā viya,
