anya-e0104n0:1341_3: “Kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī”ti adhippāyenāha “kimettha manāpa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1341_4: Idampīti yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi.
anya-e0104n0:1341_5: Aṅgulaṅgulantareti aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1341_6: Tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ paramasukhumabhāvappattaṃ aṃsuṃ sandhāyāha “aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1342_1: Tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1342_2: ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1342_3: Upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1343_2: idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena bhinditvā dassento “tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1344_1: Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpanti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:1345_5: Tassa nissayabhāvato hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena “manodvāre”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1347_0: Ayamatthoti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atiittarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0104n0:1348_2: Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1348_7: Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
anya-e0104n0:1349_4: Dvīhi cittehi samohitāti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0104n0:1349_6: tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:1349_7: ekena cittena saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.
anya-e0104n0:1350_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā.
anya-e0104n0:1350_1: Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā.
anya-e0104n0:1350_2: Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhikā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā.
anya-e0104n0:1351_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggāti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā.
anya-e0104n0:1351_1: Ye ca bhaggā anāgateti ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti.
anya-e0104n0:1351_2: Tadantarā niruddhānanti tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1351_3: Vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇeti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1352_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1352_2: Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1352_3: Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato
anya-e0104n0:1352_5: Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati,
anya-e0104n0:1352_6: phusso jīvatī”ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti,
anya-e0104n0:1353_3: Puñjo natthi anāgate yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1353_6: Yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:1354_0: Bhaṅgo nesaṃ purakkhatoti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato,
anya-e0104n0:1355_3: Bhaggā gacchantudassananti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti.
anya-e0104n0:1356_1: “Vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpa”nti iminā sayameva uppajjanakadhammatāya “dhammatārūpa”nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1356_3: Lohaṃ nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1356_4: Tattha ayo rajataṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni.
anya-e0104n0:1356_8: Tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha “loha”nti gahitanti.
anya-e0104n0:1356_13: Maṇīti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo maṇiviseso.
anya-e0104n0:1358_3: Iminā nayenāti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena.
anya-e0104n0:1358_7: Tattha sītabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0104n0:1361_0: Yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā,
anya-e0104n0:1361_2: tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento “kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1361_3: Ye ime sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0104n0:1362_0: Pavattaṃ cittanti sattasu ṭhānesu sammasanavasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1362_2: Taṃ yuttataranti taṃ ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ yuttataraṃ āsannabhāvena vibhūtataraṃ rūpasattake sammasanaṃ saha gahetvā sammasanassa vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:1362_3: Apica rūpasattake sammasanassa rūpadhammesu sātisayaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā pavattattā tabbisayaṃ arūpasammasanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1362_5: na pana apubbakesādisammasanaṃ katvā tabbisayaṃ pavattitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1362_6: Tathā sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ navaṃ navaṃ eva siyā,
anya-e0104n0:1362_7: pubbe gahitaṃ sammasanavisayaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññassa sammasanavisayassa gaṇhanato.
anya-e0104n0:1363_4: Yamakato sammasati nāma nāmarūpadhamme ārabbha yugaḷavasena sammasanassa pavattanato.
anya-e0104n0:1363_5: Ayañhi pubbe rūpasattakavasena sammasitvā ṭhitopi idāni ādānanikkhepādivasena sammasitvāva taṃ sammasati.
anya-e0104n0:1364_4: Sammasitasammasitacittasammasanena tesaṃ khaṇikabhāvassa vibhāvanato idaṃ sammasanaṃ “khaṇikato sammasana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1365_1: Idameva ca sammasanaṃ diguṇitaṃ anekasammasanapaṭipāṭisambhavato “paṭipāṭito sammasana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1365_3: Tathā sati paṭipāṭisammasanapasutā eva bhāvanā siyā,
anya-e0104n0:1365_7: arūpadhammesu ca aniccādilakkhaṇāni suṭṭhu vibhūtāni honti,
anya-e0104n0:1365_10: Ṭhapetabbanti ca na ekādasamaṃ dvādasamena sammasitabbanti paṭipāṭito sammasanassa paricchedadassanaparaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1365_12: tasmā punapi rūpaṃ pariggahetvā yāva dasamacittasammasanā bhāvanamanuyuñjateva.
anya-e0104n0:1366_1: Visuṃ sammasananayo nāma natthīti aniccādimanasikāravinimutto añño vipassanāmanasikāro natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1366_2: Vipassanāya ca diṭṭhiādivikkhambhanā idha diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayoti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n0:1366_3: Vipassanāya eva hi pavattivisesena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayo ijjhantīti dassento “yaṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1366_6: Sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittenāti sattasaññāya vikkhambhanavasena pavattacittena diṭṭhi nuppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:1366_9: so diṭṭhiyā vikkhambhitāya vikkhambhito eva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1366_15: Taṇhāti idha sukhumā nikanti adhippetāti āha “taṇhāya…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1368_0: Mama vipassanāti imassāpi attaniyasaññitāya vipassanāya sāmibhūto attā parāmasīyatīti diṭṭhigāhatāti
anya-e0104n0:1368_1: tathā “gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1368_3: maggena pana asamugghāṭitattā anoḷārikāya ca diṭṭhiyā vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1370_0: Vipassituṃ sakkomīti tattha samatthatāpadesena guṇavisesayogato vipassanāya assādetabbatā dassīyati,
anya-e0104n0:1370_2: Tasmā vipassanto eva kālaṃ vītināmessāmīti vipassanaṃ assādentassāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1371_0: Yasmā diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāmettha visesato anattānupassanāya hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1371_1: tasmā taṃ dassentena “sace saṅkhārā”tiādinā anattānupassanāvidhiṃ vatvā yasmā pana anattato anupassantena
anya-e0104n0:1371_2: saṅkhārā aniccatopi dukkhatopi anupassitabbā eva tadupabrūhanato,
anya-e0104n0:1372_1: Khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanake saṅkhāre passantassa kuto mānassa avasaro.
anya-e0104n0:1373_2: dukkhavatthuto ca dukkhabhūte saṅkhāre passantassa tattha īsakampi abhirato hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1373_6: vuttanayena paṭipāṭito sammasanaṃ pasutassa yogino yadā anattānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:1374_0: Yadā pana aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:1375_0: Yadā pana dukkhānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:1375_5: Evaṃ tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ kiccavisesavasena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādīni honti.
anya-e0104n0:1375_6: Tena vuttaṃ “iti ayaṃ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1375_8: tasmā visuṃ sammasananayo natthīti na vattabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1376_1: Sabbākāratoti idha viya ekadesena avatvā sabbākārato sarūpato,
anya-e0104n0:1376_6: Tappaṭipakkhe dhammeti yā anupassanā idha sambhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:1376_7: tāsaṃ paṭipakkhe dhamme niccasaññādike pajahati vikkhambheti.
anya-e0104n0:1377_4: Yāya paññāya ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti passati,
anya-e0104n0:1377_6: Bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya tassā pāripūrīti ghanasaññāya pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1377_7: tato pubbe aparipuṇṇatāya taṃ na hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1377_10: anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ disvā tattheva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā vayānupassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1377_14: tasmiṃ pavatte taṇhāya cassa cittaṃ na namatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1377_17: rūpasattakādivasena vā pariggahitassa taṃtaṃparicchedato paraṃ aññabhāvadassanaṃ vipariṇāmānupassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1378_3: niccabhāvena ca saṅkhārānaṃ sakiccaparicchedatāya saviggahaṃ viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1378_8: Etesañhi nimittādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena aniccānupassanādayo animittādināmehi vuttāti aniccānupassanādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1378_9: pahātabbā niccasaññādayo viya nimittaggāhādayova paṭipakkhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1378_10: Rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā saṅkhārā eva bhijjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1378_12: na añño koci atthīti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca sā dhammesu ca vipassanāti adhipaññādhammavipassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1378_13: tāya niccasārādiādānavasena pavattaṃ abhinivesaṃ sataṇhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:1378_18: tāya kassacipi ālayanissayaadassanato ālayābhinivesaṃ tathāpavattaṃ taṇhaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:1378_20: tāya aniccādīsu appaṭisaṅkhātattā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ avijjaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:1378_23: Tassā hi vasena tassa padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasaṅkhārehi cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati,
anya-e0104n0:1378_25: Aniccānupassanādayo satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthato vibhattāti,
anya-e0104n0:1378_26: parato ca saṃvaṇṇīyantīti idha na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1380_6: “Kiñci paṭividdhaṃ kiñci appaṭividdha”nti iminā tesaṃ ekadesapaṭivedhamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1380_10: vipariṇāmānupassanā ca ekadesena siddhā nāma honti,
anya-e0104n0:1382_3: kāḷakāpagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesavigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhīti āha “niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1382_4: Anekākāravokārasaṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇasammasanassa katattā vuttaṃ “sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1382_6: Tasseva hi thirabhāvāya itare sammasanavisesāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1382_10: Vitthārato bhāvanāvidhānaṃ parato vattukāmo “saṅkhepato tāva ārabhatī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1383_7: Udayadassanañcettha yāvadeva vayadassanatthanti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane
anya-e0104n0:1383_8: paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti āha “udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1384_1: Ayaṃ hi jātasaddo khaṇattayasamaṅgitaṃ sandhāya vutto “ye dhammā jātā bhūtā”tiādīsu viya, na atītaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1385_0: “Ye te jātā na te santi, ye na jātā tattheva te;
anya-e0104n0:1386_0: Laddhattabhāvā no bhaggā, teva santi sabhāvato”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:1387_1: nāpi jātatāmattaṃ “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:1387_4: Taṃ pana ādito duppariggahanti santatipaccuppannavasena vipassanābhiniveso kātabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1387_6: Paccayalakkhaṇapapañcaṃ anāmasitvā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayoti nibbattanasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ udayo uppādo.
anya-e0104n0:1387_7: Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayoti vipariṇāmasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ vayo vināso.
anya-e0104n0:1387_11: Kiñcāpi kalāpasammasanādīsu jātijarāmaraṇasīsena jātijarāmaraṇavanto dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:1387_15: nipphannatā ca anuññātā viya hotīti taṃ pariharituṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu bhavapariyosānāva desanā katā.
anya-e0104n0:1388_1: Iminā pāḷinayenāti imāya “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”ntiādinā dassitāya pāḷigatiyā.
anya-e0104n0:1388_5: Svāyaṃ vikāro yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ abhinavāvaṭṭhānajarā viya navabhāvāpagamoti āha “abhinavākāra”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1388_7: Anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:1388_10: Yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1388_11: evaṃ atītepi addhanīti dassento “nirujjhamānassāpī”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo,
anya-e0104n0:1388_12: uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1388_13: Tattha rāsitoti rāsibhāvena samussito puñjo rāsi.
anya-e0104n0:1389_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato dassetuṃ “puna yānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1389_5: Tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1389_8: Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1390_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1390_1: Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1390_4: Asati ca avijjupanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavo evāti.
anya-e0104n0:1390_12: Tattha addhānavasena pageva udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
anya-e0104n0:1390_13: Pañca lakkhaṇānīti avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhātalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:1390_14: Tesaṃ atthitā hi rūpassa udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:1391_0: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1391_7: Tasmā taṃ addhāvasena pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
anya-e0104n0:1391_8: Pañca lakkhaṇānīti idha avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho,
anya-e0104n0:1391_9: rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:1391_11: rūpassa accantanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:1392_9: ca vacanato phasso vedanā saññā saṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:1392_12: abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:1393_0: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativaseneva,
anya-e0104n0:1393_2: Tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1393_3: Apare panāhu “paccayato udayabbayadassane atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā vedanāsambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati,
anya-e0104n0:1393_5: Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati,
anya-e0104n0:1393_11: vayato ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā khaṇato udayabbayā upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0104n0:1393_12: Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante
anya-e0104n0:1393_13: khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1394_0: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:1394_4: Tattha evampi rūpassa udayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayāpi. Taṇhā…pe… kamma…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1394_6: Evampi rūpassa vayoti evaṃ vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhāpi taṇhā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1394_7: āhāranirodhāpi rūpassa vayo anuppādoti paccayato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1394_8: Evampi rūpaṃ udetīti evaṃ vuttanayena nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nippajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1394_9: Evaṃ vuttanayeneva vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passanto kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi
anya-e0104n0:1394_10: veti nirujjhatīti khaṇato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1395_1: Evaṃ manasi karoto na yāva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:1395_2: tāva udayabbayā suṭṭhu pākaṭā na hontīti katvā vuttaṃ “iti kirime dhammā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1395_5: Paṭhamañhi paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ disvā atha atītānāgate nayaṃ neti.
anya-e0104n0:1395_11: tesampi attano phalaṃ pati paṭicca samuppādabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1396_5: khandhānaṃ nirodhaṃ passatīti ettha yadetaṃ dassananti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1396_7: Ettha ca yathā avijjādisamudayanirodhato khandhānaṃ samudayanirodhassa aññattā “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādivacanabhedo kato,
anya-e0104n0:1396_8: na evaṃ nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇehi khandhānaṃ udayabbayassa bhedo atthi abhinnādhikaraṇattāti “nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0104n0:1396_9: passanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passatī”ti vacanabhedaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1396_14: tasmā tāni passanto khaṇato khandhānaṃ udayabbaye passati nāmāti “yaṃ panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1397_12: Dukkhasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti ekadesadassanena pabbatasamuddādidassanakānaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:1397_14: “Paccayānuppādenā”ti etena paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho idha paccayanirodhoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1397_16: Yañcassa udayabbayadassananti yaṃ assa yogino paccayato,
anya-e0104n0:1397_19: tappadhāno vā vitakkādidhammapuñjo maggo vāyaṃ lokikoti niyyānānulomato lokiko maggo evāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1397_20: Iti tasmā maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti sabhāvāvabodhato.
anya-e0104n0:1397_23: Atha vā yathāvutto sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto maggo ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto asammohasabhāvo attānampi pakāseti padīpo viyāti maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1398_2: “Avijjāsamudayā”tiādinā avijjādīsu santesūti ayamattho vuttoti āha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti avabodhato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1398_7: Paṭiccasamuppannassa ca pākaṭatā paccayākārapākaṭatāya eva “imassetaṃ phala”nti avabodhato.
anya-e0104n0:1399_1: Purimapurimānaṃ nirodho uttaruttarānaṃ uppādānubandhoti ayamattho paccayato udayadassanena sijjhamāno ekattanayādhigamāya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1399_5: Saṅkhārā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantīti ayamattho khaṇato udayadassanena sijjhamāno nānattanayādhigamāya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1399_9: Paccayato udayabbayadassanena paccaye sati phalassa bhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:1399_10: asati abhāvoti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthitāmatteneva te dhammā kāraṇanti abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1399_15: Paccayato udayadassanena tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1399_16: uppajjamānā ca paccayānurūpameva uppajjantīti hetuphalassa hetuanurūpato siddhiyā akiriyadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatāvāti āha “paccayato panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1400_1: Paccayato udayaṃ passato paccaye sati sabhāve sati phalassa sambhavoti atthitāmattena upakārakatāti saṅkhatānaṃ nirīhatā,
anya-e0104n0:1400_2: asati ca abhāvoti paccayādhīnavuttitā ca viññāyamānā attasuññataṃ vibhāvetīti āha “paccayato cassa…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1400_4: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti khaṇato udayabbayadassanena saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayato paricchinnatāya viññāyamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:1400_12: Uppajjitvā bhijjantā saṅkhārā uppādato uddhaṃ jarābhaṅgāvatthantaruppattiyā nirantaraṃ vibādhīyanteva.
anya-e0104n0:1400_13: Sā ca nesaṃ vibādhiyamānatā sammā udayabbayadassanena vibhūtā hotīti āha “dukkha…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1401_1: atha kho pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādisaññitaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇampi pākabhāvaviddhaṃ sabhāvāvacchinnaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1401_5: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇassa tāvakālikattampīti uppādādisaṅkhatalakkhaṇassa uppādakkhaṇādiparittakālikatāpi khaṇantarānavaṭṭhānato tassa.
anya-e0104n0:1402_4: Tattha udake daṇḍena katalekhā udake daṇḍarāji.
anya-e0104n0:1402_5: Ussāvabinduādayo pañca kiccāpi uttaruttari atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvadassanatthaṃ nidassitā,
anya-e0104n0:1402_8: Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca bandhakhuradhārā
anya-e0104n0:1402_15: Māyādayo hi maṇiādivasena dissamānā ataṃsabhāvatāya asārā.
anya-e0104n0:1402_20: Gandhabbadevaputtānaṃ kīḷanicchāvasena nagaraṃ viya ākāse upaṭṭhānamattaṃ gandhabbanagaraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1403_1: “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādipāḷinayānusārena vā yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhā bhāvanāvidhi āraddho, ettāvatā.
anya-e0104n0:1403_7: tampi attano dhammatāya eva vinassati ahetukattā vināsassa.
anya-e0104n0:1403_12: “uppannañca idaṃ vayaṃ upetī”ti vayassa ca iminā yathāvuttena paccakkhakaraṇākārena.
anya-e0104n0:1403_15: Kalāpasammasanādivasena pavattaṃ sammasanaṃ na nippariyāyena vipassanāsamaññaṃ labhati,
anya-e0104n0:1403_16: udayabbayānupassanādivasena pavattameva labhatīti āha “yassādhigamā āraddhavipassakoti saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1405_11: Tassa pana paṭipattiyā garahitabbataṃ dassento “vippaṭipannakassā”ti āha. Ca-
anya-e0104n0:1405_13: Nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassāti vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassa.
anya-e0104n0:1405_15: Atha vā vippaṭipannakassāti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena vigarahitapaṭipattikassa.
anya-e0104n0:1405_21: Sā pana yuttappayuttatā samathavasenāpi hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1405_22: Uppajjantiyeva na nuppajjanti aññathā maggāmaggañāṇasseva asambhavato.
anya-e0104n0:1406_1: tena dhammuddhaccena vipassanāvīthito ukkamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ pavattitaṃ mānasaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1406_3: īdisaṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento mama ariyamaggoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1406_5: Nibbānanti gaṇhanto tattha pavattadhamme maggaphalabhāvena gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n0:1406_7: Tato vikkhepo uddhaccanti tato obhāsahetu yo vikkhepo,
anya-e0104n0:1407_1: nappajānāti “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti saññāya aniccatādivasena manasikārasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1408_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti,
anya-e0104n0:1408_6: tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
anya-e0104n0:1408_7: so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
anya-e0104n0:1410_1: bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti, hoti so, āvuso,
anya-e0104n0:1410_2: samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1411_5: sā vipassanābhiratiākārena upaṭṭhahantī adhimānikena “dhammo”ti gayhatīti āha “nikanti ‘dhammo’ti nikantiṃ āvajjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1412_3: Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:1412_4: itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati,
anya-e0104n0:1412_9: Dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vuttaṃ viya dissatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1412_11: Ukkantā nāma hoti yoginā “maggappattomhī”ti adhimānena vissaṭṭhattā,
anya-e0104n0:1412_12: tassa vā yogino vipassanā tato eva vīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1413_3: Tassa kira abbhantarepi ekā bhitti hoti bahipi,
anya-e0104n0:1413_6: visadañāṇassa obhāsena pharitaṭṭhāne rūpagatañca dibbacakkhuno viya paññāyanti.
anya-e0104n0:1414_0: Evaṃ obhāsassa vemattatāya vatthuṃ dassetvā cirakālavippalambane vatthuṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1414_1: Tattha ayaṃ pana vipassanupakkilesoti vakkhamānappakāraṃ sandhāyāha,
anya-e0104n0:1416_0: Pacchā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ viññāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojessāmīti cintitattā vuttaṃ “avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1416_1: tassa ca padhānattā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1416_2: Ayaṃ dhammoti ayaṃ ariyamaggānugato paṭisambhidādhammoti therassa ajjhāsayavasena vadati.
anya-e0104n0:1416_7: Dosacaritassa hi sūrassāpi sahasā bhayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1416_8: Tenassa khīṇāsavatthero ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “iminā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti hatthinimmāpanādimakāsi.
anya-e0104n0:1417_10: Ativisadanti nisitabhāvena ativiya paṭutaraṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1418_2: Yasmā udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena pañca pītiyo uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1418_5: Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1419_0: Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷakāni aññamaññāviyoginīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannā eva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena
anya-e0104n0:1419_12: tādisehi manussavisesehi anubhavitabbatānativattanato dibbā ratipi saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n0:1420_8: Vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya saṅkhepattho.
anya-e0104n0:1420_10: Tattha yato yatoti rūpato vā arūpato vā.
anya-e0104n0:1421_1: Yasmā taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītarūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo,
anya-e0104n0:1422_4: atha kho kilesakālussiyāpagamena sampayuttānaṃ ativiya pasannabhāvahetubhūtā.
anya-e0104n0:1423_0: Purimuppannabhāvanābalasaṃsiddhaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhato kosajjato paggaṇhanato paggaho.
anya-e0104n0:1424_1: Supatiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhavigamena tena acalanīyatāya suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā.
anya-e0104n0:1424_3: Acalabhāveneva pabbatarājasadisāti tīhipi padehi supatiṭṭhitameva dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1424_5: Yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānanti yaṃ yaṃ attano upatiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:1424_8: Dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa upaṭṭhahante paralokasaññite satte sandhāyāha
anya-e0104n0:1424_13: Yadaggena hi sati ārammaṇaṃ okkhanditvā upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:1425_0: Vicinitavisayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā.
anya-e0104n0:1425_2: Manodvārāvajjanacittasampayuttā cetanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā “āvajjanupekkhā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1425_3: Udayabbayānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato tadanupassanāyaṃ majjhattabhūtā idha vipassanupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1425_4: Te pana udayabbayā sabbasaṅkhārānanti āha “sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1425_6: sūratikkhabhāvo ca sabbaññutaññāṇapurecarā viya tadanucarañāṇassa tathābhāvena daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1426_1: Obhāsādayo vipassanāya vijambhanabhūtā tassā alaṅkāro viya hontīti āha “obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1427_3: Na vāpi hi upakkilesā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1427_5: “Na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā nikanti uppannapubbā”ti idaṃ dhammasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1427_7: Na hi so tadā taṃ “nikantī”ti jānāti,
anya-e0104n0:1427_9: Tasmā evamassa siyā “na vata me evarūpā bhāvanābhirati uppannapubbā,
anya-e0104n0:1428_1: Upakkilesavatthutāyāti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthutāya uppattiṭṭhānatāya.
anya-e0104n0:1428_4: evaṃ nikantipi diṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “upakkilesavatthu cā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1428_6: Attavādī hi “ahaṃbuddhinibandhano”ti parikappito attā obhāsassa sāmibhūto “mamā”ti sāmivacanassa visayabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1428_7: gahitoti āha “mama obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1428_8: Obhāsassa manāpaggahaṇamukhena tena attānaṃ seyyādito dahatīti vuttaṃ “manāpo vata obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato mānagāho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1428_13: sā ca obhāsādīsu taṇhādigāhoti dassento “obhāsādīsu kampati…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1429_1: Obhāse vā visayabhūte upakkilesehi cittaṃ vikampatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1431_5: Ayaṃ kho soti yo so ācariyena kammaṭṭhānadānakāle udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye uppajjatīti vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1431_6: ayaṃ kho so obhāso uppannoti upakkilesavatthubhāvavavatthānaṃ dassetvā idānissa vipassanāya visayabhāvūpanayanavidhiṃ dassento “so kho panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1431_8: tasmiṃ siddhe itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1431_9: Dutiyanaye pana obhāsādike nissāya uppajjanakadiṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ugghāṭanasamugghāṭanapariyādānavasena manasikāravidhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1431_11: Arūpasattake “sace saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyu”ntiādi sabbasaṅkhārasaṅgaṇhanavasena sāmaññato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1431_13: Seso manasikāravidhi tattha vuttanayovāti āha “sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1432_0: Obhāsaṃ “netaṃ mamā”ti samanupassanto taṇhāgāhato cittaṃ visodheti,
anya-e0104n0:1433_0: Imāni dasa ṭhānānīti imāni yathāvuttāni obhāsādīni dasa upakkilesakāraṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:1433_1: Paññā yassa pariccitāti yassa yogino paññā obhāsādīsu aniccatādiggahaṇavasena paricitavatī pariggahetvā upaparikkhitvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0104n0:1435_1: diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇena vā diṭṭhiyā visodhane dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti dukkhasaccapariyāpannassa nāmarūpassa vavatthānato.
anya-e0104n0:1440_2: Sikhāppatti panassa udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ attaṭṭhamānaṃvasena jātāti āha “aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1440_4: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭhannanti cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1440_6: tadanusārena itaralakkhaṇāni ca vibhāventīyeva udayabbayānupassanā pavattatīti katvā “vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_8: Tayidaṃ tassa sabbaso tīraṇapariññābhāvameva maññamānehi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1440_14: sā eva ariyamaggo paṭipajjati etāyāti paṭipadā cāti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1440_15: Taṃ pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1440_17: Yato tadavigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatā eva honti.
anya-e0104n0:1440_18: Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhapahānaṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0104n0:1440_19: Asati ca paṭipakkhapahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā,
anya-e0104n0:1440_33: Tasmāti yasmā upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇādinavavidhañāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, tasmā.
anya-e0104n0:1441_1: “Upakkilesavimutta”nti visesanena vibhāvitamatthaṃ anavabujjhanto codako “puna udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyo”ti pucchati.
anya-e0104n0:1441_3: pageva nibbattitattā pakkassa pacanaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1441_4: Atha vā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇādihetupaṭipāṭiggahaṇavasena tamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo ācariyova kathetukamyatāvasena “kimatthiyo”ti pucchati.
anya-e0104n0:1441_7: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayameva passati,
anya-e0104n0:1441_10: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “udayabbayañāṇaṃ lakkhaṇattayavisayaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1441_11: Udayabbaye pana paṭividdhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1441_18: avasavattanākāro ca vibhūtataro hotīti kāraṇabhāvena udayabbayañāṇe yogassa lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇatthatā veditabbā,
anya-e0104n0:1441_21: Tañhi obhāsādiuppattihetutāya tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattampi diṭṭhiādīhi upakkiliṭṭhattā kuṇṭhaṃ avisadameva jātaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1442_2: “Kissa amanasikārā”ti hi idaṃ “kena paṭicchannattā”ti pucchitassa paṭicchādakassa hetupucchā.
anya-e0104n0:1442_3: Santatiyā hissa paṭicchannattā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:1442_4: sā ca santati udayabbayāmanasikārena paṭicchādikā jātā.
anya-e0104n0:1442_6: te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātā.
anya-e0104n0:1442_8: te ca ghanā nānādhātuvinibbhogāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātāti.
anya-e0104n0:1442_9: Udayabbayaṃ passato na udayāvatthā vayāvatthaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n0:1442_12: aññova vayakkhaṇoti ekopi dhammo khaṇavasena bhedato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:1442_15: Tattha santatiyā vikopitāyāti pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññoññabhāvasallakkhaṇena santatiyā ugghāṭitāya.
anya-e0104n0:1442_16: Na hi sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa dhammā sambandhabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0104n0:1442_17: atha kho ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1443_0: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasi katvāti yathāpariggahitaudayabbayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ paṭipīḷiyamānataṃ vibādhiyamānataṃ manasi karitvā.
anya-e0104n0:1443_2: Ekasmiñhi iriyāpathe uppannassa dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1443_3: evaṃ sesāpīti iriyāpathānaṃ taṃtaṃdukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve yāthāvato ñāte tesaṃ dukkhapaṭicchādakabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1443_4: ugghāṭito nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya pākaṭabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1443_10: aññā vedanā”tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:1443_13: Yā hesā aññamaññūpatthaddhesu samuditesu rūpārūpadhammesu ekattābhinivesavasena aparimadditasaṅkhārehi gayhamānā samūhaghanatā,
anya-e0104n0:1443_14: tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato gayhamānā kiccaghanatā,
anya-e0104n0:1443_15: tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato gayhamānā ārammaṇaghanatā ca,
anya-e0104n0:1443_16: tā dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānā hatthena parimajjiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilayaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0104n0:1443_17: “yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā ete dhammā dhammamattā”ti anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1444_3: Yathāha “rūpaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ, vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
anya-e0104n0:1444_11: Ettha ca purimena jātijarāmaraṇasabbhāvato aniccanti dasseti,
anya-e0104n0:1444_20: Hutvā abhāvo hi pākabhāvato bhinno viddhaṃsābhāvattā tattha ca aniccalakkhaṇaṃ niruḷhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1444_21: Aniccākāro hi dukkhānattākārehi viya uppādākārato ca visiṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:1444_22: Tathā hi saddassa viddhaṃsābhāvo saṅkhatabhāvenapi sādhīyati.
anya-e0104n0:1445_3: Apica yathā niccapaṭikkhepato aniccanti niccākārapaṭikkhepato yathāvutto abhāvākārasaṅkhāto aniccākāro aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1445_4: evaṃ sukhapaṭikkhepato dukkhanti sukhākārapaṭikkhepato abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanākārasaṅkhāto dukkhākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1445_5: tathā attapaṭikkhepato anattāti attākārapaṭikkhepato avasavattanākārasaṅkhāto anattākāro anattalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1445_6: Te yime tayopi ākārā asabhāvadhammattā khandhapariyāpannā na honti.
anya-e0104n0:1445_7: Khandhehi vinā anupalabbhanīyato khandhavinimuttāpi na honti.
anya-e0104n0:1445_8: Khandhe pana upādāya vohāravasena labbhamānā tadādīnavavibhāvanāya visesakāraṇabhūtā tajjāpaññattivisesāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1446_1: “Udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkhetī”ti idaṃ tadatthe tabbohāravasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1449_3: Paguṇā ca bhāvanā vikkhepābhāvato ārammaṇe appitā viya pavattatīti ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ lahuupaṭṭhānatā dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1449_4: Saṅkhāresu pana udayabbayavasena lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu udayadassanañca “uppādavato vināso”ti yāvadeva
anya-e0104n0:1449_5: vayadassanatthaṃ tassa nibbidāvahattāti vaye evassa ābhogasamannāhāro manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:1449_6: tena uppādādiṃ muñcitvā vayamevārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1449_16: Keci pana “pavattaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ avicchedena pavattanaṃ uppādova,
anya-e0104n0:1449_23: Na hi asati bhede vikappo yutto.
anya-e0104n0:1449_27: Tattha nirodhasaddo anuppādepi dissatīti bhedasaddena visesitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1449_32: Etasmiṃ ṭhāneti upakkilesavinimuttassa udayabbayañāṇassa tikkhabhāvāpattiyaṃ vuttanayena udayampi muñcitvā vayasseva manasikārakāle.
anya-e0104n0:1450_2: Yathāvuttassa vā ārammaṇassa khayavayabhedavasena paṭisaṅkhā ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā.
anya-e0104n0:1451_1: Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇanti rūpaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇanti vipassitabbabhāvena gahitaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhāragatamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1451_3: tañca bhaṅgānupassanāya adhippetattā bhaṅgato dassanamevāti āha “jānitvā khayato vayato disvāti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1452_0: Rūpārammaṇameva rūpārammaṇatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpārammaṇaṃ citta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1452_1: Rūpārammaṇatāti vā bhummatthe paccattavacananti dassento “atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1452_2: Aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti vipassanāvisayaṃ bhaṅgānupassanamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1452_7: Ubhopi vipassatīti tadubhayampi khayato vayato vipassatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1452_9: rūpassa yāva jarāmaraṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhātaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1452_10: dassanakañāṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāya bhaṅgassa anupassananti ubhayattha paññā.
anya-e0104n0:1452_11: Purimaṃ vā tadabhāve abhāvato pacchimāyaṃ pakkhipitvā pacchimā eva paññā vipassane ñāṇanti.
anya-e0104n0:1453_2: Anekehi ākārehīti aniccato anupassanādīhi anekehi ākārehi. Anu-
anya-e0104n0:1454_5: tathāpi jātijarāsu diṭṭhāsu na tathā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti yathā vayakkhaṇeti āha “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1454_8: maraṇadhammameva ca jāyatīti jāti aniccatāya ādi koṭi,
anya-e0104n0:1454_10: maraṇadhammameva ca jīratīti jarā majjhimā koṭi,
anya-e0104n0:1454_12: jarādhammameva ca bhijjatīti bhaṅgo paramā koṭīti.
anya-e0104n0:1454_13: Aniccato anupassatīti na kalāpato sammasanto viya “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti anumānavasena,
anya-e0104n0:1454_15: atha kho udayabbayañāṇānubhāvena paccakkhato upaṭṭhitesu udayavayesu vuttanayena udayaṃ muñcitvā bhaṅgadassanavaseneva aniccato anupassati,
anya-e0104n0:1454_16: evaṃ anupassato panassa niccagāhassa lesopi natthīti āha “no niccato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1454_19: kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1454_20: Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā, eva-
anya-e0104n0:1455_0: Aniccato tāva anupassanā bhaṅgānupassakassa yuttā “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1455_5: Tasmā upari nibbattetabbato ñāṇaparikammatthañca itarāsampi channaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena anupassatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1455_10: tato pana pubbabhāge anekākāravokārā anupassanā icchitabbāva.
anya-e0104n0:1455_12: “anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatī”ti āgatā tassā aṭṭhakathā ca virodhitā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1456_0: Na taṃ abhinanditabbanti taṃ saṅkhāragataṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanavasena “etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n0:1456_2: Na tattha rañjitabbanti tattha saṅkhāragate rañjanavasena na pavattitabbaṃ, kāmarāgo,
anya-e0104n0:1456_7: Sati ca vikkhambhane kathaṃ samudayoti āha “no samudeti,
anya-e0104n0:1457_1: Yathā diṭṭhaṃ sampati upaṭṭhitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ nirodheti nirodhaṃ manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1457_2: adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ anvayañāṇavasena yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0104n0:1457_3: evaṃ itarepīti anuminanto nirodheti manasikatassāpi nirodhaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1458_0: Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ vuttappakārena aniccānupassanādivasena paṭipanno.
anya-e0104n0:1458_4: tato nibbattanake khandhe ca pajahati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1458_14: Nibbattento hi kilese ādiyatīti te anibbattento kilese na ādiyati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1458_17: Anādīnavadassitāya hi saṅkhāre ādiyatīti ādīnavadassitāya te na ādiyati na gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1460_1: “Vatthusaṅkamanā”ti ettha vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato rūpādiārammaṇaṃ “vatthū”ti adhippetanti dassento “rūpassā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1462_3: Tadanvayaṃ netīti tassa paccuppannasaṅkhārabhaṅgadassino ñāṇassa anvayaṃ anugatabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavatteti.
anya-e0104n0:1463_2: Esāti yā ārammaṇanvayena ubho diṭṭhādiṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya ekabhāvena vavatthāpanā,
anya-e0104n0:1463_3: esā vayalakkhaṇe vipariṇāmalakkhaṇe vipassanā bhaṅgānupassanāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1464_1: Ārammaṇañca paṭisaṅkhātiādi bhaṅgānupassanāya duppaṭivijjhattā vuttassevatthassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1464_2: Tayidaṃ bhaṅgadassanaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattanāvabodhanena anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhāyāti taṃ dassento “suññato ca upaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1464_3: Ārammaṇassa hi bhaṅgārammaṇacittassa ca bhaṅgamanupassato visesato saṅkhārā suññā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n0:1465_0: Na catthi aññoti ettha imasmiṃ loke añño khandhavinimutto attā nāma koci natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1465_1: Tesaṃ khayaṃ passatīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe upaṭṭhahantaṃ bhaṅgaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1465_4: Maṇiṃva vijjhaṃ vajirena yoniso yathā nāma kusalo puriso upāyena maṇiṃ vijjhanto maṇissa chiddameva passati manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1465_6: evameva saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva yoniso manasi karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1465_8: Yathā vā vajirena maṇiṃ vijjhantassa viddhaṭṭhānaṃ na puna ruhati,
anya-e0104n0:1465_9: evaṃ vajirasadisena bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇena bhaṅge diṭṭhe na puna niccagāho ruhati,
anya-e0104n0:1466_0: Yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti “rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati,
anya-e0104n0:1466_1: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā”ti evamāgatā yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā,
anya-e0104n0:1466_2: “tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī”ti evaṃ vuttā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1466_5: na añño koci atthī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1466_6: ayaṃ evaṃ tidhā vuttāpi adhipaññāvipassanā nāmāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1468_1: Dubbalabhājanassa viyāti tintaāmamattikābhājanassa viya bhedameva passatīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1468_6: Evamevāti yathā udakabubbuḷakāni udakatalādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannāni na ciraṭṭhitikāni sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1468_7: evameva sabbe rūpārūpadhammā kammādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannā khaṇaṭṭhitikā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjantīti bhedameva passati.
anya-e0104n0:1469_1: nissayapabandhavasena pana ciratarupaṭṭhānanti “yathā passe marīcika”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1470_2: Na hi nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva passato sassatadiṭṭhiyā avasaro atthi.
anya-e0104n0:1470_11: kāmaguṇesu ratiyā ca sahanato abhibhavanato aratiratisahanatā.
anya-e0104n0:1474_8: amaritukāmassāpi sūrassa bhāyitabbampi na bhayato upaṭṭhātīti “sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1474_10: tathā yogino bhaṅgato dissamānā saṅkhārāti āha “sīha…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1475_0: Yathā itthiyā puttānaṃ sīsassa chinnatā chijjamānatā gayhamānā bhayāvahā,
anya-e0104n0:1475_1: evaṃ yogino tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā gayhamānāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ekissā kira itthiyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1476_0: Yathā pūtibhūtaṃ odanādi na sabhāvena tiṭṭhati vinassati,
anya-e0104n0:1476_1: evaṃ yassā itthiyā vijātavijātā puttā na jīvanti maranti eva,
anya-e0104n0:1476_4: Atītapaccuppannasaṅkhāranirodho hissa supākaṭo evāti na so upamāya sādhetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1476_5: Antimabhavikassa ca yogino sattakkhattuṃ paramādibhāvino atīte dukkhabahutāya,
anya-e0104n0:1476_6: anāgatadukkhaparittatāya ca dassanatthaṃ bahupajāva itthī nidassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1477_0: Tattha yathā tassā nava puttā matā,
anya-e0104n0:1477_7: Evamavaṭṭhite yadeke dasaputtamātaraṃ aggahetvā navaputtamātuggahaṇaṃ sātthakanti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:1477_10: Gabbhagato appaccakkhatāya bhāvīpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti adhippāyena kucchigato anāgatasaṅkhāraṭṭhāniyo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1477_11: Etasmiṃ khaṇeti bhaṅgadassanamukhena saṅkhārānaṃ bhayānakabhāvena upaṭṭhānakkhaṇe.
anya-e0104n0:1478_3: ñāṇaṃ pana bhāyitabbavatthuṃ bhāyitabbanti yāthāvato jānāti.
anya-e0104n0:1478_7: Kāmabhavādīnañhi tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ nidassanabhāvena tāsaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1479_1: sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāna”nti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:1479_2: Saṅkhārānaṃ pana tathā upaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāravinimuttaṃ na hotīti āha “atītā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1479_6: Khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgameva passato hi nimittasaññitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccatāya vuttanayena sappaṭibhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1479_8: matthakappattāya pana bhaṅgānupassanāya sabbabhavesu abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n0:1479_9: santasukhābhimatāpi bhavā dukkhasabhāvatāya bhayato upaṭṭhahantīti dassanatthaṃ “pavattanti rūpārūpabhavapavattī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1479_12: Dvayampi hi taṃ attasuññameva hutvā upaṭṭhahatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1482_10: Taṇhāgāhābhāveneva cettha “esohamasmī”ti mānagāhābhāvopi vuttoyeva hoti, vā-
anya-e0104n0:1483_0: Idāni patthanādīnamabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo bhavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1483_1: Tattha tayo bhavā aṅgārakāsuyo viya jātiādidukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvena mahābhitāpatāya.
anya-e0104n0:1483_2: Cattāro mahābhūtā kaṭṭhamukhapūtimukhaaggimukhasatthamukhasaṅkhātā ghoravisaāsīvisā viya kāyassa thaddhatāvissandanadāhacchedadukkhavidhānato visesato,
anya-e0104n0:1483_20: Cha ajjhattikāyatanāni attattaniyabhāvena gahitānipi tato rittabhāvato suññagāmo viya bhojanādigayhupagamettha atthīti paviṭṭhasuññagāmo viya.
anya-e0104n0:1485_1: Cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya sabbathāpi ghātakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1486_3: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehī”ti –
anya-e0104n0:1487_4: Sabbattha yathā heṭṭhā nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti sambandho,
anya-e0104n0:1487_5: evaṃ uparipi “savāḷakamiva vanagahana”ntiādīsu taṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1488_4: Tathā hissa yogino sabbesu bhavādīsu sabbepi saṅkhārā nissaggato nirantaraṃ sappaṭibhayāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n0:1489_1: Idaṃ vuttanti idaṃ dasavatthukaṃ dvādasavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena tasseva padabhājanaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1490_0: Uppādo bhayanti saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo akhemaṭṭhena bhayavatthutāya bhayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1490_4: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārānaṃ āyatiṃ uppādoti anuppādo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1490_5: Tañca sabbaso bhayābhāvato paramassāsabhūtattā nibbhayaṭṭhena khemanti.
anya-e0104n0:1490_8: Pavattiyaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā tadanantarameva nivattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanavasena sīghaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentānaṃ vasena “uppādo bhayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1490_12: bhayaṃ visesitabbaṃ sāmaññabhāvatoti satipi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāve liṅgabhedo gahito.
anya-e0104n0:1491_0: Uppādo saṅkhārāti ettha pana sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā saṅkhārā bhedato vihitā sabbatthakameva
anya-e0104n0:1492_1: Ñāṇaṃ ādīnave idanti ādīnave visayabhūte idaṃ pañcavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1492_2: Ñāṇaṃ santipadeti santipade ninnādibhāvena ṭhitaṃ idaṃ ñāṇanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1493_1: Kammapaccayā paccuppannabhave uppajjamānānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo pākaṭataro hutvā upaṭṭhātīti āha “purimakammapaccayā idha uppattī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1493_2: Pavattaṃ nāma idha pavattiyaṃ dhammappavattīti āha “uppannassa pavattī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1493_5: Ettha ca uppādapavattaāyūhanaggahaṇena paccuppannaddhapariyāpannā saṅkhārā gahitā,
anya-e0104n0:1493_9: Yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti sā nirayādibhedā gati sucaritaduccaritavasena gantabbattā,
anya-e0104n0:1493_16: atha kasmā sesā vuttāti āha “sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1493_17: Tena vipassakānaṃ ñāṇavipphārassa visayasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ desanā vaḍḍhitāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1494_0: Anvayato dassitassa ādīnavañāṇassa byatirekato dassanatthaṃ paṭipakkhañāṇadassanaṃ “yattha uppādo natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1494_3: anubuddhānañca āciṇṇametaṃ yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ dassetvā nirodhasaccadesanāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1494_4: Yathā loke kassaci ādīnavadassanaṃ niratthakampi hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1494_6: idaṃ pana sātthakamevāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1494_7: Tappaṭipakkhaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti dāhābhibhūtassa sītaninnatā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhādīnavato ekaṃsena muñcitukamyatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1495_1: “Niyamato dukkha”nti etenassa dukkhabhāvena bhāyitabbatāti bhāyitabbatā dukkhabhāvaṃ na byabhicaratīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1495_10: Na hi tattha sāmisatālesopi atthīti. Matta-
anya-e0104n0:1495_17: Kasmā sabbāni gahitānīti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1495_18: Yathā tesu eva saṅkhāresu aniccato dukkhato anattato pavattivasena ākāranānattato anupassanānānattaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1496_0: Yasmā ādīnavañāṇassa visayabhāvena vuttā pannarasāpi atthā uppādādīsu pañcasveva antogadhā,
anya-e0104n0:1496_1: tattha ca ñāṇaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena pavattanato dasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1496_4: attanipi asammūḷhamevāti attānampi pajānantaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1496_6: Dvinnanti dvīsu kusalasaddayogena hi bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā “kusalā naccagītassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1496_8: Dvinnanti vā dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasenāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1496_9: Pavattiyā yāthāvato diṭṭhatāya tappaṭipakkhato santipadaṃ suvinicchitameva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1499_4: anabhiramanto ca nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1500_2: pañcasu himavato mahāsikharesu pacchimo cittakūṭapabbato nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1504_3: Yasmā bhayato dissamānā eva saṅkhārā mahādīnavā,
anya-e0104n0:1504_5: tasmā ekampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ tathābhāvanābalappattiyā avatthāvisesayuttaṃ tividhakiccasāmatthiyavantaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “atthato eka”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1507_2: Muñcitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti anādikālikassa khandhassa pariññāyamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:1507_3: Muñcitukāmatā tato attānaṃ nibbedhetukāmatā nissaritukāmatā apagantukāmatā.
anya-e0104n0:1510_2: muñcitukāmo”ti vatvā puna sabbasmā saṅkhāragatāti sabbaggahaṇaṃ sātisayamuttidassanatthaṃ adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti.
anya-e0104n0:1510_5: Taṃ pana vuccamānāya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ “puna te evaṃ saṅkhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1510_6: Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhārapariggaṇhanaṃ pubbepi katanti punaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1510_10: Saṅkhārānaṃ pariggaṇhanaṃ nāma paripuṇṇalakkhaṇavaseneva hotīti “tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1513_5: amaṇḍanena sakkā etesaṃ subhabhāvaṃ hantunti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1513_6: Amaṇḍanena vā tesaṃ asubhatā pākaṭā hotīti amaṇḍanahatā.
anya-e0104n0:1513_7: Maṇḍanena vā na hantabbasabhāvā “asūriyapassā”ti viya amaṇḍanahatā.
anya-e0104n0:1513_10: Paṭighasaṃyojanavatthutāya passante attani bandhatīti bībhacchaṃ ativiya virūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1513_12: Ajaññajigucchanīyatā hi gūthaṃ viya pariccajitabbaṃ vā bībhacchaṃ. Idha ādi-
anya-e0104n0:1515_3: Upāyasampādanatthanti aniccādivasena suṭṭhu pariggaṇhanaṃ parimaddanā upāyo,
anya-e0104n0:1516_0: Macchagahaṇatthaṃ udake tattha tattha khipanti etanti khippaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1516_6: Hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvāti sappena attano bhogena veṭhitaṃ hatthapadesaṃ nibbeṭhetvā mocetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1517_2: Ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samūhādighanaggahaṇaṃ bhinditvā.
anya-e0104n0:1517_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ niccādiākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ asamatthatā aniccasaññādibhedāya vipassanāya sātisayaṃ balavabhāvappattiyā,
anya-e0104n0:1517_5: sā ca saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādiākārassa suṭṭhutaraṃ sallakkhaṇenāti āha “tilakkhaṇāropanena…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1517_7: Yathā hi nibbuddhakaraṇe balavatarena paṭimallena tattha tattha muṭṭhippahārādinā vimathito itaro tena yujjhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1517_9: atha kho maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n0:1517_10: evametepi saṅkhārā evaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ pāpitā upariñāṇānubhāvena nibbisevanataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1518_1: Ettāvatāti evaṃ “anaccantikato”tiādinā parocattālīsāya ākārehi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādibhāvasallakkhaṇavasappavattena paṭisaṅkhānena.
anya-e0104n0:1519_0: Aniccato manasikarototiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:1520_1: “paṭisaṅkhā”ti padassa “jānitvā”ti atthaṃ vatvā paṭisaṅkhānuppajjanakiriyānaṃ samānakhaṇattā asatipi
anya-e0104n0:1520_3: Tena “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0104n0:1520_5: uggatoyaṃ divākaro”ti ca evamādīsu viya samānakālavasenāyaṃ saddapayogoti.
anya-e0104n0:1520_6: Tathā manañca dhamme ca paṭhamaṃ paṭicca pacchā na manoviññāṇassa uppatti,
anya-e0104n0:1520_8: Ediso saddapayogo yebhuyyena loke pubbakālavaseneva dissatīti pubbakālavaseneva idhāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “ekattanayena vā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1520_11: aparāparaṃ uppannesu ñāṇesu purimassa vasena paṭisaṅkhānakiriyā,
anya-e0104n0:1520_13: na ca tāni bhedato apekkhitabbāni ekasantānapatitatāya ekattanayavasena gahitattāti.
anya-e0104n0:1523_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ aniccadukkhākārādipariggaṇhanavasena pavattampi paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ visesato anattākārapariggaṇhanapadhānanti
anya-e0104n0:1523_3: Tasmiñhi sati saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na asati.
anya-e0104n0:1523_4: Tadabhāvato hi aniccadukkhalakkhaṇapaññāpakampi sarabhaṅgasatthārādīnaṃ sāsanaṃ aniyyānikameva jātaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1523_5: Atha vā tesaṃ niccasārādīhi rittakaṃ sandhāya “sabbe saṅkhārā suññāti pariggahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1523_8: Saṅkhārānaṃ attasuññatāya duviññeyyabhāvato anekavāraṃ paṭividdhāyapi suññatānupassanāya daḷhībhāvāpādanatthaṃ “puna suññamida”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1523_11: Sati hi attani attaniyena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1523_16: saṅkhāraṃ vā parikkhārabhāve attano sukhadukkhasādhanabhāve ṭhitaṃ na disvāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1524_6: seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā parehi parikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1524_9: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-
anya-e0104n0:1524_14: tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ sijjhatīti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano
anya-e0104n0:1524_15: kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “na ca kvacanī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1524_16: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano abhāvaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_17: Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_18: Na ca mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1524_20: Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_21: Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā na catthīti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_23: bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1525_1: “Chahākārehī”tiādinā niddesādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatānupassanāya paribrūhanaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1525_4: Niccenāti “nicco”ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenaci.
anya-e0104n0:1525_12: Yāva jarāmaraṇāti peyyālaṃ akatvā pariyosānapadameva dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1526_5: Keci panettha “niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā”ti pāḷīti adhippāyena “asāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1526_9: Apare pana “subhasārasārenātipi pāḷiyaṃ atthīti ‘asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata’nti idaṃ padattayaṃ ‘niccasārasārenā’tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1527_7: kenaci issariyaṃ kāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca anissariyato.
anya-e0104n0:1527_8: Pheṇapiṇḍena bhājanādiṃ kātukāmassa viya rūpassa niccatādiṃ kātukāmassa taṃ na sijjhati,
anya-e0104n0:1527_9: sakaicchāvasena vā kāci kiriyā natthīti akāmakāriyato.
anya-e0104n0:1527_13: nāpi aññaṃ attano vase vattetīti avasavattakato.
anya-e0104n0:1527_14: Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ tassa paro viya avidheyyatāya parato.
anya-e0104n0:1528_1: Rūpaṃ na sattotiādīsu yo lokavohārena satto,
anya-e0104n0:1528_2: rūpaṃ so na hotīti ayamattho idha nādhippeto tassāvuttasiddhattā.
anya-e0104n0:1528_5: So hi tehi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresaṃ sañjāpanaṭṭhena “satto”ti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1528_11: “Ahamasmī”ti mānuppattiṭṭhānatāya māno ettha vāti pavattatīti mānavo.
anya-e0104n0:1528_15: Paccattaṃ tassa tassa ahaṃkāravatthutāya “aha”nti ca diṭṭhigatikehi attā vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1528_16: rūpaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti suññatāpariggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ na satto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1528_17: Tasmā aṭṭhahipi padehi rūpassa attasuññatāva dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1528_19: Tattha na mamāti mayhaṃ attano santakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1528_20: tathā aññassa attano santakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1528_21: kassacipi attano santakaṃ na hoti attanoyeva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1528_22: “Na attaniya”nti padena pakāsito evattho pariyāyantarehi tīhipi padehi pakāsito.
anya-e0104n0:1529_1: Heṭṭhā kalāpasammasanassa daḷhabhāvāya vuttasammasananayāpi suññatānupassanāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattantīti dassento “tīraṇapariññāvasenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1529_7: “Samudayato atthaṅgamato”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathā aniccato dassanaṃ panāḷikāya,
anya-e0104n0:1529_10: Tathā “yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1529_11: ayaṃ rūpassa assādo”ti dassanaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāvanena suññatāvibhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1529_13: ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo”ti ca dassanaṃ niccatādisuññatābhāvanato.
anya-e0104n0:1529_18: pubbe vatvāpi puna vacanaṃ assādapaṭikkhepato dassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1530_0: Vuttampi ca niddese etaṃ suññatāpariggaṇhanakathāsandassanaṃ “asukāya pāḷiyā ayaṃ niddeso”ti dassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1531_1: Evaṃ tīraṇapariññāvasena paccekaṃ khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvāpi tividhānupassanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n0:1531_4: Bhayañca nandiñca vippahāyāti ajjhupekkhakatāya saṅkhārānaṃ vipattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayañceva tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1531_6: Atha vā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppajjanakañāṇabhayañca sammasanavasena uppajjanakapītisaṅkhātaṃ nandiñca pahāya.
anya-e0104n0:1531_7: Na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhayanandīnaṃ avasaro atthi,
anya-e0104n0:1531_11: tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhātī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:1531_12: Idānissa udāsīnatāya upamaṃ dassento “vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1532_0: Tattha anudāsīnatāpubbikā udāsīnatā vuccamānā idha opammatthaṃ pharatīti dassetuṃ “iṭṭhā kantā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1532_1: Ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya itthīnaṃ sāṭheyyakūṭeyyavaṅkeyyādīnaṃ ajānanato.
anya-e0104n0:1532_5: Muñcitukāmatāya uddhaṃ yāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:1532_6: tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhānupassanā evāti āha “paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1533_0: Patilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1535_1: Tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne taṃ panetaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anekavāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1535_2: pavattamānaṃ paripākagamanena anulomañāṇassa paccayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1535_3: Tathābhūtañca sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1535_4: Tayidaṃ idha ñāṇaṃ anulomagotrabhuñāṇehi saddhiṃ ekattaṃ netvā vuttaṃ ekattanayavasena.
anya-e0104n0:1535_5: No ce nibbānaṃ santato passatīti tāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa aparipakkatamevāha.
anya-e0104n0:1535_9: lakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ yo koci tādiso sakunto veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1536_1: Piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viyāti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṃ saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:1536_5: Yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā,
anya-e0104n0:1536_8: Saṅkhāravicinaneti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya saṅkhāresu viya tesaṃ vicinanepi udāsīnaṃ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1536_10: “Sattadhā aṭṭhārasadhā”tiādinā vibhattāpi hi anupassanāpakārā aniccānupassanādīsveva tīsu antogadhāti
anya-e0104n0:1536_11: matthakappattā vipassanā tāsaṃ eva vasena tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:1537_8: anattānupassanābahulassa paññindriyanti tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena balavatarabhāvaṃ pattāni imāni
anya-e0104n0:1537_11: Tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvanti ettha ke pana tayo vimokkhā,
anya-e0104n0:1537_12: kāni vā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti antolīne anuyoge vimokkhamukhādhīnattā vimokkhādhigamassa vimokkhamukhāni tāva dassento “tisso hi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1537_13: vuccantī”ti vatvā ayañca attho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1538_2: Paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
anya-e0104n0:1538_3: Samanupassanatāyāti sammadeva anu anu passanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1538_7: Animittāya ca dhātuyāti sabbasaṅkhāranimittavirahato “animittā”ti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā.
anya-e0104n0:1538_8: Cittasampakkhandanatāyāti paricchinditvā anulomañāṇādibhāvena sammadeva adhicittassa anupavisanatthāya.
anya-e0104n0:1539_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanena saṃvejiyamānaṃ cittaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ samuttejitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1539_2: Mamaṃkārena attaniyasaññitassa vatthuno sāmibhūto attā paṭhamaṃ parāmasīyati,
anya-e0104n0:1539_8: “sabbasaṅkhāre”tiādīni pana tīṇi vākyāni tīṇi padānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:1539_9: Tenevāti aniccānupassanādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ vuttattā eva.
anya-e0104n0:1539_10: Pañhavissajjaneti “aniccato manasi karoto kathaṃ saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti pañhassa vissajjane.
anya-e0104n0:1540_1: Evaṃ vimokkhamukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetuṃ “katame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1540_4: Yassa visesato aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1540_6: “Aniccā saṅkhārā”ti hi ādito saddhāmattakena paṭipajjitvā vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya tarupallavādīsu viya
anya-e0104n0:1540_7: maṇikanakādīsupi tesaṃ aniccataṃ sātisayaṃ paccakkhato passato “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti satthari
anya-e0104n0:1540_10: Tassa aniccānupassanābahulatāya aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti so “animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1540_12: tappaṭipakkhato sukho nirodho”ti ca manasikāravasena nibbānassa santapaṇītasukhabhāvaṃ adhimuccanto abhiṇhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1540_14: Tato ca adhimattasamādhindriyapaṭilābhena rāgapaṇidhiyā dūrībhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti vuttaṃ “dukkhato…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1540_16: Vedabahuloti anattānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto attasuññatāya nipuṇañāṇavisayattā ñāṇabahulo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1540_17: Tato ca adhimattapaññindriyapaṭilābhena mohassa dūrībhāvato suññatavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti āha “anattato…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1541_0: Yo aniccānupassanāya nimittavasena saṅkhāre pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto yattha idaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ sabbaso natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1541_1: taṃ “animittaṃ nibbāna”nti animittākārena adhimuccanto vuṭṭhānagāminimaggena ghaṭeti.
anya-e0104n0:1541_2: Tassa maggo animittato nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti vuccatīti āha “animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1541_3: Svāyaṃ nibbānassa animittākāro neva maggena kato,
anya-e0104n0:1541_6: Tadārammaṇatāya ca maggo animittoti vuccatīti dassento āha “animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1541_7: Yo dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena appaṇihitaṃ adhimuccanto,
anya-e0104n0:1541_8: yo anattānupassanāvasena attūpaladdhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena suññataṃ adhimuccantoti ca ādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1542_2: atha kasmā abhidhamme vimokkhadvayameva āgatanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1542_4: Nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāyāti ujukameva vipassanato maggassa nāmāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:1542_5: Animittavipassanā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n0:1542_8: sā pana niccanimittadhuvanimittaattanimittāni ugghāṭentīpi sayaṃ nimittadhammesu eva caratīti sanimittāva hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1542_14: amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n0:1543_1: suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotīti tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0104n0:1543_3: Ye pana vadanti “animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1543_7: Maggo hi dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasato ca paccanīkato cāti,
anya-e0104n0:1543_10: suññatamaggo rāgādīhi suñño evāti te sarasato nāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0104n0:1543_12: suññatamaggo attābhinivesassa evāti te paccanīkato nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e0104n0:1543_14: niccanimittādīnaṃ vā abhāvena sarasato eva nāmaṃ labhati,
anya-e0104n0:1543_16: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho,
anya-e0104n0:1543_17: sā panassa anulomabhāve ṭhitāti sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:1544_1: Vuṭṭhānagāminī hi vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasantī vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0104n0:1544_2: tassa tassa vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti,
anya-e0104n0:1544_3: tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1544_6: tasmā suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā esāti katvā idha tayopi vimokkhā uddhaṭā.
anya-e0104n0:1544_7: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge abhinivesanimittapaṇidhimuñcanaṃ upādāya tissannampi anupassanānaṃ tadāgamanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1544_9: tassa pariyāyabhāve vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ “vipassanāñāṇaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1545_1: Niccato abhinivesaṃ muñcatīti “te niccā”ti niccākārato pavattamicchābhinivesaviddhaṃsanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:1547_1: Tesaṃ vibhāgāyāti tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ saddhānusāriādibhāvena vibhattasabhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n0:1548_1: Saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhatīti saddhānusāribhāvitākāraṇabhūtaṃ adhimattaṃ saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati.
anya-e0104n0:1548_5: aniccākārasallakkhaṇassa saddhābhibuddhiyā upanissayabhāvato tadanvaye magge saddhā tikkhatarā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1548_7: Sesesu sattasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā sattasu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0104n0:1549_5: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya diṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0104n0:1549_6: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
anya-e0104n0:1550_4: dve sīsānī”ti vacanato natthi arahato saddhāvimuttatāti?
anya-e0104n0:1550_12: so aggaphalakkhaṇepi tadanvayatāya saddhāvimuttoti paṭisambhidāmagge pariyāyena vuttoti idhāpi tatheva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1550_15: Yathā saddhāvimuttassa sekkhassa kilesakkhayo kuṇṭhena asinā kadalicchedasadiso “no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato,
anya-e0104n0:1550_17: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesapahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1550_18: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
anya-e0104n0:1550_20: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appakasirena akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n0:1550_24: Evañca katvā paṭhamamaggādīsu satipi indriyasamatte saddhādīnaṃ tikkhatāvacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1551_3: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dve dhurānī”ti niyamitattā paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā siyā,
anya-e0104n0:1552_1: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
anya-e0104n0:1552_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
anya-e0104n0:1553_5: Upacārarūpajjhānasamādhito hi sātisayaṃ arūpasamādhisamphassaṃ laddhā nibbattīti ekaccāsavaparikkhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1553_7: apekkhitvā kāyasakkhī viya kāyasakkhīti arahā paṭisambhidāmagge vuttoti idhāpi tameva nayaṃ gahetvā arahatopi
anya-e0104n0:1553_10: Nippariyāyena pana paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1553_15: Passaddhibahuloti ca passaddhisīsena samādhi vuttoti sātisayasamādhilābhī samathayānikova adhippeto,
anya-e0104n0:1553_18: Tattha pana ekampi laddhā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto eva hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “arūpajjhāna”micceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1553_23: Dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n0:1554_2: gambhīrā ca atthā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti anattato manasi karoto vedabahulatā,
anya-e0104n0:1554_5: Paññā hi idha “dhammo”ti adhippetā “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:1555_1: Yassā pāḷiyā vasena idha ariyapuggalassa saddhāvimuttādibhāvo vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1556_1: “Saddhindriyassa adhimattattā saddhāvimutto”ti evamādiatthassa sādhakaṃ aparampi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1556_2: “Saddahanto vimutto”ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:1557_3: phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikaraṇūpāyena sacchikātabbaṃ sacchākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1557_7: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1557_9: nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikatova hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1557_10: Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchākāsīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1557_11: na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
anya-e0104n0:1557_12: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1557_13: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
anya-e0104n0:1557_16: Ime ca saddhāvimuttādayo tayo paramatthato apariyositañāṇakiccāti taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ “saddahanto vimuccatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1558_8: Iti diṭṭhippattassa maggaphalañāṇabyāpāradassanāni imāni padānīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1559_2: Saddhaṃ anusaratīti āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ saddhaṃ anugacchati.
anya-e0104n0:1559_5: Saddhāya vā anusaratīti saddhāya kāraṇabhūtāya saccapaṭivedhassa anurūpaṃ sarati gacchati,
anya-e0104n0:1559_9: Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimutto,
anya-e0104n0:1559_12: Arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyekadesato ca vimutto,
anya-e0104n0:1559_13: ariyamaggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n0:1559_14: Pajānanto vimuttoti paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri ariyasaccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto
anya-e0104n0:1559_15: tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto.
anya-e0104n0:1560_2: so adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1560_6: tassa passaddhibahulatāya samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti dukkhupanisāya saddhāyapi tibbatarattā,
anya-e0104n0:1560_12: so vedabahulo paññindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī eva hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1560_16: aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā dhammānusārī vā siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1562_1: Yaṃ taṃ vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya ca paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1562_8: hontīti vuttaṃ “idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1563_7: tāva vicinanepi udāsīnatāya ñāṇassa santānavasena pavattiṃ sandhāyāha “ajjhupekkhanaṃ santiṭṭhanā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1563_8: Evanti ajjhupekkhanākārasāmaññato “muñcitukamyatā ca sā santiṭṭhanā cā”ti vuttākārena.
anya-e0104n0:1565_3: Kiccavasena pavattiṭṭhānavasenapi lokiyañāṇānaṃ upari ṭhitattā vuttaṃ “uttamabhāvaṃ pattattā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1565_6: Tañhi vipassanāya gocarakaraṇasaṅkhātena abhinivesena abhiniviṭṭhavatthunti pavuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1565_7: Taṃ panetaṃ sasantatipariyāpannampi parato diṭṭhitāya “bahiddhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1565_8: Tadeva hi “bahiddhā sabbanimittānī”ti tattha tattha vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1565_12: tannimittaṃ asati maggabhāvanāya uppajjanakaupādinnakkhandhapavattabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1566_3: Ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvāti sasantatipariyāpannesu khandhesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1566_4: “Ajjhattā vuṭṭhātī”ti idaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ajjhattadhammārammaṇattā pariyāyato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1566_8: taṃ pana ajjhattādivibhāgaṃ akatvā “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1566_9: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti avibhāgena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pavattivasena veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1566_10: tayidaṃ satthu sammukhā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesentassa ñāṇuttarassa sambhavatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1567_1: Suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ na hoti mamaṃkāravatthunopi pariññeyyattā maggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1568_1: Rāsiṃ katvāti bhūtupādāyavasena duvidhaṃ antarabhedavasena anekabhedampi “ruppanaṭṭhena rūpa”nti piṇḍato gahetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1568_3: evaṃ arūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1568_4: Abhinivesoti ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge kattabbanāmarūpaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1569_2: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti kāmaṃ udayabbayapariggaṇhanaṃ abhinivesoti dassitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1569_4: tesañca paccaye pariggahetvā saṅkhepeneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ cārento ñāṇuttaro yathānisinnova ñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0104n0:1569_5: khippameva saccāni paṭivijjhanto ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1569_6: Aññathā ekeneva lokiyacittena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariggahaparijānanādīnaṃ asambhavato.
anya-e0104n0:1569_7: Na hi sanidassanasappaṭighādiṃ ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkā.
anya-e0104n0:1570_1: Ettha ca abhiniveso akāraṇaṃ vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1570_2: tasmā heṭṭhā vuttavimokkhaariyapuggalavibhāgāpi vuṭṭhānavasena sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “ettha ca yopī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1570_3: Tattha tayopi janāti vuṭṭhānavasena bhede asatipi abhinivesavaseneva laddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1571_1: Saddhiṃ purimapacchimañāṇehīti bhayatupaṭṭhānādipurimañāṇehi ceva gotrabhuādipacchimañāṇehi ca saha.
anya-e0104n0:1572_4: sabbaṃ vā ñāṇakiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti vemajjhe ṭhatvā vibhāviyamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:1574_1: Cittassa vaṅkabhāvakarānaṃ māyādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhanena anulomassa ujukasākhāsadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1574_3: Appatiṭṭhe nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā maggañāṇassa ākāse uppatanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1575_1: Sappavissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vissajjitvā nibbānassa ālambanato.
anya-e0104n0:1575_2: Āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena attanopi dassanato.
anya-e0104n0:1576_5: Magge diṭṭhe maggapaṭipatti viya anulome siddhe maggo siddho evāti anulomassa maggadassanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1576_6: Saṅkhāranimittato nikkhantattā ādittagharato nikkhamanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1576_7: Vegena gamanaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ vissajjetabbagahetabbapadesesu sādhanakiccavisesayogato.
anya-e0104n0:1577_1: Parato na mamāyitabbato ca passitabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1578_3: Susānavijahanaṃ viya saṅkhārasusānaṃ vijahitvā nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattaṃ gotrabhu.
anya-e0104n0:1580_3: na purimāsu viya bhayatupaṭṭhānādīsu ṭhitassa bhāyanādiākāradassanatthanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1580_8: Sā panettha maggasampayuttā sammāsati kāyānupassanādikiccasādhanavasena amatarasaparibhogatāya ca “amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojana”nti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1582_0: Kapaṇāseribhāvādikaraṇena taṇhāsinehassa sītasadisatā. Maggatejanti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ indaggiṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1583_0: Rāgaggiādayo ekādasaggī vūpasamanti etthāti ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1584_0: Andhakāraparetoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena kiñci attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhūto.
anya-e0104n0:1585_2: Heṭṭhā attanā vuttameva saṅkhārupekkhābyāpāraṃ nigamanavasena dassento “tena vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1586_1: Nirālayatāya taṇhāvasena bhavādīsu avisaṭajjhāsayo hutvā tato saṅkucitacitto patilīnabhāvena carati pavattatīti patilīnacaro,
anya-e0104n0:1586_3: Saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanatāya bhikkhuno kāyacittavivekasiddhiyā vivittamāsanaṃ bhajamānassa.
anya-e0104n0:1586_7: So hi idha bhavanaṭṭhena bhavanti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1586_9: Tassa taṃ adassanaṃ sāmaggiyanti buddhādayo ariyā āhūti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1587_6: Visesanti chasattabhāvo sattaṭṭhabhāvo pañcādibhāvoti imaṃ yathākkamaṃ bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ariyamagge labbhamānabhedaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1587_7: Pādakajjhānanti maggassa āsannavuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1587_8: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtāti maggāsannāya eva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya gocarabhūtā vipassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1587_9: Puggalajjhāsayoti ubhinnaṃ bhede sati vipassakassa ajjhāsayo.
anya-e0104n0:1587_10: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ kecīti vutto tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero.
anya-e0104n0:1588_0: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevāti veditabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:1588_1: Vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamattheravādepi apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti,
anya-e0104n0:1588_2: itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato
anya-e0104n0:1588_5: Yathā hi maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1588_6: tato ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ visesoti tesaṃ niyamane āsannakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1588_9: Yasmā pana pādakajjhānena vinā vipassanāva imaṃ yathāvuttavisesaṃ niyametuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0104n0:1588_13: Yathā hi pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1588_14: adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1588_15: evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtasammasitajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ jigucchanākāravirāgabhāvanābhūtā sammasitajjhānena āhitavisesā,
anya-e0104n0:1588_16: ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena tato aññatarena āhitavisesā ca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ niyametīti.
anya-e0104n0:1589_3: So hi jhānasinehena vipassanāya asiniddhabhāvato sukkhā lūkhā vipassanā etassāti sukkhavipassakoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1589_5: Tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1589_8: Na hi vuṭṭhānagāminiṃ vinā kevalaṃ pādakajjhānādayo niyamahetū diṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n0:1589_9: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvepi sukkhavipassakādīnaṃ maggassa paṭhamajjhānikabhāvahetu,
anya-e0104n0:1589_11: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “tesaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1589_14: atha kho pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca.
anya-e0104n0:1589_15: Tesampīti pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggānampi.
anya-e0104n0:1589_16: “Āsannapadese”ti iminā vipassakena antarantarā paviṭṭhasamāpattiyā vasena ayaṃ viseso natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1590_4: upekkhāsahagatā ca hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1591_2: Svāyamattho pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānupanissayehi vinā ajjhāsayamattena asijjhanaṃ upanissayena vinā
anya-e0104n0:1591_4: Tattha hi yathā sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappataṃ vadantena bhagavatā “yassa yassa upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:1591_9: evamidhāpi yassa yassa dutiyādijhānikassa maggassa yathāvutto upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n0:1591_12: Imasmiṃ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hoti taṃtaṃphalūpanissayasabbhāve
anya-e0104n0:1591_16: Tasmā “tatrāpi hi vipassanā”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tadattho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1592_1: Evaṃ vipassanāya bojjhaṅgādiniyāmikataṃ dassetvā idāni paṭipadādiniyāmikataṃ dassento “sace panāya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1592_3: Sāpi hi kāmaṃ “imaṃ vāraṃ rocesu”nti ettha kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya pavattamānāya
anya-e0104n0:1592_4: uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṃ dukkhāpaṭipadāti rocesunti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:1592_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ vipassanānikantiṃ dukkhena kasirena
anya-e0104n0:1592_6: kilamanto pariyādiyatī”ti vuttattā pubbabhāge muñcitukamyatādibhāvena pavattamānā saṅkhārupekkhā attano
anya-e0104n0:1592_7: paṭipakkhe kicchena kasirena vikkhambhentī dukkhāpaṭipadāpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1592_10: tena saddhiṃ idaṃ ñāṇaṃ ekattanayavasena ekaṃ katvā ‘ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1592_15: Maggasaññitaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ anugantvā parivasati vippavasati etthāti parivāso,
anya-e0104n0:1592_18: taṃ pana sīghaṃ kurumānā khippābhiññā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “saṇika”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1592_23: Maggassa pabhavaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā nāmaṃ detīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1592_25: añño eva maggoti āha “attano attano maggassā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1592_26: Tena āgamanato laddhanāmena “dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā”tiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0104n0:1592_27: Na hi maggassa sarasato edisaṃ nāmaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:1593_2: Ekassa bhikkhuno catūsupi maggesu ekāva hotīti niyamo natthi calanato.
anya-e0104n0:1593_4: amhākaṃ bhagavantaṃ sandhāya hontīti pana vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1593_5: Sabbesampi hi sammāsambuddhānaṃ cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva hontīti.
anya-e0104n0:1593_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhārānurūpañhi maggo paccekaṃ chandādhipateyyo vā hoti vīriyādīsu aññatarādhipateyyo vā,
anya-e0104n0:1594_1: Pubbe vuttappakārato sātisayaṃ katvā anavasesato maggassa nāmalābhe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1595_3: tathāpi sarasādayo paccekaṃ nāmalābhassa kāraṇamevāti dassetuṃ “sarasena vā”tiādinā sabbattha aniyamattho vā-
anya-e0104n0:1595_5: Te ca asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1595_10: maggakattukāya vuṭṭhānakiriyāya ekantikahetubhūtā saṅkhārupekkhā phalūpacārena “vuṭṭhātī”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1595_11: Yasmā vā saṅkhārupekkhāti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā etaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1595_18: Idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ nimittādivirahato animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ suññatanti tividhampi maggassa sabhāvato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1596_1: So ca kho pubbabhāgamaggena saddhiṃ ekaṃ katvā vutto ekattanayena.
anya-e0104n0:1596_2: Idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ niccanimittādīnaṃ paṇidhiyā,
anya-e0104n0:1596_3: attasaññāya ca pahānavasena laddhaṃ maggassa animittādināmattayaṃ paṭipakkhato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1597_5: Idamassa saguṇato nāmanti idaṃ rāgādivivittattā rūpanimittādipaṇidhiādiabhāvavasena assa maggassa saguṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1598_5: Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmanti yathā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ “sukha”nti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1598_6: evaṃ suññatādināmassa nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato idaṃ assa maggassa suññatādibhedaṃ ārammaṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1599_1: Anattānupassanā attasuññatāya diṭṭhattā sarasato suññatā nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1599_4: Idaṃ pana maggassa animittanāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:1599_9: saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṃ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1599_10: Tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhipi kāraṇehi animittanāmalābhe paccanīkatova nāmavavatthānakaraṇaṃ gayhatīti tadabhāvā na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:1599_11: Atha vā na labbhatīti aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:1599_14: Paccanīkañhi vavatthānakaraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa nāmahetubhāvo abhidhamme natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1599_16: Tasmā attābhinivesapaṇidhipaṭipakkhavipassanānulomā maggā satipi sarasantare paccanīkasahitena sarasena nāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0104n0:1599_17: Animittamaggassa pana vipassanā nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti,
